tools: SQL, Tableau, Python, Power BI, Oracle
description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.
Get to Know the Role
As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field.
Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area.
Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data.
Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation.
Exposure in ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage.
Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with
Term Life Insurance
and comprehensive
Medical Insurance.
With
GrabFlex,
create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through
Parental
and
Birthday leave
, and give back to your communities through
Love-all-Serve-all (LASA)
volunteering leave
We have a confidential
Grabber Assistance Programme
to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.
content: data analyst associate jakarta lainnya sql, tableau, python, power bi, oracle business analytics, computer science, data analytics, economics, finance, statistics data & technology company tools: SQL, Tableau, Metabase, Google Data Studio, Python, Power BI, Excel
description:
Cimol Bojot AA (PT Citarasa Kuliner Indonesia) is building a data team to support our digital transformation across business functions. We’re looking for an
entry-level Data Analyst
(fresh graduates or candidates with 1–2 years of experience) who is excited to work cross-functionally with manufacturing, warehouse, supply-chain, marketing, sales, and finance & accounting teams.
You’ll help turn raw data into actionable insights and dashboards that inform daily operations and strategic decisions. Under the guidance of the Data Manager, you’ll contribute to data collection, cleaning, analysis, and reporting to support various departments.
Qualification :
Fresh graduates or candidates with 1–2 years of experience in data/analytics
Proficient in SQL (required)
Basic knowledge of Python (for analysis or automation tasks)
Comfortable with spreadsheet-based reporting and Excel
Familiar with BI tools like Metabase, Tableau, Power BI, or Google Data Studio
Strong interest in data collection, transformation, and automation
Good communication skills and willingness to work across teams
A growth mindset and eagerness to learn new tools or methods
Job Description :
Collaborate with different teams (manufacture, warehouse, sales, finance, etc.) to understand data and reporting needs
Write and optimize SQL queries to extract and validate data
Build interactive dashboards using tools like Metabase, Tableau, Power BI, or Google Data Studio
Clean, structure, and prepare data for analysis
Support simple ETL tasks to consolidate data from different sources
Present insights clearly to non-technical users through reports or dashboards
Document your work and share learnings with the team
Benefit :
Gaji Pokok + Tunjangan
BPJS Full

description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama :
Mengumpulkan, memproses, dan menganalisis data dari berbagai sumber untuk mendukung inisiatif perusahaan
Melakukan pencatatan dan monitoring stock harian terkait kebutuhan customer, item expired/near ED, serta item slow moving
Menyampaikan informasi terkini mengenai status stock (barang masuk, putus, delay) kepada Supervisor/Sales sesuai arahan
Mengidentifikasi tren, pola, dan wawasan yang relevan dari data yang ada
Menyiapkan laporan, dashboard, dan presentasi untuk mengomunikasikan temuan dan rekomendasi kepada pemangku kepentingan
Berkolaborasi dengan tim fungsional lainnya untuk memahami kebutuhan bisnis dan menerjemahkannya menjadi solusi data
Membantu mengembangkan dan mengelola proyek-proyek analitik untuk meningkatkan efisiensi dan efektivitas operasional
Mengembangkan dan mempertahankan sistem database dan penyimpanan data perusahaan
Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan :
Pendidikan min S1 dalam bidang Teknologi Informasi, Statistika, Matematika, atau disiplin ilmu terkait
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman kerja sebagai Data Analyst atau peran serupa
Mahir dalam menggunakan alat analitik seperti SQL, Excel
Kemampuan dalam pemodelan data, visualisasi, dan pelaporan
Pemahaman yang baik tentang teknik statistik dan data mining
Kemampuan komunikasi yang kuat, baik lisan maupun tulisan
Keingintahuan yang tinggi, berorientasi pada pemecahan masalah, dan kemampuan berinovasi
Bersedia untuk penempatan di Kawasan Industri MM2100, Cibitung

description:
As Data Analyst, you will directly
report to Director
Requirement
:
Bachelor Degree of IT / Computer science / Data science, or Certification of course completion in data analyst
Age Range : 20 – 39
Must have skill
: Expert in excel, Gsheet,  SQL, Tableau, Phyton, Scraping Website (including E-commerce marketplace)
Able to work with
Target & Deadlines.
Location of work : Kemayoran - Central Jkt or Pakem - Kab Tangerang (depend on the Candidate location)
Job Description :
Data Collection & Management
Gather data from multiple sources (databases, APIs, spreadsheets, surveys, etc.).
Maintain and update databases or data systems.
Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency.
Data Cleaning & Preparation
Identify and correct errors or inconsistencies in data.
Standardize, transform, and organize data for analysis.
Handle missing or incomplete data appropriately.
Data Analysis & Interpretation
Use statistical techniques to identify trends, correlations, and patterns.
Perform exploratory and predictive data analysis.
Apply business logic to translate raw numbers into meaningful insights.
Reporting & Visualization
Develop dashboards and reports (e.g., in Power BI, Tableau, Excel, or Looker).
Present findings to stakeholders in a clear, concise way.
Create visualizations (charts, graphs, KPIs) to make data insights accessible.
Punctually deliver report as required by users, including periodical reports (daily , weekly, quarterly & yearly report).
Business Support & Decision-Making
Collaborate with management to understand business needs
Provide data-driven recommendations for process improvement, growth, cost reduction or other important matters.
Support strategic planning and forecasting
Collaboration & Communication
Work with cross-functional teams (IT, marketing, finance, operations, etc.).
Translate technical findings into actionable business language.
Document processes, analysis methods, and key findings.
Tool & Technology Use
Query databases using SQL or similar languages.
Work with Python, Gsheet, or Excel for data analysis.
Leverage BI tools for reporting and visualization.

tools: SQL, Tableau, Python, R, Power BI, Excel
description:
Job Description:
As the Data Analyst at BNC, you will play a crucial role in leveraging data to drive data-driven decision-making, enhance operational efficiency, and optimize customer experiences. You will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to provide actionable insights that support various departments within the bank.
Key Responsibilities:
Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies. Utilize statistical techniques to draw meaningful conclusions and insights from data.
Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to banking operations, customer behavior, and financial performance. Identify anomalies and recommend corrective actions as needed.
Design experiment and validate experiment result to measure business impact scientifically.
Collaborate proactively with cross-functional teams to provide data-driven insights that support strategic decision-making and business growth.
Implement data governance best practices to ensure data quality, integrity, and security. Implement best practices for data management and storage.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
Minimum of 1 year experience as a Data Analyst with a proven track record of successful data analysis projects. Experience in the Banking industry is a big plus.
Proficient in SQL and in at least one of: Python, R, Excel.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar tools.
Familiarity with statistical analysis tools and techniques is a plus.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including project and stakeholder management.

position: CRM/CVM Analyst (Work From Home) - Singapore Client
tools: Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Tableau, Power BI, Excel
description:
About the Role
The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing marketing campaigns across multiple channels, generating actionable insights, and supporting decision-making with clear, data-backed recommendations. This role reports directly to the Senior Manager and will play a key role in improving customer engagement, optimizing campaigns, and driving business performance.
Key Responsibilities
Analyze end-to-end marketing campaign performance across digital and offline channels (SMS, Email, Push, Paid Media, etc.).
Generate insights on campaign effectiveness, customer behavior, and ROI to support optimization and future planning.
Build, maintain, and automate dashboards and reports using
Tableau
(preferred) or
Power BI
for campaign tracking and business performance.
Collaborate with campaign managers and product teams to design data-driven strategies.
Conduct A/B testing and performance benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement.
Translate complex data into clear, actionable recommendations for leadership and stakeholders.
Monitor KPIs such as conversions, CTR, ARPU uplift, churn reduction, and incremental revenue.
Skills & Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Statistics, Economics, Data Analytics, or related field.
4–8 years of experience in campaign analytics, digital marketing analytics, or a similar role (telecom/tech industry experience preferred).
Strong proficiency in digital analytics and campaign measurement.
Hands-on experience with Tableau (preferred) or Power BI (dashboard creation, visualization, and reporting).
Advanced skills in Excel and Google Sheets for data analysis and reporting.
Strong analytical and commercial skills, with the ability to translate data into business impact.
Solid understanding of campaign performance metrics (CTR, conversion, ARPU, churn, uplift, etc.).
Proficiency in Excel, and analytical tools (Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, or similar is a plus).
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to generate actionable insights.
Excellent communication skills to present insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Why Join Us?
Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, data-driven environment.
Direct impact on shaping campaign strategies and customer engagement.
Exposure to advanced marketing automation and CVM platforms.
Collaborative and supportive team culture.

BSA Land Group is the largest property developer in Indonesia, specialising in the middle-class sector. With over 30 residential and commercial projects across the archipelago, BSA Land works to reduce the 8 million housing backlog in the country. Our focus on creating sustainable developments that positively impact people's daily lives has earned us multiple international awards and recognition as the leading property developer in Indonesia.

description:
About the role
As a Merchandising Planning Analyst at PT Ramayana Lestari Sentosa Tbk, you will play a crucial role in the company's retail and consumer product planning. you will be responsible for analysing data and developing strategies to optimise our product assortment and inventory, ensuring we meet the evolving needs of our customers.
Key Responsibilities
Collect, clean, and analyze sales, inventory, and market trend data using Excel, SQL, and BI tools.
Develop data-driven merchandising plans (assortment planning, pricing strategy, promotion effectiveness).
Build and maintain dashboards and regular reports to support management decision-making.
Collaborate with marketing, buying, and supply chain teams to ensure plans align with company targets.
Perform root cause analysis to investigate anomalies in sales or inventory data.
Present insights and recommendations to management and stakeholders in a clear and actionable way.
Propose initiatives for automation and digitalization of data analysis using scripts or AI technology.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree from a reputable university in IT, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
3–5 years of experience in Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, or Merchandising Planning.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel (pivot tables, complex formulas) and SQL.
Familiar with Power BI, Tableau, or other BI tools (knowledge of machine learning/AI is a plus).
Strong communication skills with the ability to deliver insights to management effectively.
Basic leadership skills
Highly detail-oriented, critical thinker, and able to work under tight deadlines.
Understanding Mandarin Language.
About us
PT Ramayana Lestari Sentosa Tbk' is a leading retail company in Indonesia, operating a network of department stores and supermarkets across the country. With a strong focus on providing quality products and exceptional customer service, we have built a reputation for being a trusted and reliable brand. Our commitment to sustainability and corporate social responsibility is at the heart of our business, and we are proud to be a part of the communities we serve.

description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan memverifikasi data dari berbagai sumber.
Menganalisis tren, pola, serta insight dari data yang tersedia.
Membuat laporan visualisasi data (dashboard, grafik, presentasi) untuk memudahkan pemahaman stakeholder.
Memberikan rekomendasi berbasis data guna mendukung strategi bisnis.
Bekerja sama dengan tim lintas divisi (IT, Finance, Marketing, dsb.) untuk kebutuhan analisis.
Mengelola database serta menjaga kualitas data.
Kualifikasi
Pendidikan minimal S1 Statistik, Matematika, Ilmu Komputer, Ekonomi, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman kerja sebagai Data Analyst / posisi sejenis minimal 1–2 tahun (fresh graduate dengan skill kuat dipertimbangkan).
Menguasai SQL dan bahasa pemrograman analisis data (Python/R).
Terbiasa menggunakan tools visualisasi (Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio, atau sejenisnya).
Memiliki kemampuan analisis yang kuat serta perhatian pada detail.
Mampu mengkomunikasikan hasil analisis dengan jelas kepada pihak non-teknis.
Kemampuan problem solving dan critical thinking yang baik.
Nilai Tambah (Preferred)
Pengalaman di bidang Big Data, Machine Learning, atau Data Engineering.
Familiar dengan cloud platform (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Pengalaman membuat model prediktif.
Soft Skills yang Dibutuhkan
Komunikasi yang baik (lisan maupun tulisan).
Kemampuan bekerja dalam tim maupun mandiri.
Time management dan orientasi pada hasil.

Stay informed about industry trends, market updates, and competitor activities to deliver timely and relevant insights.

tools: SQL, Tableau, Google Data Studio, Python, R
description:
About the Role
The Merchant Marketing Data Analyst Associate will play a pivotal role in driving data-informed marketing strategies to accelerate GoFood’s growth. This role is responsible for developing and managing analytics dashboards, delivering actionable insights, and optimizing marketing performance across key initiatives. The ideal candidate will analyze merchant adoption of core GoFood features—such as promotions and ads—evaluate campaign effectiveness, and assess cost efficiency to guide smarter marketing decisions.
A core focus of this role is optimizing sales and CRM efforts to ensure cost-effective strategies for converting merchants to participate in promotional and advertising programs. By leveraging strong analytical skills, this role will contribute to refining business strategies, improving merchant conversion rates, and identifying untapped growth opportunities.
This position will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams—including marketing, product, and business units—to ensure alignment between analytics efforts and broader company objectives. It is ideally suited for a highly analytical, results-driven professional with a passion for transforming complex data into strategic insights.
Build and manage marketing analytics frameworks – Develop dashboards and reports to track key marketing OKRs.
Analyze campaign performance and merchant behavior – Provide insights to optimize marketing strategies and drive growth
Develop predictive models and A/B testing – Improve forecasting, attribution, and marketing spend efficiency on CRM
Enhance targeting and segmentation – Use data-driven insights to refine merchant segmentation for better conversion and cost efficiency.
Holds a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Business Analytics, Marketing, or a related field.
Has over 3 years of experience in analytics, marketing intelligence, or data-driven decision-making roles, preferably within tech, e-commerce, or FMCG industries.
Proficient in data analytics and visualization tools such as SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Google Data Studio, or similar platforms.
Possesses strong statistical and predictive modeling skills, with experience in A/B testing, forecasting, and attribution analysis.
Demonstrates a proven ability to translate complex data into actionable insights and communicate findings effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Experienced in marketing performance analysis, merchant segmentation, and ROI optimization.
Skilled in working cross-functionally with marketing, product, and business teams to ensure alignment of data-driven strategies with company goals.
Strong in problem-solving and critical thinking, with a proactive mindset and the ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment while driving data-informed decision-making.
About the Team
The Marketing Analytics team is a vital part of the GoFood Marketing division, based in Jakarta. This team collaborates closely with CRM, Product Marketing, Sales, and Merchant Growth teams to provide data-driven insights that enhance marketing performance, optimize campaign effectiveness, and drive business growth. By leveraging analytics, the team ensures that marketing efforts are strategic, cost-efficient, and impactful.
Our mission is to transform data into actionable insights, enabling the marketing team to make informed decisions that improve merchant engagement, campaign ROI, and merchant acquisition. A key focus is optimizing outreach campaigns, including WhatsApp and Telesales, to convert unmanaged merchants into active participants in promos and ads while maximizing cost efficiency.
As a data-centric team, we continuously refine our methodologies, utilizing advanced analytics, predictive modeling, and segmentation strategies to enhance marketing outcomes. We play a crucial role in measuring performance, tracking key marketing KPIs, and identifying opportunities for efficiency and growth.
At GoFood Marketing Analytics, we believe that data is the foundation of innovation. We foster a culture of continuous learning, collaboration, and problem-solving, empowering our team members to push boundaries and drive measurable impact. Through data, we aim to elevate GoFood’s marketing strategies and solidify its position as a market leader.
About GoTo Group
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.
About Gojek
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.
About GoTo Financial
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.
GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.
#LI-ONSITE

description:
About the role
We are seeking a motivated and analytical Data Analyst Intern to join our team at PT Higo Fitur Indonesia, a leading technology company based in West Jakarta, Jakarta. This is a i
nternship opportunity
for an individual with a strong background in mathematics, statistics, and information sciences. As a Data Analyst Intern, you will play a crucial role in extracting insights from data to support our company's strategic decision-making processes.
What you'll be doing
Assist in collecting, cleaning, analysis, visualization, and organizing datasets from various sources.
Support data analysis projects and help uncover trends and insights.
Create basic reports, visualizations, and dashboards to present data findings.
Collaborate with team members to understand project goals and data requirements.
Document data processes and contribute to process improvements.
Perform ad hoc data tasks and provide support for ongoing analytics initiatives.
Potentially contribute to machine learning or AI related projects.
What we're looking for
Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
Basic understanding of data analysis, statistics, or business analytics.
Familiarity with Excel, MongoDB, SQL, or data tools like Python/R (a plus).
Interest in learning data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, or similar).
Strong attention to detail, with the ability to work independently and within a team.
Good communication and organizational skills.
Curiosity and eagerness to learn about data-driven decision-making.
Exposure to machine learning concepts or tools (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow).
Experience with data visualization tools.
Interest in or experience with business analysis or working with stakeholders.
What we offer
At PT Higo Fitur Indonesia, we are committed to providing a supportive and inclusive work environment that fosters personal and professional growth. As a Data Analyst Intern, you'll have the opportunity to work alongside industry-leading experts, gain valuable hands-on experience, and contribute to the development of innovative data-driven solutions.
About us
PT Higo Fitur Indonesia is a leading provider of innovative technology solutions that empower businesses across Indonesia to thrive in the digital age. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction and a commitment to continuous innovation, we have established a reputation for delivering cutting-edge products and services that help our clients achieve their goals. Join us as we continue to redefine the technology landscape and make a meaningful impact on the businesses we serve.
If you are excited about the prospect of joining our team as a Data Analyst Intern, we encourage you to
apply now
.

Willing to be placed at Lippo Karawaci

tools: SQL, Tableau, Looker, Python, R, Power BI
description:
Job Description:
We’re seeking a high-impact
Lead Data Analyst
who combines technical excellence with strong leadership. This is more than a numbers role; you’ll shape how we use data to tell stories, influence strategy, and drive measurable business growth. As the bridge between business and technical teams, you’ll guide a talented group of analysts, mentor their development, and ensure our analytics deliverables unlock real value for clients and stakeholders.
About Dentsu
Led by Dentsu Group Inc. (Tokyo: 4324; ISIN: JP3551520004), a pure holding company established on January 1, 2020, the Dentsu Group encompasses two operational networks: dentsu japan network, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations in Japan, and dentsu international, its international business headquarters in London, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations outside of Japan.
With a strong presence in approximately 145 countries and regions across five continents and with 65,000 dedicated professionals, the Dentsu Group provides a comprehensive range of client-centric integrated communications, media and digital services through its five leadership brands—Carat, dentsu X, iProspect, Dentsu Creative, and Merkle—as well as through Dentsu Japan Network companies, including Dentsu Inc., the world’s largest single brand agency with a history of innovation. The Group is also active in the production and marketing of sports and entertainment content on a global scale.
www.dentsu.com
About Merkle
Merkle is a leading data-driven customer experience management (CXM) company that specializes in the delivery of unique, personalized customer experiences across platforms and devices. For more than 30 years, Fortune 1000 companies and leading nonprofit organizations have partnered with Merkle to maximize the value of their customer portfolios. The company’s heritage in data, technology, and analytics forms the foundation for its unmatched skills in understanding consumer insights that drive hyper-personalized marketing strategies. Its combined strengths in performance media, customer experience, customer relationship management, loyalty, and enterprise marketing technology drive improved marketing results and competitive advantage. With 12,000 employees, Merkle is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, with 50+ additional offices throughout the Americas, EMEA, and APAC. Merkle is a dentsu company.
Key Responsibilities
Guide a team of analysts, fostering both technical mastery and professional growth.
Translate stakeholder requirements into clear, actionable analytics projects.
Build frameworks, dashboards, and reports that uncover opportunities and drive smarter decisions.
Transform complex findings into compelling, digestible insights for senior leaders and clients.
Ensure consistency, accuracy, and trust in all analytics outputs.
Partner with data science, engineering, marketing, and product teams for integrated solutions.
Proactively spot opportunities to leverage data for growth, efficiency, and innovation.
Contribute to analytics best practices, methodologies, and tools that raise the bar across the organization.
A bit about you
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, or related field.
At least 7 years of experience in data analytics, with min. 2 years in leadership or mentoring roles.
Advanced skills in data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, Looker).
Proficiency in SQL and at least one analytics language (Python, R).
Exceptional communication and presentation skills able to simplify complexity for non-technical audiences.
Proven ability to manage multiple projects and thrive in a fast-paced environment.
Strong business acumen, with a track record of connecting insights to strategy.
Experience working with clients and stakeholders in consulting or cross-industry settings.
Dentsu Values
Will live the dentsu 8 Ways at all times: We Dream Loud, We Inspire Change, We Team Without Limits, We All Lead, We Make It Real, We Climb High, We Choose Excitement, We Are A Force For Good
Inclusion and Diversity
We’re proud to be different and that starts with our people. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone. We won’t define people by their race, gender, sexual-orientation, age or disability. Individuality is what makes us great, we want everyone to bring their full self to work and create something amazing. That’s what we care about.
So, whether you’re joining us, or looking to move to a different part of the business, we work hard to make sure we create equal opportunities for everyone.
Keeping connected
Please visit our website to find out more and connect with us on social.
www.dentsu.com
*Please include an updated CV in your application.
**We regret that only short-listed candidates will be notified.

Permanent

company: PT. LUNA BOGA NARAYAN (Kopi Janji Jiwa)
description:
The opportunity
We are looking for a talented Talent Acquisition Data Analyst Intern to join our dynamic team at PT. LUNA BOGA NARAYAN (Kopi Janji Jiwa). In this contract role based in West Jakarta, Jakarta, you will play a crucial part in supporting our recruitment efforts and driving data-driven decision making.
What you'll be doing
Collect, analyse and interpret recruitment data to identify trends and insights
Develop and maintain reporting dashboards to track key recruitment metrics
Assist in the development and implementation of data-driven recruitment strategies
Support the continuous improvement of our recruitment processes through data analysis
Collaborate with the talent acquisition team to provide data-backed recommendations
Identify areas for optimization and create actionable plans to enhance recruitment efficiency
What we're looking for
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to derive meaningful insights from data
Proficiency in data analysis tools and techniques, such as Excel, SQL, and data visualization software
Excellent communication skills to present data-driven insights effectively
Keen interest in the field of talent acquisition and recruitment
Adaptability and the ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
Relevant qualifications or experience in human resources, data analysis, or a related field
About us
PT. LUNA BOGA NARAYAN (Kopi Janji Jiwa) is a leading coffee company that is dedicated to providing premium coffee experiences. With a strong focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability, we are committed to being the industry leader in the Indonesian market. Join us on our exciting journey as we continue to expand and revolutionise the coffee industry.
Apply now to become our next Talent Acquisition Data Analyst Intern and play a crucial role in shaping the future of our organisation.

description:
At Catalyst, People are the heartbeat of our company. We believe that good quality people will have a positive impact on our business. We are looking for a Junior Data Analyst to join our growing team. If you are passionate about being part of the team, building some of the most critical products, and Working alongside teams in the industry across product, engineering, and design, Let’s join us!
Job Description :
Build data dashboards to monitor company performance and efficiency metrics.
Working with data engineering & data analytics teams to prioritize to provide, integrate and govern all company data.
Support the business transformation from manual data entry systems to an automated, end-to-end structured data system.
Design, build, and drive adoption of data dashboards for the tech-enabled Operations team, such as pipeline management and conversion funnel metrics.
Build weekly/monthly analytical reports, leveraging data from our internal product.
Synthesize business intelligence to provide critical business insights for the Operational Excellence function.
Partner with other business divisions (operations, growth, etc) to generate ad-hoc data analysis requests and diagnose root causes of operational pain points (e.g. root cause of the decline in sales team activity or reduction in time to fill).
Provide insights from data investigation & product performance analysis by working closely with Product Managers.
Requirements :
Possess 1-3 years of experience in Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Consulting, Business Intelligence, or similar role.
Experienced working in e-commerce or marketplace is preferred.
Strong data analysis skills and experience with data programming languages and visualization software (SQL, Metabase, Excel/GSheets, etc.).
Advanced excel modeling and data visualization skills.
Self-starter.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

description:
We’ve been experiencing hyper-growth the past year, becoming Indonesia's 7th Unicorn Startup and the first Investment Fintech Unicorn in South East Asia 2.5 years after Ajaib first launched. With the global financial technology market expected to grow gradually, we aim to make stock trading accessible for millennials through our mobile-first approach. In 2022, we opened our new head office in the Indonesia Stock Exchange Building, and we’re just getting started!
The three principles, or what we call as 3DNAs, became the foundation and set the guideline for the Magician belief system: Everyone is an owner, Growth Mindset, and A Will to Win.
As a Data Analyst at Ajaib, you will be at the forefront of transforming our data into meaningful insights that drive informed business decisions. You'll deeply analyze our datasets, uncover trends, and support various teams including product and marketing in making data-driven decisions.
Job Description
Manipulate, analyze and interpret large datasets to support business decision and to provide actionable insights.
Collaborate with multi-product teams, to understand business requirements and ensure data solutions meet their needs in timely manner.
Create and maintain reports and dashboards using data visualization tools for business monitoring and communicating key findings
Communicate complex data concepts clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical team members and stakeholders.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of data practices, ensuring accuracy and consistency in reporting.
Work with DBT for data transformation processes and collaborate with the team using GIT for version control and documentation.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, computer science, etc.
3-6 years of experience in data analytics or related field.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to apply these skills to practical business problems.
Proficient with SQL and data analysis/visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Metabase knowledge is a plus.
Familiarity with DBT and GIT as collaboration tool is a plus.
Understanding of statistical analysis and modeling techniques.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present complex data in a clear and concise manner.
Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities.
Benefits
Join us as we make magic happen to increase Indonesia’s financial inclusion!

Menganalisis data pelanggan untuk memahami kebutuhan, tren, dan pola pembelian, serta membantu tim sales menargetkan kampanye yang lebih efektif.

Komunikatif dan mampu bekerja sama dengan tim sales maupun departemen lain.

description:
PT Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk (MAP) Established in 1995, PT Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk (MAP) is a leading retail and lifestyle group in Indonesia. The company’s fashion division features an impressive portfolio of over 40+ international brands, including well-known names such as Zara, Marks & Spencer (M&S), Loewe, Flying Tiger, Pandora, Swarovski, Lacoste, and many more. These brands cater to a wide range of fashion tastes and preferences.
A Supply Chain Management Data Analyst is responsible for analyzing and interpreting data related to supply chain operations. This role involves using data to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and ensure the smooth operation of the supply chain.
Job Responsibilities:
Data Collection: Gather data on supply chain operations, including shipment and delivery times, costs, and inventory levels
Data Analysis: Analyze and interpret supply chain data to identify areas for improvement and efficiency
Reporting: Develop and present reports on key metrics and performance indicators to internal stakeholders
Strategy Development: Develop and implement strategies to optimize supply chain processes and reduce costs
Predictive Modeling: Use predictive modeling to forecast future demand and procurement needs Collaboration: Work with other departments to identify vulnerabilities and close operational gaps
Performance Monitoring: Track and report on the performance of the supply chain, using KPIs and other metrics
Job Requirements:
Must have a bachelor's degree from any majors, but does not necessarily have to be related with data analysis as long as you have matching experience
Must be able to speak English as you'll be working with an expatriate (Non-negotiable)

description:
Anda Berpengalaman dalam Penelitian dan Pengembangan Produk Skincare dan Ingin Karir Anda Berkembang Pesat?
Bergabunglah menjadi Data Analyst di PT. Mercier Estetika Internasional, hanya jika Anda:
Memastikan akurasi, konsistensi, dan integritas data di seluruh sistem pelaporan dan analitik.
Kemampuan analitis, berpikir kritis, dan pemecahan masalah yang kuat.
Meningkatkan dan mengoptimalkan proses integrasi, pelaporan, dan visualisasi data guna meningkatkan efisiensi dan skalabilitas.
PT Mercier Estetika Internasional adalah perusahaan pabrikasi skincare dan kosmetik dengan brand MPM Beauty, Animate Beauty & Animate Skinthetic yang berfokus untuk menjadi yang terbaik di tingkat Asia.
1. Berpengalaman lebih dari 15 tahun dalam distribusi dan pengembangan produk sehingga akan siap bersaing di pasar Internasional.
2. Diakui secara prestisius di tingkat dunia melalui produknya, sejalan dengan visinya untuk menjadi perusahaan kosmetik terbaik di Asia.
3. Perusahaan percaya bahwa kebebasan untuk berkreasi ditambah dengan ketekunan dan kegigihan akan membuat kerja lebih optimal dan akan selalu berdampak positif bagi duniai dengan menginspirasi banyak orang.
4. Jika Anda tidak hanya ingin sekedar bekerja, namun juga belajar bersama di Sekolah Kehidupan ini, kami tunggu resume Anda.
Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
• Mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan mengonsolidasikan data dari berbagai sumber, termasuk platform e-commerce, kampanye KOL, program afiliasi, media sosial, dan saluran kinerja konten.
• Mengembangkan, menerapkan, dan memelihara dasbor dan laporan otomatis menggunakan Power BI untuk memberikan wawasan yang tepat waktu dan akurat bagi pengambilan keputusan.
• Melakukan analisis komprehensif untuk mengidentifikasi tren, mengevaluasi kinerja, dan merekomendasikan strategi optimasi.
• Berkolaborasi dengan tim lintas fungsi (pemasaran, konten, dan unit bisnis) untuk menerjemahkan temuan data menjadi inisiatif strategis.
• Memastikan akurasi, konsistensi, dan integritas data di seluruh sistem pelaporan dan analitik.
• Meningkatkan dan mengoptimalkan proses integrasi, pelaporan, dan visualisasi data guna meningkatkan efisiensi dan skalabilitas.
Kualifikasi:
• Gelar Sarjana Matematika, Statistika, Ekonomi, Bisnis, Ilmu Komputer, atau bidang terkait.
• Minimal 1–2 tahun pengalaman profesional dalam analisis data, analitika, atau intelijen bisnis. • Kemahiran tingkat lanjut dalam Microsoft Excel (tabel pivot, rumus kompleks, pemodelan data).
• Pengalaman langsung dengan alat visualisasi data seperti Power BI, Tableau, atau Looker.
• Kemampuan analitis, berpikir kritis, dan pemecahan masalah yang kuat.
• Kemampuan yang terbukti untuk mengintegrasikan dan menganalisis kumpulan data dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan wawasan yang jelas dan dapat ditindaklanjuti.
• Keterampilan komunikasi yang sangat baik, dengan kemampuan untuk mempresentasikan temuan kompleks kepada pemangku kepentingan teknis maupun non-teknis.
• Sangat berorientasi pada detail, terorganisir, dan nyaman bekerja dengan kumpulan data besar.
Lokasi Kerja: PIK 2, Jakarta Utara
Hanya jika Anda memenuhi kriteria,  Action sekarang juga! Sebelum tanggal 19 Oktober 2024
All resumes will be handled strictly confidential and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

description:
Job Description Summary:
Coordinate and prepare key sustainability disclosures for company and its subsidiaries,
including the Sustainability Report, Annual Report, UN Global Compact Communication
of Progress, and CDP submission.
Ensure timely, accurate, and consistent ESG data collection and management across the
organization.
Support the enhancement of ESG data systems and contribute to the implementation of
digital tools and automation to improve reporting efficiency, data governance, and
alignment with relevant sustainability standards and frameworks.
Job Description:
Coordinate ESG data collection across various departments and business units, ensuring
timely and accurate input to support both internal and external sustainability disclosures.
Validate and organize ESG-related data, including environmental, social, and governance
indicators, to support compliance with relevant reporting frameworks.
Assist in maintaining and improving the company’s internal ESG data management
systems and tools, with a focus on enhancing efficiency, reliability, and audit-readiness.
Support the preparation of key corporate disclosures such as the Sustainability Report,
Annual Report (sustainability section), UN Global Compact Communication of Progress,
and CDP submission.
Contribute to data submissions for sustainability benchmarks and ratings including
SPOTT, CDP, MSCI, and Sustainalytics.
Work closely with the ESG Data Manager and Head of ESG Reporting to improve ESG
data quality, system integration, and readiness for emerging disclosure requirements.
Perform other related tasks as required to support the company’s ESG strategy and
reporting commitments.
Job Requirement:
Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Management, Sustainability, Agriculture, Engineering,
Data Science, or a related discipline.
Minimum 2–4 years of experience in sustainability, certification, ESG reporting, or
environmental data roles — preferably within the palm oil sector.
Willing to be placed in Jakarta

description:
We’re looking for a skilled Data Analyst with a passion for numbers and a solid understanding of the Food & Beverage (F&B). This role is ideal for someone who thrives on turning complex data into clear business insights and enjoys working cross-functionally with teams like operations, marketing and finance.
Responsibilities:
Sales & Revenue Analysis: Track and interpret key metrics such as average order value, sales per item, and revenue trends.
Inventory & Supply Chain Analysis: Monitor food costs, wastage, and inventory turnover to optimize supply chain performance.
Customer Behavior Analysis: Identify patterns in customer preferences, peak hours, and feedback for improved service and retention.
Operational Efficiency: Analyse data on staffing, kitchen output, and delivery times to improve day-to-day operations.
Menu Engineering: Evaluate item profitability and popularity to support strategic menu decisions.
Cost of Goods Sold (COGS): Assess how raw material costs influence profit margins.
Seasonality & Promotions: Analyse the impact of holidays, seasons, and marketing campaigns on sales performance.
POS Systems: Work with data from systems to derive actionable insights.
Fixed Asset Records: Verify and manage records of fixed assets at various restaurant locations.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree (S1) in Mathematics, Statistics, or a related quantitative field.
At least 3 years of experience in the F&B or relevant industry.
Advanced Excel skills, including formulas, pivot tables, dashboards, and charts.
Experience working with relational databases (e.g., querying sales and inventory data).
Basic programming knowledge for analysis using Python, SQL, or similar tools.
Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical findings to non-technical teams (managers, marketers).
Problem-solving mindset with a keen eye for uncovering insights that drive business decisions.
Collaborative attitude and experience working with cross-functional teams.

description:
Sales Data Analyst
Sales Data Analyst is responsible for collecting, interpreting, and presenting sales-related information to aid in decision-making processes. This position should have optimizing sales strategies through the analysis of data.
Job descriptions:
Gather and organize telesales data from CRM systems, transaction records, and external databases (delivery record).
Ensure data accuracy and completeness by identifying and rectifying errors, duplicates, or inconsistencies.
Utilize statistical methods to analyze sales trends, patterns, and performance indicators.
Prepare comprehensive daily, weekly & monthly reports and dashboards to communicate findings, including agent’s (telesales) performance report.
Develop accurate sales forecasts based on historical data, market trends, and other relevant factors.
Determine and track key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales growth, customer acquisition cost, conversion rates, and customer retention.
Work closely with sales teams, and other departments to understand business requirements and provide data-driven insights.
Propose and implement improvements to data collection processes and analytical methodologies to enhance overall efficiency and accuracy.
Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to support strategic decision-making and improve overall sales performance.
Requirements:
Experience at least 1 year in relevant field is mandatory
Advance in Microsoft Office: Microsoft Excel ( Dashboard, Pivot, Lookup ,etc), Microsoft Word & Power Point is mandatory.
Good analytical & critical thinking, attention to and able to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

description:
Gambaran Umum Pekerjaan
Kami mencari Marketing Analyst yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di SCCR Indonesia, Industri Farmasi yang berbasis di Gunungpati, Jawa Tengah. Sebagai Marketing Analyst, Anda akan memainkan peran kunci dalam mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data pemasaran yang berharga untuk membantu mendorong strategi pemasaran yang efektif dan membuat keputusan bisnis yang berdampak baik.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data pemasaran dari berbagai sumber, termasuk media sosial, mesin pencari, dan situs web.
Mengidentifikasi tren, peluang, dan tantangan pasar yang dapat dimanfaatkan untuk meningkatkan strategi pemasaran.
Membuat laporan dan presentasi yang jelas dan menarik untuk berbagi wawasan dengan tim pemasaran dan manajemen holding.
Memberikan masukan dan saran untuk meningkatkan kampanye pemasaran, saluran, dan inisiatif.
Memantau dan melaporkan kinerja pemasaran, serta memberikan rekomendasi untuk optimalisasi.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim fungsi lainnya untuk memastikan pengambilan keputusan yang diinformasikan dengan baik.
Keterampilan, Kualifikasi, dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana dalam bidang Pemasaran, Analisis Data, atau bidang terkait.
Minimal 3 tahun pengalaman dalam peran Marketing Analyst atau serupa.
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat, termasuk kemampuan untuk mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menginterpretasikan data.
Pengetahuan tentang metode penelitian pasar dan teknik analisis data.
Mahir dalam menggunakan alat analitik dan perangkat lunak, seperti Google Analytics, Excel, dan platform BI.
Kemampuan untuk menyajikan wawasan data dengan jelas dan meyakinkan.
Pemahaman yang baik tentang tren dan praktik terbaik pemasaran digital.
Kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim dan berkolaborasi dengan berbagai pemangku kepentingan.
Manfaat Utama Perusahaan
Paket kompensasi yang kompetitif, termasuk gaji yang menarik dan tunjangan yang sesuai.
Lingkungan kerja yang dinamis dan inovatif, dengan fokus pada pengembangan profesional dan pertumbuhan karier.
Budaya perusahaan yang menjunjung nilai-nilai keragaman.
Tentang SCCR Indonesia
SCCR (Stem Cell and Cancer Research) Indonesia
merupakan industri farmasi terkemuka di bidang riset dan pelayanan kesehatan, khususnya dalam pengembangan terapi stem cell dan riset kanker. Berlokasi di Kota Semarang, SCCR Indonesia dilengkapi fasilitas laboratorium stem cell yang didukung oleh para peneliti-peneliti internasional. Kami berkomitmen menghadirkan inovasi medis berstandar global. Sebagai industri farmasi berstandar Badan POM dan CPOB , SCCR Indonesia berfokus menyediakan solusi kesehatan berbasis riset untuk mendukung kualitas hidup pasien dan kemajuan ilmu pengetahuan di bidang biomedis.
Tertarik untuk bergabung dengan tim kami? Lamar sekarang!

description:
Requirements:
Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in roles related to customer experience (CX), journey analysis, or business/data analysis, preferably in a B2C environment (e.g., telco, e-commerce, banking, retail).
Proven track record in supporting customer journey initiatives, data reporting, or improvement projects involving customer touchpoints.
Good understanding of B2C customer journeys, including both: Digital channels and Offline channels
Able to link customer pain points or feedback to specific steps in the journey for further action.
Coordinate follow-up on action items from CX reviews and internal discussions.
Track the effectiveness of changes implemented.
Analyse customer data (TUR, NPS, CTR, drop-off, etc.) from both online and offline sources.
Build simple dashboards and trackers to monitor key journey performance indicators.
Flag insights and abnormal patterns to support decision-making.

Berpengalaman
Diploma
Tidak ada batasan usia

description:
About Company
TransGraph Consulting Pvt Ltd is a leading provider of Commodity Price Risk Management Solutions, serving a diverse range of industries, including manufacturing, automotive, trading, refining, banking, and FMCG. Our expertise spans research projects, price analysis and forecasting, value chain and supply chain assessments, and both physical and financial hedging strategies.
Over two decades of experience, we bring unparalleled market intelligence across Agri and Non-Agri commodities with a core offering of Commodity Price Risk Consulting. TransGraph is deeply engaged in commodity research and consulting, covering 50+ commodities, including 30+ Agri and 15+ Non-Agri commodities. Our Agri-focused expertise extends to agribusiness development, rural and social development, crop surveys, production estimates, feasibility studies, value chain assessments, and policy evaluations.
Beyond price risk management, we have TransRisk, a proprietary Commodity Exposure Risk Management Software, designed to empower stakeholders across the commodity value chain with data-driven insights and predictive analytics.
We have successfully partnered with governments, national, and multinational organizations to drive informed decision-making and strategic planning. Our market intelligence and risk management solutions extend beyond agriculture to metals, energy, and industrial commodities, covering aluminum, copper, steel, zinc, precious metals, energy & petrochemicals, paper, and polymers.
By leveraging our expertise in price forecasting, hedging strategies, and risk assessment, we help businesses navigate price volatility, optimize procurement, and make smarter investment decisions. With TransGraph, clients gain access to tailored strategies that enhance resilience and competitiveness in an evolving global market.
Job Specifications
Job Role: Fundamental Analyst- Commodities Designation: Jr. FA/ FA/Sr. FA/Associate(Designation will depend on the level of experience)
Domain: Fundamental Research on Commodities
Total Work Experience: 2 + years Education Qualification
Graduation from a premium institute and or Post Graduation in Management- Agriculture/ Finance / Economics/ Statistics with related experience.
Additional Qualification: Industry-specific diplomas/ Functional certifications
Essential Language: English &  Bahasa
Cost to Company: As per market standards
No. Of open positions1
Location of Work: Jakarta, Indonesia
Job Objective:
The Research Analyst would be required to perform extensive research on the supply-demand price of select commodities globally and build several forecast models based on the collected information. To be successful in this role, the Analyst will be expected to demonstrate strong analytical capabilities, forecast modeling, and the ability to critically analyze data efficiently.
Commodity Fundamental Analysts are required to support Commodity Consulting Services at TransGraph which are aimed to serve various corporate houses that are exposed to price risk in the commodity segment.
Job Requirements:
Expert level of skills in fundamental analysis and strong ability to take a call on the market for short-term to long-term periods.
Ability to build any indicators, and forecasting models for any new commodity
Business acumen, attention to detail, and strong data interpretation skills to connect dots and predict market developments
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, to generate timely reports and to interact with clients.
Negotiation and persuasive skills to discuss and obtain information from market participants, and industry experts and the ability to interact and establish various market sources to obtain market intelligence. Willing to travel for various surveys to meet different stakeholders as per the business needs.
Good understanding of the value chain of the respective domain/commodity.
Sound knowledge of derivative markets and related concepts.
Ability to effectively operate independently and in a team environment
Service-oriented attitude while delivering the research and working with passion for client esteem.
Innovation, willingness to learn / UN-learn, and be the change agent.
Ability to think out-of-box on facing any constraints.
Job Responsibilities:
Responsible for independently handling the assignedcommodities from the needs of consulting clients.
Identificationof various driversof the commodity time to time and updatingin reports and if necessary release special updates.
Timely preparing daily / weekly/ bi-weekly / monthly / quarterly reports.
Helping the consulting team with appropriate market factors in a timely manner.
Actively participating in market outlookdiscussions and contribute to enhancing the forecasting accuracy.
Active role while designing the trading, hedgingand procurement strategies.
Ability to guide the team and convertthe collected data into decisionenabling content.
Be hands-on on industry developments.
Should travel for various surveys across Indonesia and collect and build local market intelligence of various commodities.
Handling the assignedclients with respectto the business needs.
Eligible and Interested candidates may share their resume with HR at
kemadhipie.k@transgraph.com (Indonesia); raghuram.m@transgraph.com, santosh.a@transgraph.com, careers@transgraph.com.
OR
HR Contact details: +91 77998 86682, +91 72079 24429 or
+62 8112313557 ( Local Contact)
URL: www.transgraph.com; www.transrisk.net; linkedin.com/in/transgraph-consulting-43203a36

tools: SQL, Tableau, Looker, Python, R, Power BI
description:
About Amartha
At Amartha, we empower micro-businesses across Indonesia, enabling growth and equal prosperity. We’ve supported over 2.7 million entrepreneurs—mostly women—by disbursing IDR 22.8 trillion in funding. As we step into 2025, Amartha is evolving into a technology-driven financial ecosystem, expanding our reach in lending, funding, and payments. Through innovation and digital solutions, we aim to enhance accessibility, streamline processes, and create a seamless user experience.
About the Role
As a Data Analyst in Lending at Amartha, you will play a key role in generating insights that drive strategic lending decisions across secured and unsecured products. You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to collect, analyze, and interpret data, ensuring that recommendations are accurate, actionable, and aligned with Amartha’s business objectives. While this role focuses on lending data analytics, we’re open to candidates with experience in related areas such as product or risk analytics, as long as they bring strong analytical thinking and stakeholder collaboration skills.
Responsibilities
Analyze lending performance data across secured and unsecured products to identify trends, risks, and opportunities
Build and maintain dashboards, reports, and data visualizations to support decision-making for Product, Operations, Risk, and Leadership teams
Develop and execute data queries, ensuring accuracy, reliability, and timeliness of insights
Collaborate with stakeholders to define data requirements and translate business needs into analytical solutions
Monitor and evaluate lending KPIs, OKRs, and operational metrics to track performance against targets
Provide data-driven recommendations to improve lending processes, risk management, and product performance
Support initiatives in automation, predictive modeling, and data quality improvement
Ensure compliance with data governance, privacy policies, and regulatory requirements
Requirements
2–4 years of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or analytics in fintech, banking, or lending platforms
Proficiency in SQL and experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Looker)
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and translate it into actionable insights
Familiarity with lending processes, credit risk metrics, and financial KPIs is preferred
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present findings to both technical and non-technical audiences
Experience with Python, R, or statistical modeling is a plus
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field

description:
What you’ll do:
This role is responsible for supporting the service team on all operation's administrative tasks.
"1. Order Processing. Candidates should have a basic understanding of the SAP order process system. This includes creating service order fulfillment for all service orders, managing the service order from PO receipt to delivery, scheduling, and billing. For contract POs, ensure that PM servicing and additional job scopes are planned and billed according to the quotation. Prepare service agreements and follow up with customers for signed agreements. Record all service orders and ensure all billing is completed as planned before month-end closing.
2.  Job Scheduling. Familiarity with SalesForce Field Service Management is preferred. Responsibilities include planning manpower allocation on a monthly and daily basis. Coordinate work schedules with Field Service Engineers, Service partners and sub-contractors. Prepare paperwork related to service appointments with customers and providing name lists. Monitor and arrange SIC for engineers and contractors. Issue work orders in SalesForce.
3. Issuing Purchase Requisitions. Verify all service jobs, including preventive maintenance, and collaborate with the Service Manager on work orders. Raise purchase requisitions (PR) with Customer Service for customer purchase orders involving outsourced jobs to service partners. Issue PRs for spare parts purchases under comprehensive maintenance.
4. Warranty Management. Handle warranty inquiries, such as checking warranty status from distributors/Resellers/end users. Verify extended warranty POs and coordinate with Project PM to obtain UPS/user information for warranty certificates. Issue warranty certificates for PQ / PD / Cooling Systems. Update SAP for UPS warranty extensions period. Support Service Manager for local warranty claims and RMAs process. Assist in knocking off spare parts used in comprehensive maintenance from SAP.
5. Quality Management System Commitment. Implement the process approach and risk-based thinking. Provide necessary support to fully implement and sustain the QMS. Communicate the importance of conforming to QMS requirements within the organization. Ensure the QMS meets its goals. Engage, direct, and support individuals contributing to the QMS. Foster a culture of continuous improvement."
Qualifications:
Advance Diploma, Bachelor Degree is a bonus
More than 5 years working experience as an administrative executive
Skills:
ERP (SAP) proficient, Microsoft Office, high proficiency in Excel is a bonus
Excellent communication, collaboration and organizational skills

Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
High level of integrity, accountability, and problem-solving ability.
Proficiency in Mandarin, particularly in written communication, is required.
Willing to be placed in Pantai Indah Kapuk.

description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
‎
‎
Job Description
Extract, clean, and analyze large datasets to identify potential fraudulent activities in all Traveloka products
Develop SQL queries to support fraud detection, investigation, and reporting needs.
Support investigators by providing data insights, evidence, and pattern analysis.
Document findings from investigations, analyze the case, and recommend action items and feasible improvements to minimize fraud from happening in the future
Provide input/ insights on fraudulent methods/behaviors to be used to develop preventive and curative actions.
Interact with issuing institutions and customers to validate the information, to confirm or cancel authorizations, and manage disputes
Understand Traveloka products and business processes in-depth
Compile and present report to the team on the fraud findings
‎
Requirements
2 years of experience in Anti-Fraud, Fraud Ops, Fraud Investigations, or similar role. Fresh graduates with strong data skills and or with intern experience are welcome.
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.
Strong SQL skills (writing complex queries, joins, aggregations).
Experience building dashboards in Google Data Studio/Dashboards Tools is preferred.
Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel.
Strong analytical thinking and detail-oriented, ability to detect anomalies, interpret data trends, and provide actionable insights.
High accuracy in handling sensitive and large-scale datasets.
Curious, proactive, and eager to learn about fraud schemes and investigation techniques.
Excellent both verbally and in written English
‎
If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
We drive innovation and operational excellence by turning data into actionable strategies that elevate the end-to-end experience for consumers, driver-partners, and merchant-partners. From optimizing transaction flows and platform efficiency to enhancing reliability, we strive to make Grab the first choice, every time.
Get to Know the Role
You will report to the Product Analytics Manager, Business Platform and you'll have the unique opportunity to collaborate across disciplines (Product, Business, Engineering, Design, Data Science) to transform data into dynamic solutions. Your insights will directly contribute to developing groundbreaking products and initiatives, setting new benchmarks for excellence. This isn't just any role; it's a chance to make a tangible impact on millions of lives every day.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will understand our requirements and outcomes to ensure data-driven decision-making.
You will conduct tailored analyses for specific products and operations, define critical business metrics, track them rigorously, and recommend continuous improvements.
You will frame business scenarios and propose features that impact critical business processes and decisions.
You will transform requirements into concise insights through reports, presentations, and dashboards, and consolidate data from multiple sources to create comprehensive views for decision-making.
You will develop data pipelines and custom data science models to solve identified problems.
You will launch A/B tests, analyze the results, and provide recommendations based on your findings.
You will be a pioneer in the adoption of Gen AI across functions, and leverage Gen AI to optimize product features, business operations, and internal productivity.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least +4 years of experience in data-related or quantitative fields such as Analytics, Science, Statistics, or Mathematics.
You are fluent with SQL, Python, R or other scripting/programming languages.
You are experienced in handling large datasets and maintaining complex Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) processes.
You have strong business acumen and the ability to connect user behavior with product features. To do that, you need to be a structured problem solver.
You have solid statistical knowledge and hands-on experience running and analysing controlled experiments.
You are proficient in creating dashboards using Tableau, PowerBI or other visualisation tools.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with
Term Life Insurance
and comprehensive
Medical Insurance.
With
GrabFlex,
create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through
Parental
and
Birthday leave
, and give back to your communities through
Love-all-Serve-all (LASA)
volunteering leave
We have a confidential
Grabber Assistance Programme
to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

description:
Responsibilities:
As an Equity Research Analyst, you will play a crucial role in conducting in-depth research on companies, enabling a comprehensive understanding of the Indonesian market. Under the tutelage of accomplished private equity investors, you will refine your writing and logical thinking skills , preparing you for potential advancement to the role of a fund manager.
Join the industry research group of the Company's Securities Research Institute, conduct in-depth research on all listed companies in a certain 1-2 industries, analyze and judge the industry competition pattern, and predict the future long-term development of the industry.
Conduct on-site or telephone online surveys of listed companies, interview industry experts, senior industry funds and professional investors to build understanding of the industry and listed companies.
Your day to day task includes:
-Craft meticulous research reports tailored for both retail and institutional investors within predetermined deadlines.
-Conduct thorough company analysis through a combination of online sources and on-site surveys to extract unique insights.
Qualifications:
A graduate from a reputable university (Minimum GPA 3.2) with a major in finance, accounting, economics, or related field
Over three years of hands-on experience and a solid theoretical foundation in the value research and assessment of listed companies, with a background of three or more years as a fund manager or industry and company researcher.
More than 2 years of experience working as an auditor at a Big Four company.
Expertise in enterprise valuation methodologies, including a mastery of models such as DCF and DDM. Proficient in fundamental analysis of companies with a robust foundation in financial and economic analysis. Those who can use the Bloomberg system are preferred.
Profound knowledge of industry analysis methodologies, demonstrating the ability to rapidly assess industries, make informed judgments on growth and development, and articulate critical points in industry assessments.
Fluent in Chinese or English for effective communication, possessing polished presentation skills, and adept in utilizing tools such as Bloomberg and Microsoft Office.
Demonstrate a commitment to excellence, uphold radical truthfulness, possess an open-minded approach, and exhibit strategic intelligence.
Willingness to undergo comprehensive training for the development of advanced analytical thinking.
Genuine interest in stock valuation and adept at reading annual reports.
Possession of a minimum HSK 6 certification is a plus.

description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
‎
‎
Job Description
Verifying customer's information, ensuring completeness, validity of the data submitted and given by the customer.
Conduct credit risk assessments by analyzing customer data and financials, verifying creditworthiness through phone or video calls, and providing recommendations on credit applications, including approvals and rejections.
Handling daily applications review and provide decisions of all incoming applications following policy and SOP applied.
Analyze and identify any missing/fake information during assessment and report to Supervisor and related department.
Monitoring of existing accounts on repayment, credit check, account behavior.
Achieving daily targets for reviewing incoming loan applications and adhering to committed Service Level Agreements (SLA).
Able to read, understand, and evaluate customer payment performance and historical credit data to make informed decisions for future approvals.
Preparing detailed reports to communicate the outcomes of assessments to the Supervisor and related department.
Providing proactive insights and recommendations on existing procedures, policies, and risk assessments for improvement.
‎
Requirements

description:
Responsibilities
Plan, create and execute lead generation campaigns across platforms like Google Ads, Facebook, and Tiktok.
Ensure that targeting, ad creatives and landing pages work seamlessly together.
Monitor and manage ad spend to ensure resources are utilized efficiently, prioritizing performance and lead quality.
Identify and scale high-performing campaigns to increase the volume of qualified leads.
Analyze performance data to uncover trends, evaluate lead quality, and continuously optimize campaigns for better results.
Conduct A/B tests on ad creatives, messaging, and landing pages to uncover insights that drive campaign improvements.
Generate detailed reports to track metrics like cost per lead and conversion rates, providing actionable insights for further optimization.
Set up accurate tracking and reporting using tools like Google Analytics and CRM platforms to ensure the effectiveness of lead generation efforts.
Work with the creative team to develop compelling ads that resonate with target audiences and encourage engagement.
Collaborate closely with the sales team to ensure leads are converting effectively, while implementing strategies to enhance lead quality when needed.
Stay informed about industry trends, competitor strategies, and platform updates to inspire fresh and innovative campaign ideas.
Qualifications and Skills
Proficient in English  in order to handle the local market (Written and spoken Arabic is a bonus)
Proven experience in performance marketing or lead generation, with a strong focus on digital advertising platforms like Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and Tiktok Ads.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with creative and sales teams.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills, capable of managing multiple campaigns and tasks simultaneously.
Results-driven mindset with the ability to focus on achieving qualified lead volume and conversion goals.
Ability to troubleshoot and solve problems quickly, especially under tight deadlines.
Proactive attitude with a passion for staying updated on the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing and lead generation.
