description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
Join the Commercial Team at Grab - a dynamic team shaping the future within Grab that helps to simplify business transportation, corporate food and package deliveries and related services for companies across Southeast Asia.
Get to Know the Role
We are looking for a Sales Compensation Analyst to join our team onsite in South Jakarta, Indonesia. You will design, manage, and analyse sales compensation plans that motivate, reward, and also increase sales performance. You will report to the Sales Compensation Manager, and will work fully on-site.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Establish target configurations for each OKR metric at the individual level.
Create financial models to forecast sales compensation costs and impact.
Manage the sales compensation administration process nationwide, including a tracker, calculation and validation of commissions and bonuses at the end of each month and collaborate with other teams for disbursements.
Conduct analyses and discussion of sales OKR performance data metrics, targets and compensation structures, with the respective stakeholders to ensure smooth OKR implementation that leading to actionable insights to improve sales team performance.
Liaise with Analytics team to retrieve data to track sales performance
Contribute to internal projects designed to support the sales team and ensure compliance with company policies and regulations.
Communicate and provide training regarding compensation plans and the tools to the sales team and Serve as the contact for compensation plan inquiries, addressing questions from the sales team.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business Administration, Economics, or related field.
Minimum 3+ years in roles related to sales compensation, strategy, or finance.
Ability to analyze complex situations, identify issues, and develop actionable solutions while navigating ambiguity.
Familiarity with analytical tools (SQL, Looker Studio, Power BI, Databricks, etc.).
Advanced Excel skills, including financial modeling, statistical analysis, and data visualization.
Ability to work with teams and manage multiple stakeholders.
Organizational abilities, negotiation expertise, and attention to detail.
Clear and accurate articulation of information.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with
Term Life Insurance
and comprehensive
Medical Insurance.
With
GrabFlex,
create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through
Parental
and
Birthday leave
, and give back to your communities through
Love-all-Serve-all (LASA)
volunteering leave
We have a confidential
Grabber Assistance Programme
to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

description:
Job Overview
This role partners closely with Commercial, R&D, Operations, and Finance teams to drive business growth and profitability. The position is responsible for analyzing financial performance, supporting strategic decision-making, and improving processes to enable sustainable commercial success.
Key Responsibilities
Support the Commercial Director and Business Development team in driving growth and profitability, including tender submissions, pricing, forecasting, and contract assessments.
Partner with R&D and Operations to validate product costing and review future volume projections.
Lead product finance analytics (pricing, COGS, mix, cost-to-sell, profitability, etc.) and explain key variance drivers.
Provide insights and recommendations to leadership for budgeting, forecasting, and profitable growth.
Analyze performance and propose action plans to improve profitability (e.g., Value Engineering, corrective actions).
Drive cross-functional projects to simplify, standardize, and strengthen commercial/finance processes.
Support internal controls and contract standardization to ensure compliance and efficiency.
Develop and enhance financial tools (dashboards, scenario planning, ROI analysis, etc.).
Lead or support strategic initiatives, transformation projects, and sales force effectiveness improvements.
Collaborate with senior leadership on long-term financial and strategic planning.
Requirement
Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Accounting from a reputable university (overseas graduates are encouraged to apply).
Fresh Graduates are welcome to apply.
Minimum 1 year of experience in a finance managerial role with proven analytical and continuous improvement skills, including project management and business analysis.
Strong ability to build financial models and forecasts for business cases and commercial arrangements.
Excellent communication skills, with experience collaborating across multiple levels (including executives), functions, and regions, and the ability to simplify complex financial information.
Proficiency in English preferred.
Strong Microsoft Excel skills; knowledge of Power Query is an advantage.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to connect financial results to operational drivers, generate insights, and support decision-making.

description:
Shape Your Bright Career with Us!
Eka Jaya Group (Hanasui, NCo) is #Hiring for the
Financial Planning and Analysis Supervisor (FP&A)
position!
About Us:
Eka Jaya Group is a leader in the beauty industry, proudly home to premium brands Hanasui and NCo. Since our establishment in December 2016, we've built a strong foundation rooted in our core values: Integrity, Compassion, Innovation, and Customer Satisfaction (IC²). With our private factory, we guarantee superior product quality, on-time delivery, and competitive pricing. We’re seeking passionate individuals to join our dynamic team as we continue to elevate our digital growth in the beauty industry.
Position:
Financial Planning and Analysis Supervisor (FP&A)
Work Location:
Alam Sutera, Tangerang
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
Knowledgeable in Costing, Manufacturing Flow, P&L Management and working capital management
Proficient in Financial Planning with strong financial analysis skills
Minimum of
1 year
in Financial Planning & Analysis Supervisor (FP&A), preferably in commercial or manufacturing sectors.
Experienced in collaborating and coordinating across departments, Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, Detail-oriented, accurate, and results-driven
Willing to work from the office (WFO) at our Alam Sutera location
Job Responsibilities:
Financial Planning & Budgeting:
Lead the planning and forecasting cycle across commercial or manufacture functions, ensuring alignment with strategic and operational goals.
Costing & Manufacturing Flow Analysis:
Analyze cost structures, product margins, and manufacturing flows to support cost-saving initiatives and profitability improvements.
Profit & Loss Management:
Monitor, analyze, and interpret P&L performance, identifying trends and variances to support strategic decision-making.
Working Capital Optimization:
Track and manage working capital components to ensure healthy cash flow and operational efficiency.
Cross-Department Collaboration:
Work closely with Sales, Marketing, Operations, and Supply Chain to ensure financial alignment across initiatives.
Financial Reporting & Analysis:
Produce accurate, timely financial reports and conduct in-depth variance analysis against budgets and forecasts.
Stakeholder Communication:
Present financial insights, trends, and recommendations clearly to management and relevant stakeholders.
Why Join Eka Jaya Group?
At Eka Jaya Group, we empower our team members to learn, grow, and make an impact. If you're looking for an exciting opportunity in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, #EJINIAN is the place for you! Join us and help safeguard the financial health and compliance of Hanasui and NCo—two beloved brands that are making waves in the beauty industry.
Upsize your career with us at #LIFEatEJI
Let’s #EJITOTHEMOON together!

Job Description
Traveloka, the leading online travel and lifestyle platform, is seeking a dynamic and highly motivated Product Operations Associate to join the team. If you have a passion for problem-solving and love working in a fast-paced environment, then this role is tailor-made for you!
As a Product Operations Associate at Traveloka, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the stability and seamless operation of our platform, allowing us to continue serving millions of satisfied customers in Southeast Asia, 24x7. Your mission will involve:
1. Becoming the Troubleshooting Expert:
You'll be the go-to person when it comes to identifying and resolving system issues. Working closely with a diverse group of stakeholders, you'll swiftly analyze problems and go the extra mile to implement effective solutions, ensuring our platform operates flawlessly.
2. Collaborating with the Best:
You'll be at the forefront of communication, liaising with both internal teams and external partners to resolve any issues that may arise. This presents a unique opportunity to interact with brilliant minds and build a vast network within the tech industry.
3. Champion of Product Fixing & Beyond:
Take charge of executing product fixes and embrace exciting ad hoc tasks. Your dedication to innovation will contribute to making Traveloka's platform even more user-friendly and efficient.
‎
Requirements
A strong individual with high discipline and reliability
Highly resilient and mentally tough
Willingness to run the extra mile and work with unpredictable schedules (i.e., standby on an instant communication channel in case an issue arises)
Ability to work calmly and effectively in a high pressure situation
Excellent communication skills
Good analytical skills
Bachelor's degree in IT field (computer science / electrical engineering / telco) or at least 1 year of technical experience in software development / IT (operation, support & infrastructure) field
‎
If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

as a product operations associate at traveloka, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the stability and seamless operation of our platform, allowing us to continue serving millions of satisfied customers in southeast asia, 24x7. your mission will involve: 1. becoming the troubleshooting expert: you'll be the go-to person when it comes to identifying and resolving system issues. working closely with a diverse group of stakeholders, you'll swiftly analyze problems and go the extra mile to implement effective solutions, ensuring our platform operates flawlessly. 2. collaborating with the best: you'll be at the forefront of communication, liaising with both internal teams and external partners to resolve any issues that may arise. this presents a unique opportunity to interact with brilliant minds and build a vast network within the tech industry. 3. champion of product fixing & beyond: take charge of executing product fixes and embrace exciting ad hoc tasks. your dedication to innovation will contribute to making traveloka's platform even more user-friendly and efficient. ‎ requirements a strong individual with high discipline and reliability highly resilient and mentally tough willingness to run the extra mile and work with unpredictable schedules (i.e., standby on an instant communication channel in case an issue arises) ability to work calmly and effectively in a high pressure situation excellent communication skills good analytical skills bachelor's degree in it field (computer science / electrical engineering / telco) or at least 1 year of technical experience in software development / it (operation, support & infrastructure) field ‎ if you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

tools: Google Cloud, SQL, AWS, Python, Azure
description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
The Finance Solutions Excellence team is dedicated to improving finance processes through automation and data-driven solutions. We partner with Global Process Owners, Data Engineers, Data Analysts, and Finance teams to deliver impactful improvements. Our team values curiosity, and a commitment to creating growth. Together, we are shaping the future of finance by creating smarter, faster, and scalable solutions.
Get to Know the Role
The Finance Solutions Excellence Analyst will drive process improvements within the finance team, focusing on AI-driven solutions using Python, SQL, and LLMs. You will collaborate with Global Process Owners, Data Engineers, Data Analysts, and Finance teams to design and deliver impactful solutions. You will report directly to the Senior Manager, Finance Solutions Excellence & Operations.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Execute process improvement projects to automate and improve finance operations, utilizing technology for scalable solutions.
Analyze and redesign manual finance processes in collaboration with Finance teams, ensuring efficiency and accuracy.
Develop Python scripts and SQL queries for data extraction, validation, reconciliation, and reporting.
Build and prototype AI-driven tools and analytics solutions to support data-informed decision-making.
Work closely with Data Engineering and Analytics teams to integrate solutions with enterprise systems and architecture.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Finance, or a related field, with 2–4 years of relevant experience in process improvement, automation, or technical roles.
Experienced in SQL, Python or Google AppScript (including Cursor management), and experience with relational databases for efficient data handling.
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure, enabling deployment and scaling of AI-driven solutions.
Experienced with Data Structures and Algorithms, with familiarity in Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT-4, Claude, or open-source alternatives, to develop optimized AI and automation solutions.
Experienced analyzing and improving business processes, with project management exposures and collaboration work across teams.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with
Term Life Insurance
and comprehensive
Medical Insurance.
With
GrabFlex,
create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through
Parental
and
Birthday leave
, and give back to your communities through
Love-all-Serve-all (LASA)
volunteering leave
We have a confidential
Grabber Assistance Programme
to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

description:
About the role
We are seeking an experienced System Analyst AS400 (Integration) to join our talented team at PT. SIGMA GLOBAL TEKNOLOGI (SIGMATECH). This full-time role is based in South Jakarta, Jakarta and will play a crucial part in the development and integration of our core business systems.
What you'll be doing :
Analysing business requirements and translating them into technical specifications for system development and integration
Designing, developing and implementing efficient and scalable integration solutions between our AS400 system and other business-critical applications
Providing technical support and troubleshooting for our AS400 system and related integrations
Develop and maintain system architecture for scalable and secure environments.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to to align technical solutions with business needs.
Continuously optimising system performance and identifying areas for improvement
Document technical specifications and reports with clarity and precision.
Skill :
Mandatory programming skills on RPG
Proven experience in system integrations, ideally within financial or payment domains.
Strong command of English (spoken and written).
Expertise in system solution design and optimization.
Proficiency in creating system architecture for complex systems.
Hands-on experience with API development and integration (REST & SOAP).
Familiarity with microservices, architecture and related technologies is preferred.
Solid experience with AS400 (IBM iSeries) operations and development.
Knowledge of impact analysis methodologies for integrated systems.
Excellent collaboration skills across business and technical teams.
Strong documentation and analytical capabilities.
What we're looking for :
Minimum 5 years of experience as a System Analyst or Integration Specialist, preferably with exposure to AS400 systems
Experience in software development project in Banking industry is preferable
Strong understanding of enterprise integration patterns, middleware technologies and API design principles
Proficiency in programming languages such as RPG, CL and SQL, as well as experience with integration tools and platforms
Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills to identify and resolve complex integration challenges
Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team to deliver high-quality solutions
Strong communication skills to effectively translate business requirements into technical solutions
What we offer
At PT. SIGMA GLOBAL TEKNOLOGI (SIGMATECH), we are committed to providing a supportive and nurturing work environment that fosters personal and professional growth. Our employees enjoy a range of benefits, including:
- Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive health insurance and wellness programs
- Opportunities for career advancement and skill development
- Collaborative and inclusive work culture
About us
PT. SIGMA GLOBAL TEKNOLOGI (SIGMATECH) is a leading provider of information and communication technology (ICT) solutions in Indonesia. With a strong focus on innovation and customer-centricity, we have been delivering cutting-edge technology and consulting services to a diverse range of clients across various industries. As a dynamic and fast-growing company, we are committed to empowering our employees and fostering a collaborative work environment that enables them to thrive and contribute to our continued success.
Apply now
to become part of our talented team and help us drive the digital transformation of our clients.

description:
HashMicro is seeking a knowledgeable and client-oriented
Accounting Analyst
to act as a subject matter expert for our ERP accounting module. This role requires a strong foundation in accounting, tax, or audit, and the ability to communicate effectively with clients and internal teams. Ideal for professionals with accounting expertise and a passion for working in the tech or ERP space.
Responsibilities:
Analyze and evaluate client business processes to identify gaps with the ERP system’s accounting functionality.
Provide solutions or workarounds for complex transactions, special accounting cases, and unique client requirements.
Support the project team by offering accounting expertise during system configuration and client discussions.
Ensure ERP system alignment with the latest
Indonesian accounting and tax regulations
.
Stay up to date with local accounting standards and relevant ERP trends.
Act as a liaison between clients and internal teams, ensuring clear communication of accounting needs and system limitations.
Assist ERP Consultants in client meetings when accounting input is needed.
Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders (project, product, and management teams).
Assist Consultant in requirement gathering to client if necessary
Serve as a subject matter expert

Minimum of 1 year of experience
in

, with
proven client-facing experience

, general ledger, and
Indonesian tax rules

.

description:
Responsibilities:
• Assess and monitor risks related to Earned Wage Access (EWA) transactions and customer portfolios.
• Develop and maintain risk scoring models, focusing on employee repayment capacity.
• Monitor usage data to detect abnormal patterns, fraud, or misuse.
• Prepare risk assessment reports and recommend mitigation measures.
• Collaborate with operations, finance, and product teams to design safer workflows.
• Assist in collection process with employers when needed.
Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Risk Management, Statistics, or related field.
• 2+ years experience in risk management, credit assessment, or compliance (preferably in fintech, lending, or payroll financing).
• Strong analytical skills, comfortable with large datasets and Excel/BI tools.
• Good understanding of Indonesian financial regulations and compliance frameworks.
• Attention to detail, problem-solving mindset, and ability to work independently.
• Proficiency in Bahasa Indonesia and English.

description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
‎
‎
Job Description
Position Overview:
The Senior Syslog Server Analyst will play a pivotal role in managing, analyzing, and optimizing enterprise applications and Server Log to meet the business needs of the organization. The ideal candidate will have expertise in troubleshooting, software configuration, application support, and collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure minimum risk exposure of the application by governing and analyzing the log
Key Responsibilities:
Application Support & Maintenance:
Provide day-to-day technical support for enterprise applications, ensuring high availability and performance.
Troubleshoot and resolve application issues, escalating to vendors or development teams as necessary.
Perform regular system maintenance, upgrades, and patches to ensure applications remain up-to-date and secure.
Requirements Analysis & Documentation:
Collaborate with business users and stakeholders to gather and analyze functional requirements for new or existing applications.
Document system requirements, workflows, and configuration changes for future reference and training purposes.
Translate business requirements into technical specifications to guide system configurations and customizations.
System Configuration & Customization:
Configure and customize enterprise applications to meet business needs.
Work with technical teams to implement complex application changes, enhancements, and integrations.
Ensure that applications are aligned with best practices and standards.
Collaboration & Cross-functional Support:
Work closely with IT, development teams, and business units to ensure seamless application performance and functionality.
Provide training and support to end users on application features and best practices.
Participate in project meetings, providing insights and feedback on application capabilities and limitations.
Performance Monitoring , analysis and Reporting:
Monitor application performance and usage metrics to identify areas for improvement.
Proactively recommend improvements to optimize performance and increase user satisfaction.
Generate and maintain reports related to application usage, issues, and performance.
Incident & Problem Management:
Manage incidents and problems related to applications, ensuring timely resolution and minimal disruption to business operations.
Identify recurring issues and propose long-term solutions to prevent future incidents.
Project Management:
Lead or assist in the implementation of new application solutions, upgrades, and migrations.
Ensure that projects are delivered on time and meet the needs of the business.
Collaborate with project managers to ensure proper resource allocation and project scope management.
‎
Requirements
Education:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Experience:
Minimum 5+ years of experience in application support, analysis, or implementation.
Technical Skills:
Strong knowledge of enterprise applications, databases, and system integrations.
Familiarity with common technologies such as SQL, Java, Python, or .NET.
Experience with cloud-based applications (AWS, Azure) is a plus.
Expertise in troubleshooting, debugging, and resolving application-related issues.
Analytical Skills:
Ability to analyze business requirements, translate them into technical solutions, and optimize application performance.
Communication:
Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to work with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Problem-Solving:
Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify root causes and implement solutions.
Certifications:
ITIL, ServiceNow, or relevant certifications are a plus.
‎
If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

description:
Job Responsibilities:
Generally, this position will be support for preparation and complete of accurate and reliable financial plan, managing income, expenses, profitability, cash flow, capex, monitoring working capital and evaluate performance, including support the Treasury Sr. Assistant Manager in preparing weekly banking transactions, payments, and assisting in cash pooling activities. This position also handling such as:
Tracking and monitoring monthly budget realization for Capex and Opex, identifying and flagging variances for each user department.
Compile and prepare monthly financial performance material including analyzing budget realization, highlighting significant variances, supporting analysis, financial reports and ensuring timely & accurate reporting.
Monitor ongoing budget realization, compare with annual plan and forecast, and communicate to user departments regarding any significant variances while considering remaining months for alignment.
Requirements:
Educational Background from Bachelor’s or Master Degree in Finance, Accounting, and Economics
Minimum Experience 3–5 years of relevant experience in forecasting, budgeting and others skill related to Financial Planning & Analysis functions.
Have strong analytical, quantitative, problem-solving skills, detail and good in accuracy.
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, financial modeling.
Experience with ERP and reporting tools (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Hyperion, Power BI) is preferred.
Basic understanding of IFRS with good reporting skills, no tolerance for financial error and highly skilled in use of Excel spreadsheets.
Strong communication skills and excellent command of English.

position: FP&A Senior Analyst (Food, Ads and Merchants)
description:
Business Partnering - be a thought partner to our product leadership, helping to translate business metrics/requirements into clear financial impact/results and vice-versa. Apply business judgment and financial insights to assist Business Units (BU) with decision-making related to new initiatives, products, and business opportunities.
Providing finance leadership with insights into product performance and trends based on financial/business data and on-the-ground interactions with key product stakeholders.
Weekly and monthly performance reporting: report and analyze trends and variances between actuals, forecasts, and plans. Work with stakeholders to design financial dashboards for relevant KPIs.
Data Analytics - work with data sets (large or small) to extract insights and make recommendations to stakeholders
Provide support to your assigned Business Unit for monthly, quarterly, annual, and long-range planning processes (for eg: rolling forecast and annual budgets)
Responsible for regular projections/forecasting of Business Unit performance, providing CFO and Business Unit leadership with an independent view on Business Unit performance.
Adhoc analysis: run analysis to help uncover growth opportunities, cost efficiencies, or ways to further mitigate risks.
About The Team
Being part of the On-Demand Services FP&A team, you will be responsible for regular business reporting, including the preparation of weekly/monthly performance reviews and forecasting. The team is very task-oriented, with the focus on ensuring things get done and problems get solved. There will also be opportunities to work with various teams and learn from the organization.
About GoTo Group
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.
About Gojek
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.
About GoTo Financial
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. description:
🎯
Job Purpose
Support the execution of courier retention programs and conduct data analysis on churn, productivity, and benefit program effectiveness, to ensure a stable and productive courier workforce.
🛠️
Key Responsibilities
1. Data Analysis & Reporting
Collect and process data on courier churn, attendance, performance, and satisfaction.
Prepare daily/weekly/monthly reports on retention and productivity.
2. Retention Program Support
Assist in the execution of retention programs (incentives, benefits, rewards, engagement).
Manage courier data administration related to programs (participants, benefits received, outcomes).
Support courier satisfaction surveys and analyze the results.
3. Business Analyst Support
Conduct basic analysis related to recruitment cost, productivity, and retention program effectiveness.
Provide preliminary data-based recommendations to the supervisor/manager.
Support the monitoring of courier operational KPIs (delivery success rate, drop per hour, etc.).
Coordinate with Recruitment and Operations teams for data collection.
Support communication to couriers regarding retention program information.
📋
Qualifications
Education: Bachelor’s/Diploma in Statistics, Economics, Management, Industrial Engineering, Mathematics, or related fields.
Fresh graduates from the above backgrounds are welcome; preferably with 1–2 years of experience in logistics/e-commerce.
Experience in data processing & reporting is a strong advantage.
Hard Skills
Advanced Excel (pivot, lookup, text/date formulas, simple visualizations).
Basic SQL / BI tools (Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio) is a plus.
Data analysis on churn & productivity.
Basic understanding of courier/logistics operations.
🎯
Expected KPI / Output
Timely and accurate retention & churn reports (>95% accuracy).
Well-documented retention program data.
Assist in the execution of retention programs according to the timeline.

description:
About the RoleAs a Fraud Analyst at Flip, you will play a crucial role in safeguarding our company and our customers from fraudulent activities. Your analytical skills and technical expertise will be vital in identifying and mitigating fraud risks. You will work closely with various departments to implement effective solutions, influence operational practices, and drive strategic decisions. Your contributions will directly impact our ability to provide a secure and trustworthy experience for our users.About FlipWhat You’ll Do:
Identify & analyze patterns, trends and anomalies that indicate fraudulent behavior based on data.
Implement solutions to mitigate fraud/risk through rules, product fixes, third-party integrations, etc.
Influence and improve organizational operations with a focus on increasing fraud/risk awareness.
Contribute to cost-saving initiatives for the company.
What You'll Need:
Fresh graduate from Computer Science, Mathematics, Or any relevant majors are open
Proficiency in SQL and at least one scripting language (ideally Python or R).
Ability to use statistical inference and experimentation to drive actionable recommendations.
Comfort with transforming raw data to build custom data sets when necessary.
Aptitude for selecting the right tools to maximize efficiency, balancing speed and accuracy.
Experience working in a fast-growing start-up environment.
Experience in the fraud detection, data analytics, or related fields within financial service industry is preferred
Ability to design and implement collaborative processes with ops, product, and engineering teams.
Proven track record of acting as a thought partner to product or engineering leaders, driving strategic decisions using data.

description:
Kesempatan
Kami sedang mencari seorang Credit Analyst Officer yang kompeten dan berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di PT MNC Guna Usaha Indonesia di Jakarta Pusat. Sebagai Credit Analyst Officer, Anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam menganalisis risiko kredit, mengevaluasi kelayakan peminjam, dan memberikan rekomendasi untuk pengambilan keputusan. Kandidat yang ideal memiliki pemahaman yang kuat tentang analisis keuangan, kredit, dan manajemen risiko, serta kemampuan untuk mengidentifikasi tren dan pola pada data yang kompleks.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Melakukan analisis kredit yang mendalam, termasuk evaluasi laporan keuangan, rasio keuangan, dan profil risiko peminjam.
Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data terkait kredit, seperti riwayat pembayaran, agunan, dan informasi kredit lainnya.
Membuat rekomendasi kredit yang didukung oleh analisis yang kuat dan mengidentifikasi area-area yang membutuhkan mitigasi risiko.
Memantau portofolio kredit yang ada dan mengidentifikasi tanda-tanda peringatan dini untuk potensi risiko kredit.
Berkontribusi dalam pengembangan dan perbaikan proses kredit dan kebijakan internal perusahaan.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim terkait, seperti Underwriting, Kredit, dan Manajemen Risiko, untuk memastikan proses kredit yang efisien dan efektif.
Keterampilan, Kualifikasi, dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Memiliki gelar sarjana di bidang Keuangan, Akuntansi, atau disiplin ilmu terkait.
Minimal 3 tahun pengalaman sebagai Credit Analyst atau posisi serupa di industri perbankan atau keuangan.
Memahami dengan baik prinsip-prinsip dan praktik analisis kredit, manajemen risiko, dan pengambilan keputusan kredit.
Terampil dalam menganalisis laporan keuangan, menghitung rasio-rasio keuangan, dan mengevaluasi kelayakan kredit.
Pengalaman menggunakan perangkat lunak analitik dan spreadsheet, seperti Microsoft Excel, untuk mengolah dan menganalisis data.
Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik secara lisan maupun tertulis, untuk menyampaikan rekomendasi dan analisis dengan jelas.
Memiliki integritas tinggi dan kemampuan untuk bekerja secara independen maupun dalam tim.
Manfaat Utama
Paket kompensasi yang kompetitif dengan gaji tetap dan bonus kinerja.
Tunjangan kesehatan, asuransi jiwa, dan cuti yang komprehensif.
Kesempatan untuk mengembangkan keterampilan dan pengetahuan melalui pelatihan dan program pengembangan profesional.
Lingkungan kerja yang dinamis dan kolaboratif, dengan kesempatan untuk berkontribusi pada pengembangan produk dan layanan keuangan inovatif.
Budaya perusahaan yang mendukung pertumbuhan karier dan memberikan ruang bagi ide-ide baru.
Tentang PT MNC Guna Usaha Indonesia
PT MNC Guna Usaha Indonesia adalah perusahaan pembiayaan terkemuka di Indonesia yang menawarkan berbagai produk dan layanan keuangan bagi individu dan bisnis. Dengan pengalaman lebih dari 20 tahun di industri, kami berkomitmen untuk menyediakan solusi keuangan yang inovatif dan menyesuaikan dengan kebutuhan pelanggan. Budaya kerja kami yang kolaboratif, berorientasi pada inovasi, dan berpusat pada pelanggan telah memungkinkan kami untuk terus tumbuh dan memberikan nilai bagi para pemangku kepentingan.
Lamar posisi ini sekarang dan bergabunglah dengan tim kami yang dinamis di PT MNC Guna Usaha Indonesia!

description:
Description
:
We are looking for candidates with expertise in both information technology and business administration for the role of Project Analyst. IT Project Analyst are responsible for enhancing thquality of IT products and services, analyzing data to inform business decisions, and finding solutions to business needs, among other duties. IT Project Analyst also responsible to support the Project  Manager and Project Team in the co-ordination, planning and control of the project. With supervision from the Project Manager to ensure the agreed project management methods and standards are implemented throughout the project. The best IT Project Analyst have exceptional interpersonal skills as they need to act as a communication link between the IT and Executive branches.
Responsibilities:
• Liaising between the IT department and the executive branch.
• Understanding strategic business needs and plans for growth.
• Enhancing the quality of IT products and services.
• Analyzing the design of technical systems and business models.
• Utilizing IT data for business insights.
• Analyzing business needs.
• Sourcing and implementing new business technology.
• Finding solutions to business requirements.
• Analyzing data to inform business decisions.
• Create User Story and Flow Documentation.
• Keeping all required project documentation under control, means stored on documentation
tools and accessible by eligible person

• Support monitoring team backlog and progress to achieve target that set by Project Manager

Degree in computer science, or related field.
3+ years in an IT Project Support or Business Analyst.
Excellent problem-solving skills.
Analytical mindset.
Exceptional interpersonal skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Attention to detail.
Excellent documentation skills (ability to create FSD, BRD, Flowchart, use case diagram, etc)
Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.
Communication skills
Able to work under pressure
Having knowledge about Project management

description:
Responsibilities:
Responsibilities: Industry Analysis & Reporting
Conduct in-depth industry and market research using frameworks such as
Porter’s Five Forces, SWOT, PESTEL, and competitor benchmarking
to map structure, key drivers, and risks.
Assess industry attractiveness and investment viability by analyzing entry barriers, bargaining power, substitutes, disruptions, and rivalry.
Perform market sizing, trend analysis, and scenario reviews to quantify potential and guide recommendations.
Prepare accurate, consistent reports aligned with professional standards, presenting findings and data in a clear, decision-oriented format.
Deliver actionable insights and strategic recommendations to support growth strategies, capital allocation, M&A, and market entry decisions.
Work cross-functionally with valuation, financial, legal, and operational teams to gather inputs, validate assumptions, and align with project objectives.
Monitor emerging trends, regulations, and competitor actions, updating analyses proactively to anticipate risks and opportunities.
Ensure compliance with applicable frameworks and regulations (IVS, SPI, OJK/POJK) to enhance report credibility and transparency.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business Administration, or related field.
Full-time commitment to work at Truscel Capital, with flexibility to work beyond standard hours when required.
Fluent in English with strong academic credentials (Minimum GPA 3.5/4.0 or equivalent).
Highly motivated and self-driven to enhance practical skills in conducting comprehensive and detailed industry research, performing advanced market and competitor analyses, and delivering insightful, data-driven reports to support strategic decision-making.
Proven experience in conducting thorough industry and competitive landscape analyses using frameworks such as Porter’s Five Forces, SWOT, and PESTEL.
Proficiency in advanced Excel functions and data analysis tools
Excellent analytical thinking, problem-solving ability, and communication skills to translate complex data into clear recommendations.
We’re looking for passionate talents to build success together.

description:
About the role:
Here comes a new challenge for you who is seeking the next leap in your career growth, being our Business Analyst for our GoFood Strategy Team! For those with strong analytical and problem solving skills and also want to learn about entrepreneurial skills, this role is for you!
In this role, you will lead problem-solving processes and strategy design with focus on improving demand and growth metrics for GoFood. With focus on growing GoFood affluent segments’ demand, you’ll scout for growth opportunities, recommend the product and marketing strategies, and track key growth metrics.
In short, you’ll wake up every day and think of new ways to create values with our newly-different healthy mode for the country’s beloved food-delivery service, how cool is that!
Drive GoFood Affluent segment’s growth and monetization by analyzing user-partner interactions using Gojek’s vast data.
Lead end-to-end strategy execution: develop hypotheses, run A/B tests, craft product, incentive, or campaign strategies, and report key metrics to stakeholders.
Act as a strategic thought partner to your manager and stakeholders, uncovering insights to identify root causes and opportunities.
Collaborate cross-functionally with Business, Product, Marketing, Regional, Research, and Intelligence teams to address user pain points and implement solutions.
Conduct market sizing, competitive benchmarking, impact forecast with local and international counterparts to inform strategy.
2+ years of experience within one or more of the following fields: Business Analyst, Strategy and Planning, Growth.
BS/MS in Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, Business Analytics or equivalent experience
Hypothesis-driven thinking process and comfortable with manipulating large amounts of raw data
Able to uncover the narrative and relationship behind the numbers and communicate the insights to a wider audience
Able to run SQL/Bigquery and have experience in A/B testing is highly desirable.
A proactive and team-player attitude with general project management skills to manage projects and effectively collaborate with stakeholders
Meet the team that has been instrumental in Gojek's growth! We served more than 200 million transactions every month! Also, we strengthen the business group by having deeper knowledge about what are the best recommendations and promotions that are suitable for the customer's needs. From recommending what is the best meal to cheat your diet at 10 pm or offering the latest promotion near your place, we always seek how to extend the product value through our most up-to-date data and marketing solution.
GoFood Growth pod consists of more than 50 persons that consist of different roles , we seek to improve ourselves by learning from everyone. You will get to meet with almost every team there is in Gojek, from the Product Manager, Data Science, to the Operation team. This team is the melting-pot for the Econ, Marketeers, and the Data geeks. While the script running and the campaign launching, we often kill the time by fooling around by imposing ourselves in Among Us or build an alibi as the "Loyal servant of the Arthur" in Avalon (hey, I'm not the minion guys 😃).
Psst, at the moment we are aiming to upgrade our operation through automation and machine learning. If you are interested in solving business problems through the latest cutting-edge data solution, this is the right place for you!
About GoTo Group
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.
About Gojek
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.
About GoTo Financial
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.
GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.
#LI-ONSITE

description:
Responsibilities:
Conduct in-depth investigations of cybersecurity incidents identified through monitoring systems or escalated by L1 analysts.
Analyze logs from various security devices (Firewall, IDS/IPS, EDR, Email Security, Internet Security, UBA, TIP) to identify suspicious patterns or activities.
Document incidents and generate reports detailing threat analysis and security improvement recommendations.
Coordinate with relevant teams to ensure timely and effective response to identified threats.
Willing to work in shift patterns.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, or a related field.
Minimum 2 years of experience in Security Analyst (L2) role.
Strong skills in log analysis and incident investigation using security tools such as SIEM, EDR, XDR, NDR, Firewall.
In-depth knowledge of cyberattack techniques and the MITRE ATT&CK Framework.
Experience working with Threat Intelligence Platforms (TIP).
Certifications (one or more preferred): CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) or OSCP (Offensive Security Certified Professional) / GIAC Security Operations Certified (GSOC) / CHFI (Computer Hacking Forensic Investigator) / or any other certificate related to Security Analyst and Incident Responder.

Job Description Summary : Perform analysis of business process and technical solution during the development, implementation, and run and maintain support of SAP Modules
Job Description : SAP Functional Support
Support business users and project functional team in analysis of business process and solution in the development, implementation, and support of SAP modules. This role uses consulting skills, business knowledge, and SAP solution expertise to effectively integrate SAP technology into the business user’s business environment in order to achieve client expected business results
Identify and analyse business requirements for creative and innovative IT solutions based on business needs and strategic requirements
Design, develop and configure the SAP system based on confirmed user requirements, putting importance on the efficiency and effectiveness according to the project timeline. Translate business requirements into Functional Specification which serves as a basis in the development of the solution, which consists of functional requirements and specifications of customized programs to be developed by SAP Application Development team.
Alignment design and standard to the System Architecture and to collaborate to make sure the system security and control measure are implemented properly in the system
Liaise with external parties to resolve issues where necessary; eg. SAP or System Implementer.
Provide status update on assigned tasks to Project Functional Team of the corresponding module.
Deliverables must adhere to all assurance and compliance requirements of project (i.e. project management framework)
Perform unit test and together with testing team, to support the integration test, as well as coordinate users’ acceptance test for resolved issues.
Prepare training materials and conduct SAP system training to system users.
Coordinate data cleansing activities and perform data upload into SAP system as part of data conversion activities.
Develop SAP authorisation matrix for SAP end users.
Manage relationship with business users to ensure satisfactory SAP Functional support services.
Perform transfer knowledge to SAP Service Desk, Trainer and other System Support
Share best-practices and cross-train other team members in SAP applications skills.
Job Requirement :
Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
At least 3-5 year(s) of working experience as SAP SD (Sales and Distribution) Modules
Having experience in SAP Implementation Full Cycle
Full-Time position(s) available.

Support scenario planning, market entry analysis, and business case development.

Build and maintain financial models for initiatives, new projects, and business plans.

Highly organized with strong attention to detail and accountability.
Comfortable working with tight deadlines and ambiguity, as well as handling multiple priorities.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan
PT BSA Logistics Indonesia, perusahaan logistik terkemuka di Indonesia, mencari Business Development Analyst (Mandarin Speaker) untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. Sebagai Business Development Analyst, Anda akan memainkan peran kunci dalam mendorong pertumbuhan dan ekspansi bisnis perusahaan melalui identifikasi dan pengembangan peluang baru di pasar logistik.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Melakukan riset pasar dan analisis industri logistik untuk mengidentifikasi tren, tantangan, dan peluang baru.
Mengembangkan dan menerapkan strategi bisnis untuk meningkatkan pangsa pasar dan pendapatan perusahaan.
Menjalin dan memelihara hubungan dengan pelanggan dan mitra bisnis potensial, terutama di pasar Mandarin.
Mengembangkan proposal dan presentasi bisnis untuk memenangkan proyek baru.
Memantau dan menganalisis kinerja bisnis, memberikan rekomendasi untuk peningkatan yang berkelanjutan.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim lintas-fungsional untuk mengeksekusi rencana bisnis secara efektif.
Kualifikasi dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Memiliki gelar sarjana di bidang Bisnis, Manajemen, Logistik, atau bidang terkait.
Minimal 3 tahun pengalaman dalam peran terkait analisis bisnis, pengembangan bisnis, atau konsultasi manajemen.
Fasih berbahasa Inggris dan Mandarin, kemampuan berbahasa Jepang atau Korea akan menjadi nilai tambah.
Memiliki pemahaman yang mendalam tentang industri logistik dan tren pasar terkini.
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat, keterampilan presentasi yang baik, dan orientasi pada detail.
Berpikir strategis, proaktif, dan kemampuan beradaptasi dalam lingkungan yang dinamis.
Manfaat yang Ditawarkan
Paket kompensasi yang kompetitif, termasuk gaji yang menarik dan tunjangan perusahaan yang lengkap.
Kesempatan untuk pengembangan karier yang luas di PT BSA Logistics Indonesia.
Lingkungan kerja yang kolaboratif dan mendukung, dengan fokus pada pertumbuhan karyawan.
Program pelatihan dan pengembangan berkelanjutan untuk meningkatkan keterampilan Anda.
Asuransi kesehatan yang komprehensif dan bantuan pensiun.
Tentang PT BSA Logistics Indonesia
PT BSA Logistics Indonesia adalah pemain terkemuka di pasar logistik Indonesia, menyediakan solusi transportasi, pergudangan, dan layanan logistik terintegrasi bagi pelanggan dari berbagai industri. Kami berkomitmen untuk menjadi penyedia logistik terdepan di Indonesia melalui inovasi, efisiensi, dan fokus pada kepuasan pelanggan. Dengan tim profesional kami yang berdedikasi dan lingkungan kerja yang menyenangkan, PT BSA Logistics Indonesia menawarkan peluang luar biasa bagi individu yang ingin membangun karier yang menantang dan menarik di industri logistik.
Tertarik untuk bergabung dengan kami?
Lamar sekarang
dan jadilah bagian dari perjalanan pertumbuhan PT BSA Logistics Indonesia!

position: Technical Analyst for Stocks & Futures Market
description:
Astronacci
is a research and trading education company that focuses on helping traders recover from losses and find opportunities, even during market downturns. Our mission is to empower experienced traders who are struggling with stuck positions or consistent losses in stocks, forex, and crypto. We believe success in trading isn't just about luck—it's about timing, strategy, and the right guidance. At
Astronacci
, we're not just educators, we're market researchers, mentors, and trading partners.
Interested in joining us?
Submit your application through bit.ly/AstronacciHiring-2025 and become a part of our team.
What You Will Do:
Conduct in-depth technical analysis of futures instruments (gold, forex, commodities cryptocurrency)
Produce research and write articles for our financial community
Identify trading opportunities using advanced charting tools and time cycles
Screen and maintain stocks signals based on technical outlooks
Build roadmaps and trading plans
Prepare and deliver educational content to clients
Handle client inquiries clearly and professionally
You’re a Great Fit if You:
Hold certifications (CAT, CTA, CFTe, or CSA preferred)
Have 2+ years of experience as a Futures Analyst, in the capital market (especially securities), or active Trader
Understand macro and microeconomics
Passionate about technical analysis
Comfortable working under pressure and meeting deadlines
Fluent in English (spoken and written)

Lowongan Kerja Sales Analyst Coordinator Semarang Agustus 2025 PT. JIVA AGRICULTURE INDONESIA
Berikut ini adalah kualifikasi yang harus Anda penuhi untuk mendaftar Lowongan Kerja Sales Analyst Coordinator Semarang Agustus 2025 PT. JIVA AGRICULTURE INDONESIA yang dibuka pada 20 Juni 2025 ini:
Key Responsibilities:
Taking care of all branches Feedmill Agents movement, Feedmill agent schedule, GRN monitoring, and offtake delivery monitoring.
Organize data of all customers at the branches through FA information (market insight).
Collecting data for corn production from agronomist and or AC's from all branches.
Weather forecast monitoring throughout Indonesia.
Mapping harvest forecast based on report from agronomist and or AC's.
Field survey for data crosscheck throughout Indonesia (if needed).
Making regular data analyst of supply and demand for better recommendation across branches.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree.
Strong understanding of crop production processes and agricultural supply chains (especially corn, paddy, rice bran, copra, rubber).
Able to communicate in English (speaking & writing).
Proficiency in data analysis and reporting (advance level of Excel & spreadsheet).
Ability to work effectively in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Willingness to be placed in Semarang.

Semarang: Melakukan pulang-pergi kerja dengan jarak yang jauh tanpa mengganggu kinerja atau berencana pindah tempat tinggal sebelum mulai bekerja (Diwajibkan)
Pengalaman:
Data analyst: 1 tahun (Diwajibkan)

Inggris (Diwajibkan)

description:
Requirements:
Educational background in Urban Planning, Real Estate, Finance, Architecture, Economics, or related fields, with a Bachelor's or Master’s degree.
Over 5 years of experience in property research, consultancy, or valuation, including client engagement, project pitching, proposal development, and securing appointments.
Proficient in data analysis, working with complex databases, financial modelling, and property feasibility tools; strong in research, strategic thinking, and report writing.
Skilled in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook); fluent in English with excellent verbal and written communication.
Detail-oriented, self-motivated, disciplined, team player, with a strong passion for data and property markets across sectors.
Responsibility:
Lead and conduct comprehensive market research and feasibility studies, including highest and best use (HBU) analyses and indicative property valuations.
Provide market and financial analysis, providing strategic recommendations based on findings.
Prepare and present proposals, pitch decks, and contracts for research and consultancy assignments.
Collaborate with internal teams and support business development by identifying and engaging with prospective clients/new clients.
Supervise, coach, and provide guidance to junior research and consultancy team members to ensure high-quality project delivery.
Ensure timely and accurate preparation of research reports and consultancy deliverables.
Maintain and update property databased and developing knowledge of property market trends, development regulations, and valuation principles.

description:
The Business Process Improvement Analyst is responsible for analyzing and improving business processes to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and improve quality. The role involves gathering and analyzing data, documenting processes, and collaborating with various departments to implement process improvements
Responsibilities:
Create detailed process maps and diagrams to visualize current processes and identify areas for improvement.
Analyze data related to business processes to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for enhancement.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including operations, IT, and management, to gather requirements and understand process needs.
Recommend and implement process improvements using methodologies such as Lean, Six Sigma, or other best practices.
Foster a culture of continuous improvement by encouraging others
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Management, Industrial Engineering, or a related field.
Proven 3+ experience as a Business Improvement Process Analyst, Continuous Improvement Analyst or in a similar role.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in process mapping tools (e.g., Visio, Lucidchart) and data analysis software (e.g., Excel, SQL).
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Familiarity with Lean, Six Sigma, or other process improvement methodologies is a plus.

description:
Collaborate with marketing teams to understand data needs.
Partner with Sales and Operation Analyst to link marketing impact with sales
Collaborate with Data Analyst to collect, clean and consolidate marketing data from multiple sources, including digital platforms (Google Ads, Meta Ads, e-commerce, website analytics, CRM), offline campaigns (in-store activations, events, traditional media) and external data (market research, survey).
Develop dashboards and performance reports that track campaign KPIs, including but not limited to, Net Marketing Attributed Revenue, ROI, ROAS, conversion metrics, NPS, Share of Voice, Market Share and competitive landscape, Brand Awareness, etc.
Integrate marketing KPIs into broader performance dashboards.
Evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, promotions, and pricing strategies.
Support segmentation and targeting strategies using data-driven insights.
Deliver recurring reports to marketing teams in a clear and actionable format.
Highlight anomalies, growth opportunities, and areas for improvement in business reviews.
Track industry trends, competitor activities, and consumer behavior. Benchmark marketing performance against industry trends and competitors where possible.
Compile industry reports and insights to support planning and campaign development.
Support marketing in budget allocation and optimization decisions through data-driven recommendations.
Qualification
Bachelor’s degree in Business Analytics, Marketing, Statistics, or a related field;
Has at least 1–3 years of experience in marketing analytics, market research, digital marketing performance analysis, business intelligence, or a similar role (experience at top-tier market research firms, retail, or FMCG preferred).
Proficiency in data visualization tools (Power BI, or equivalent), excel and storytelling with data.
Experience in digital analytics platforms (marketplace dashboards, Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, etc.)
Familiarity with sales funnels, marketing KPIs and customer behavior metrics.
Knowledge in SQL or Python/R data analysis is a plus.
Ability to synthesize both structured and unstructured data sources.
Strong analytical, critical thinking, and storytelling skills.
Strong communication skills and ability to explain complex findings in a simple way.
Detail-oriented, curious, and proactive in identifying business questions.

description:
Business Analyst – IT Department (Retail Sector)
Position Summary
We are seeking a skilled Business Analyst to bridge the gap between business needs and technology solutions. The ideal candidate will work closely with stakeholders across departments to analyze processes, gather requirements, and support the development and optimization of systems including SAP, POS, and in-house applications.
Key Responsibilities
Requirements Gathering
: Collaborate with business units to understand their needs and translate them into functional specifications.
Process Analysis & Improvement
: Analyze current business processes and identify areas for improvement or automation.
System Integration
: Work with IT teams to ensure seamless integration between SAP, POS, and other internal systems.
Documentation
: Create clear and comprehensive documentation including business requirements, process flows, use cases, and user stories.
Stakeholder Communication
: Act as a liaison between business users and technical teams, ensuring alignment and understanding.
Testing & Validation
: Support UAT (User Acceptance Testing), validate solutions against requirements, and ensure quality delivery.
Change Management
: Assist in managing change initiatives, including training and support for end-users.
Data Analysis
: Use data to support decision-making and provide insights into business performance.
Required Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems or Accounting or related field.
2 years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in retail or consumer goods.
Experience working with
in-house/custom applications
and understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC).
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
Understanding of
SAP modules
(e.g., MM, SD, FICO) and
POS systems
.
Proficiency in tools like
JIRA, Confluence, Visio
, and
Excel
.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with
Agile/Scrum methodologies
.
Familiarity with
data visualization tools
(e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
Knowledge of
retail operations
, inventory management, and customer engagement systems.
Basic understanding of
SQL
or other query languages.
Soft Skills
Strong interpersonal skills and stakeholder management.
Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality work.
Adaptability and willingness to learn new systems and processes.

description:
Job Description:
Financial Modeling:
- Develop and maintain financial models to support forecasting, budgeting, and decision-making processes.
- Perform scenario analysis to assess the impact of different variables on financial outcomes.
Reporting and Visualization:
- Prepare and present financial reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate key insights to stakeholders.
- Utilize tools such as Excel, Tableau, Power BI or other data visualization platforms.
Budgeting and Forecasting:
- Assist in the budgeting and forecasting processes by providing data-driven insights and recommendations.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align financial goals with overall business objectives.
Data Collection and Cleaning:
- Gather financial data from various sources, including internal databases, external sources, and financial statements.
- Clean, validate, and organize data to ensure accuracy and reliability.
Data Analysis:
- Conduct quantitative analysis on financial data to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
- Use statistical methods and financial models to analyze and interpret data.
Collaboration:
- Work closely with finance teams, business analysts, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and -provide analytical support.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Finance & Accounting or a related field.
Experience from Public Accounting Firm would be an advantage
5+ years exposure handled financial analysis
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to analyze complex financial data.
Proficient in using financial modeling tools, databases, and data visualization software (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau).
In-depth understanding of financial principles, accounting practices
Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey complex financial information to non-technical stakeholders.
High attention to detail and accuracy in working with financial data.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with the Retail industry is more beneficial.
Willing to be located in Lippo Karawaci
If you’re match with the qualifications & ready for the challenges, turn yourself in !!!

description:
We have supported many companies to grow through digital transformation. Our integrated business software have helped companies to run their business process more efficiently, while our digital marketing team have increased the growth of their brands and most importantly, their revenue.
And now, we wanted to focus on doing it on a bigger scale. Helping many more companies to grow faster. Therefore, we are currently looking for a highly motivated, result oriented, persistent and passionate professional to join our team to fill the below position :
System Analyst
Job Descriptions :
Act as a bridge between clients and the internal web development team to gather, analyze, and understand business needs, ensuring effective communication and project alignment.
Create detailed specifications and documentation based on client requirements to guide system development and enhancements.
Evaluate existing business processes, identify inefficiencies, and recommend optimized solutions to improve productivity and system performance.
Assist in the development, testing, and deployment of new systems or enhancements, ensuring they meet client business needs.
Provide training and support to clients to ensure the successful adoption of new systems and processes.
Act as the main point of contact (PIC) for clients to address software-related issues, coordinate with the development team, and ensure timely resolutions.
Requirements :
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Min. 2 years of experience in system analysis, business analysis, or software development.
Detail oriented
Understanding to create a blueprint system.
Good communication (verbal and written) skills.
Fluent with Microsoft Office (excel, word and powerpoint). Have skill with SQL is a plus.
Ability to manage relationships with client and understand their needs
Experience in implementing or upgrading business systems.

description:
We are looking for an experienced System Analyst to join our team. If you have excellent programming skills and a passion for developing applications or improving existing ones, we would like to meet you. As a System Analyst, you’ll work closely with our engineers to ensure system consistency and improve user experience. System Analyst roles and responsibilities include:
Perform design an upgrades of information system to meet the business and client needs.
Provide documentation of all processes as needed.
Implement best practices for supportability
Coordinate and communicate effectively with the internal developer team.
PT Metrodata Electronics, Tbk (Digital Solution Provider & Technology Innovator) would like to invite you to be part of the company to develop yourself and your skills. If you are:
Bachelor's Degree Computer Science/Information Technology
At least 2 year of working experience as System Analyst
Have deep knowledge in the field of project development life cycle (Agile or Iterative)
Have experience in analyzing and designing business processes using data flow diagrams and UML
Have experience in making FSD, Use Case, ERD, ERPNext
Have deep knowledge in RDBMS but not limited to SQL Server.
This position will be located in Jakarta. If you meet the requirement we needed, let’s apply for the following open positions. Metrodata not just offer for the job, we offer you for brighter career future.

description:
Line of Service
Internal Firm Services
Industry/Sector
Not Applicable
Specialism
IFS - Knowledge Management
Management Level
Associate
Job Description & Summary
PwC Indonesia is an inclusive and equal-opportunity employer that does not discriminate based on physical disabilities, gender, race, religion, or age. Your application will be treated fairly and assessed solely based on job requirements and competencies.
At PwC, our people in business services and support focus on providing efficient and effective administrative support to enable smooth operations within the organisation. This includes managing schedules, coordinating meetings, and handling confidential information.
In knowledge management at PwC, you will focus on the organisation, creation, and dissemination of knowledge and information within the organisation. Your work will involve developing and implementing knowledge management strategies, processes, and tools to capture, store, and share knowledge effectively. You will collaborate with various teams to identify knowledge gaps, facilitate knowledge sharing, and promote industry leading practices to enhance organisational learning and decision-making.
As an Associate Research Analyst in the Markets - Knowledge Management & Insights team, you will conduct in-depth research and analysis to keep our organisation stay updated with market trends. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather, analyse, and interpret data, providing insights and updates on market developments. Your role is essential in understanding market trends, the competitive landscape, and internal client needs.
Prepare and present research findings to senior management and other stakeholders.
Monitor and analyse competitor activities and market developments to support business strategies.
Conduct thorough desktop research and analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and threats in the market.
Gather and interpret data from various sources, including industry reports, market surveys, and internal databases.
Assist in developing and implementing knowledge management practices to disseminate market insights effectively.
Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to analyse survey data results and support thought leadership/publication development.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of research findings, data sources, and analysis processes.
Requirements :
Minimum bachelor's degree in economics, accounting, management, or other relevant fields from a top-tier university with a minimum GPA of 3.0.
Preferably 2 to 3 (maximum) years of working experience in research activities.
Strong analytical skills with a passion for working with numbers and data.
Proficient in data analysis and reporting using spreadsheets, Power BI (preferable), and other relevant tools.
Proficient in prompting with GenAI (e.g., Copilot, ChatGPT, Gemini, etc.) to support research findings and content development for insights.
Ability to write concise analyses based on data, qualitative discussions, desktop research, and reports for thought leadership or publication development.
Ability to analyse data and effectively convert it into bar charts, line charts, and other graphical representations.
Strong knowledge of research methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Ability to learn and apply benchmarking techniques for research database platforms.
Strong ability to handle multiple tasks and projects with attention to detail.
Fast learner, proficient in both written and spoken English.
Able to work hybrid WFO and WFH as scheduled – committed person and proactive team player.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Able to work well with various other team members or business units with multiple backgrounds.
Committed to meeting deadlines and able to find resolutions and win-win solutions under tight deadlines.
Able to work independently in preparing or managing data for various types of industries to support business activities and meet required deadlines.
Diligently attends to details, pursues quality in accomplishing tasks, and maintains a high level of accuracy.
Strong organisational skills and excellent time management.
Focused, output-driven, able to prioritise workloads.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, maintaining flexibility and performing at a high level when faced with time constraints.
Ability to adapt to changing priorities and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
Fast learner and able to share knowledge with others.
Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.
Professionalism, integrity, and ethical conduct.
Education
(if blank, degree and/or field of study not specified)
Degrees/Field of Study required:Degrees/Field of Study preferred: Bachelor Degree - Management, Bachelor Degree - Economics, Bachelor Degree - Accounting
Certifications
(if blank, certifications not specified)
Required Skills
Optional Skills
Accepting Feedback, Accepting Feedback, Active Listening, Business Writing, Communication, Communications Management, Conducting Research, Content Audit, Content Development, Content Editing, Content Management, Contract Management, Data Analysis, Database Administration, Data-Driven Insights, Data Reporting, Data Visualization, Developing Policies and Guidelines, Developing Presentations, Digital Research, Documentation Administration, Electronic Document Management Systems (EDMS), Emotional Regulation, Empathy, Enterprise Data Management (EDM) {+ 32 more}
Desired Languages
(If blank, desired languages not specified)
Travel Requirements
Up to 20%
Available for Work Visa Sponsorship?
No
Government Clearance Required?
No
Job Posting End Date

description:
Job Title: Analytics Report Department (ARD)
Type:
Internship
Compensation:
Starting at $50/month
About City Explorer
City Explorer is a global livestreaming platform that brings real-time city experiences to audiences worldwide. Our Explorers stream authentic moments — from cultural events to daily life — while we work to maximize their reach through strategic promotion and data-driven insights.
Role Overview
We are seeking a dedicated intern for our
Analytics Report Department (ARD)
. This role is central to tracking and reporting on Explorer performance. By monitoring analytics across multiple sources and producing daily performance reports, you’ll help guide our investment decisions in Explorer promotion.
Responsibilities
Monitor and analyze performance data from:
City Explorer’s internal analytics page
Google Analytics dashboard
Ongoing livestreams across the platform
Produce a
daily report
summarizing:
Viewer numbers
Audience demographics (location, age, etc.)
Watch time and engagement levels
Identify performance trends and provide insights to support decision-making.
Collaborate with the team to ensure Explorer promotion budgets are adjusted based on performance.
Requirements
Strong English proficiency (C1–C2 level).
Attention to detail and accuracy in data reporting.
Ability to interpret analytics and summarize them clearly.
Reliable internet connection and access to a computer.
Familiarity with Google Analytics or similar tools is a plus (training can be provided).
What We Offer
Monthly stipend of
$50
(with potential for increased responsibilities based on performance).
Hands-on experience in data reporting and performance analytics.
Opportunity to contribute directly to strategic investment decisions in livestream promotion
