description:
Role Overview
We are seeking a highly motivated Strategy & Operations Analyst to join our growing healthcare-focused team. This role is designed for ambitious early-career professionals who want to gain exposure to strategic problem-solving, research, and operational excellence, similar to what you would experience at a top consulting firm.
You will report directly to the Head of Sales & Marketing and will play a critical role in supporting both strategic and day-to-day operational needs—ranging from market research to performance tracking to project execution. This is a unique opportunity to accelerate your career through direct coaching and mentorship from an ex-Senior Manager at Bain & Company, combined with hands-on exposure to the dynamic healthcare industry.
Key Responsibilities
- Conduct research on the healthcare industry, market trends, competitor strategies, policy changes, and customer insights.
- Act as a right hand to the Head of Sales & Marketing, helping with analyses, presentations, project follow-ups, and ad-hoc tasks.
- Break down complex business challenges into structured problem statements, develop hypotheses, and validate with data.
- Assist in implementing initiatives across sales, marketing, supply chain, and distribution to improve efficiency and performance.
- Prepare reports, dashboards, and presentations that translate research and analysis into actionable insights.
Qualifications
- Bachelor’s degree in Business, Economics, Healthcare Management, Engineering, or related field.
- Strong research and analytical skills, with the ability to synthesize complex data into clear insights.
- Excellent problem-structuring, Excel, and PowerPoint skills.
- Strong communication skills (verbal and written).
- Curious, adaptable, and eager to learn—comfortable working on both strategic and ad-hoc operational tasks.
- Experience in healthcare, consulting, finance, or corporate strategy is a plus but not required.
What We Offer
- Consulting-like Coaching: Mentorship from an ex-Bain Senior Manager, including training and development program.
- Healthcare Industry Exposure: Deep dive into one of the fastest-growing and most impactful sectors.
- High-Impact Work: Opportunity to directly support strategic decisions and execution.
- Career Development: Grooming into future leadership roles through rotational programs across functions.
- Dynamic Environment: Flexible role with wide exposure, directly supporting senior leadership.

description:
L1 Analysts are the first point of contact in the SOC, monitoring multiple client environments, triaging alerts, and escalating as needed. This role demands attention to detail, adherence to SLAs, and clear communication with both internal teams and clients.
Key Responsibilities:
Monitor SIEM, EDR, IDS/IPS, firewall, and cloud security alerts across multiple client environments.
Perform
initial triage
: validate alerts, determine severity, check for false positives, and enrich with contextual data.
Escalate verified security incidents to L2 analysts following client-specific SOPs.
Create and maintain incident tickets in the MSSP case management system.
Adhere to client-specific SLAs for detection and escalation.
Support regular reporting and dashboard updates for clients.
Requirements:
Basic understanding of networking (TCP/IP, DNS, VPN, HTTP) and cybersecurity concepts.
Familiarity with at least one SIEM platform (e.g., Wazuh, Splunk, Sentinel, QRadar).
Willingness to work in a 24/7 SOC shift rotation.
Good written and verbal communication, including client-facing updates.
Preferred Skills:
Entry-level security certification (Security+, CC, SSCP).
Awareness of MITRE ATT&CK and basic threat hunting concepts.
Basic scripting for automation (Python, Bash, PowerShell).
content: soc analyst – level 1 (l1) bogor python jurusan lainnya other l1 analysts are the first point of contact in the soc, monitoring multiple client environments, triaging alerts, and escalating as needed. this role demands attention to detail, adherence to slas, and clear communication with both internal teams and clients. key responsibilities: monitor siem, edr, ids/ips, firewall, and cloud security alerts across multiple client environments. perform initial triage : validate alerts, determine severity, check for false positives, and enrich with contextual data. escalate verified security incidents to l2 analysts following client-specific sops. create and maintain incident tickets in the mssp case management system. adhere to client-specific slas for detection and escalation. support regular reporting and dashboard updates for clients. requirements: basic understanding of networking (tcp/ip, dns, vpn, http) and cybersecurity concepts. familiarity with at least one siem platform (e.g., wazuh, splunk, sentinel, qradar). willingness to work in a 24/7 soc shift rotation. good written and verbal communication, including client-facing updates. preferred skills: entry-level security certification (security+, cc, sscp). awareness of mitre att&ck and basic threat hunting concepts. basic scripting for automation (python, bash, powershell).

description:
Job Description Summary:
The SAP Basis Analyst performs the role of maintaining the day-to-day operations of the SAP Environment (Monitoring, Configuring, tuning, troubleshooting, upgrade, transports).
Job Description:
Monitors the availability of all SAP instances and application servers to ensure all SAP systems runs within the agreed SLA (availability, performance and security)
Review operating system logs, system logs, and error logs to identify and troubleshoot issues.
Develop and maintain continual improvement plans
Checks the status and load of SAP work processes to identify performance bottlenecks
Monitoring and executing projects to ensure delivery is according to scope, budget and timeline
Managing stakeholders and 3rd parties to ensure effective and efficient delivery of services
Responsible for project administration, execution and production of project documentation/plans
Monitor and manage background jobs, ensuring they run as scheduled and troubleshoot any issues
Acknowledgement / Cleaning of alert logs
Cleaning/ archiving of transport logs/ import queues
Job Requirements:
Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science/Information Technology, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent
At least 3 year(s) of working experience as SAP Basis
Willing to be located in Head Office Jakarta
"Our company has never levied any fees for the recruitment process nor has it required to order tickets and accommodation through a certain travel agent or certain person"

description:
KLASIFIKASI
Familiar dengan Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Mampu melakukan pengelolaan product backlog untuk pengembangan produk yang akan di kembangkan
Memiliki pengetahuan tentang database dan datawarehouse
Mahir menggunakan tools Ms. Visio atau semacamnya.
Lulusan S1 SI / TI
Usia 24-35 Tahun
Memiliki Pengalaman 3-4 Tahun di Business Analyst
DESKRIPSI PEKERJAAN:
Melakukan review keseluruhan dokumen UR (User Requirement) yang telah dibuat oleh tim product yang akan masuk ke dalam proses pengembangan aplikasi dan membuat (Functional Specification Document) untuk membantu menterjemahkan kebutuhan user lebih detail secara fungsional mulai dari ruang lingkup, fitur yang diharapkan, fungsionalitas yang diperlukan dan potensi kendala kepada tim Engineer.
Menyusun UR (User Requirement) non-product related yang akan masuk ke dalam proses pengembangan aplikasi dan membuat (Functional Specification Document) untuk membantu menerjemahkan kebutuhan user lebih detail secara fungsional mulai dari ruang lingkup, fitur yang diharapkan, fungsionalitas yang diperlukan dan potensi kendala kepada tim Engineer.
Memonitor proses development mulai dari penyerahan dokumen UR (User Requirement) ke tim Engineering sampai dengan aplikasi go-live.
Memonitor kelengkapan seluruh dokumen pengembangan yang meliputi: UR (User Requirement), FSD (Functional Specification Document) dan TRD (Technical Requirement Document) agar akurat dan update untuk pengembangan di versi selanjutnya.
Melakukan pemetaan, analisa dan identifikasi bisnis proses dari seluruh proses (aktivitas) yang berjalan di operasional Perusahaan, termasuk juga untuk proses pembuatan aplikasi maupun pengembangan fitur yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan bisnis.
Melakukan evaluasi dan mengusulkan pengembangan terhadap business process, baik yang berupa integrasi, automation, hal keamanan (resiko yang lebih baik), dsb.
Memfasilitasi komunikasi dan koordinasi dengan user terkait pengembangan dan penggunaan aplikasi untuk menjaga standar dari semua sistem yang dikembangkan dapat digunakan sesuai rancangan.
Mendetailkan kebutuhan product owner maupun user tertentu mengenai feature yang akan di kembangkan agar lebih jelas dan mudah dipahami oleh team engineer mengenai goals yang ingin dicapai.
Melakukan grooming untuk menjelaskan product requirement yang sudah difinalkan ke engineer, serta juga untuk bisa mendapatkan feedback dan kebutuhan teknis untuk proses development
Membuat dokumentasi terkait pengembangan aplikasi secara lengkap dan detail.
Memfasilitasi dan membantu agenda scrum serta memastikan proses development sesuai dengan timeline yang sudah direncanakan
Mengerjakan program-program improvement yang inovatif yang sejalan dengan kebutuhan perusahaan serta untuk meningkatkan produktivitas dan hasil di operasional.
Berkoordinasi dengan Engineer, QA maupun pihak yang terkait untuk memastikan root cuase setiap bugs atau issues yang terjadi serta merencanakan solusi permanen agar tidak terjadi lagi.

position: Commercial Intelligence Business Analyst - Jakarta - Hybrid(ID: 683742)
description:
Position: Commercial Intelligence Business Analyst
Location: Jakarta
Role Summary & Responsibility:
1. Access management and accounts creation – Support APAC and local teams on user account setup and access management within GEMINI system, utilizing both GEMINI and ServiceNow tool.
2. Business Analysis & Requirement Gathering – Engage with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements, translating them into technical deliverables to enhance the GEMINI system and support ongoing projects.
3. Data Source Assessment – Evaluate and analyze data from various systems (SAP, SuccessFactors, AWS Data Warehouse, etc.) based on business requirements, ensuring the right data is leveraged for reporting and analysis.
4. Data Audits & Reconciliation – Perform regular audits of data from various sources within APAC, ensuring data accuracy through reconciliation between final reports and source systems.
5. Data Quality Maintenance – Monitor data quality through feedback and metrics, addressing issues and implementing corrections as needed.
6. Data Usage & Insights – Share best practices for data usage across teams and provide actionable insights to improve decision-making.
7. Compliance & Security – Ensure data compliance and security, safeguarding sensitive information and providing regulatory guidance.
8. Industry Knowledge – Experience with enterprise ERP systems such as SAP, familiarity with supply chain & ordering management process is a strong plus.
Requirement:
· Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics, or a related field.
· Minimum 3–5 years of experience in data management, analytics, or business analysis.
· Open for Fresh graduates from a reputable university.
· Strong analytical skills: trend detection, anomaly identification, problem-solving.
· Strong communication skills with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
· Knowledge in Order & Inventory Management or Credit & Access Management.
· Experience in Sales Operations is an advantage.
· Attention to detail.
· Comfortable working in international, multilingual environments.
· Having good knowledge of the operation, warehouse, and supply chain.
· Fluent in English, both oral and written.

description:
About the role :
Phintraco Group is seeking a talented
Research Analyst
to join our dynamic Research and Education Team in Jakarta. As a Research Analyst, you will play a crucial role in supporting our strategic advisory services by conducting in-depth market research, data analysis, and insights generation. This full-time position offers the opportunity to work on high-profile projects across various industries and contribute to the company's continued growth and success.
What you'll be doing :
Conducting comprehensive market research to gather data and information on industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences.
Performing quantitative and qualitative data analysis to identify key insights and trends that inform strategic recommendations.
Preparing well-structured and visually engaging reports, presentations, and other deliverables to communicate research findings to clients.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to support the development of strategic solutions and implementation plans.
Staying up-to-date with the latest industry developments, market dynamics, and economic factors to provide valuable advisory services.
Contributing to the continuous improvement of research methodologies and analytical tools within the team
What we're looking for :
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field, such as economics or finance.
1-3 years of experience in a research or consulting role, preferably in a professional services or consulting environment.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to draw actionable insights from complex data sets.
Proficiency in data analysis tools and software, such as Excel, PowerPoint, and SQL.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate technical information into compelling narratives.
Keen interest in understanding market dynamics and staying up-to-date with industry trends.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and contribute to cross-functional projects.

description:
Join Us and Shape the Future of Smarter Mining!
Are you an innovative thinker, skilled in building networks, and ready to take on challenges?
This is your chance to join a research-based technology company driving innovation to support mining operations in Indonesia.
Since 2022, we have developed solutions that integrate technology, data, and research to enhance efficiency, safety, and sustainability in the mining sector with over than 20+ product services, 1500+ devices installed, also 15+ contractor and international partners.
Our vision is to become Indonesia’s leading mining technology platform by building an intelligent and integrated digital mining operating system that empowers a more efficient, safe, and sustainable industry. We are now seeking exceptional talent ready to make a real impact in this transformation.
As a Strategic Analyst in Minergo,  YOU ARE SHAPING THE FUTURE OF MINING TECHNOLOGY

Strong understanding of mining industry processes (Fleet Management, Hauling Systems, etc. is a plus).
Excellent analytical, communication, and negotiation skills.

Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple urgent feature requests.
Key Responsibilities
Identify and analyze business requirements from stakeholders.
Facilitate communication between clients, stakeholders, and project teams to manage expectations and resolve gaps.
Provide data-driven insights to support managerial decision-making.
Deliver strategic reports to management, including risk analysis and improvement recommendations.
Manage and prioritize feature backlogs with the Developer Squad Leader and Management to ensure project objectives are met.
Coordinate with Developer Squads and operational teams to ensure feature implementation meets specifications.
Assist in preparing project progress reports related to requirements and features.

Sept, 12th 2025

description:
About the role
We are seeking an experienced Inventory Analyst to join our team at PT Berkah Bekasi Ops' in Depok, West Java. This full-time role will be responsible for providing valuable data analysis and reporting to optimise our inventory management processes and drive operational efficiencies.
What you'll be doing
Analyse inventory data and identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement
Prepare regular reports and dashboards to track inventory levels, stock turnover, and other key metrics
Collaborate with the operations team to implement strategies to optimise inventory and minimise waste
Identify and resolve inventory discrepancies and communicate findings to the relevant stakeholders
Provide recommendations for inventory management process improvements
Assist with special projects and ad-hoc data requests as needed
What we're looking for
Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as Finance, Accounting, or Supply Chain Management
Minimum 3 years of experience in an inventory analysis or reporting role, preferably within the manufacturing or logistics industry
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret data and draw meaningful insights
Proficient in using data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, and data visualisation software
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey findings to cross-functional teams

description:
About the Role
We are seeking a Finance System Analyst Manager to act as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) and a key liaison between Finance & Accounting and IT. This role is responsible for driving financial system digitalization, managing end-to-end system projects, and ensuring alignment with corporate strategy and compliance standards.
Key Responsibilities:
Analyze finance & accounting business needs and identify digitalization opportunities.
Develop and execute a financial system roadmap aligned with corporate strategy.
Manage the full project lifecycle: initiation, planning, development, implementation, and evaluation.
Conduct business process mapping, gap analysis, and system integration design.
Define requirements and testing criteria, and ensure successful UAT delivery.
Collaborate with stakeholders across Finance, IT, and management for requirements and reporting.
Monitor system performance, ensure compliance, and drive continuous improvement.
Document best practices and SOPs, and conduct knowledge transfer to users and support teams.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Information Systems, or a related field.
Proven experience in finance system analysis, project management, or digital transformation.
Strong understanding of financial processes, ERP/financial systems, and IT collaboration.
Excellent ms office, communication, analytical, and stakeholder management skills.
Minimum 4 years of work experience at the managerial level in finance, accounting, or IT.
Willing to work on-site & full-time at Titan Center, Bintaro, South Tangerang.

description:
IT Business Analyst (Banking, Loan Specialist)
Range Gross Salary: IDR 7.500.000 - IDR 8.500.000
location: Jakarta Pusat
Experience: 2-3 years
1. Tanggung Jawab Utama
Analisis Kebutuhan Bisnis Pinjaman/Loan
: Mengidentifikasi, menganalisis, dan mendokumentasikan kebutuhan bisnis khususnya pada proses loan/pinjaman, mulai dari pengajuan, verifikasi, penilaian risiko, persetujuan, hingga pencairan.
Kolaborasi dengan Stakeholder
: Menjadi penghubung antara tim kredit, pengembang IT, desainer UI/UX, serta unit terkait lainnya untuk memastikan solusi digital sesuai kebutuhan bisnis loan.
Dukungan Proyek Loan Digital
: Mendukung pengembangan, pengujian, dan implementasi fitur-fitur kredit pada aplikasi digital banking (mobile/web).
Peningkatan UI/UX untuk Kredit
: Mengusulkan dan mendukung perancangan pengalaman pengguna (UX) dan antarmuka (UI) yang memudahkan nasabah dalam mengajukan dan mengelola pinjaman.
Dokumentasi Spesifik Loan
: Membuat dan memelihara dokumen spesifikasi bisnis, user story, flowchart, serta prototipe terkait alur kredit yang jelas dan mudah dipahami.
Pengujian & Validasi
: Melakukan UAT (User Acceptance Test) untuk memastikan sistem kredit berjalan sesuai regulasi, kebutuhan bisnis, dan standar kualitas.
Pemantauan Tren Kredit Digital
: Mengikuti perkembangan tren loan digital, termasuk integrasi dengan fintech atau scoring platform.
2. Kualifikasi
Pengalaman kerja
2–3 tahun
sebagai Business Analyst, dengan
fokus utama di proses loan/pinjaman
dalam industri perbankan.
Berpengalaman dalam pembuatan dokumen seperti
BRD, FSD, TSD
dan lain-lain.
Pemahaman mendalam tentang siklus kredit:
pengajuan, analisis kredit, scoring, persetujuan, pencairan, dan monitoring
.
Berpengalaman dalam mendukung implementasi
digital channel loan (mobile/web)
.
Pengetahuan yang baik mengenai
UI/UX untuk aplikasi kredit
dengan tools seperti
Figma, Adobe XD, atau Sketch
..
Familiar dengan metodologi
Agile/Scrum
serta tools pendukung (JIRA, Trello).
Komunikasi yang efektif untuk menjembatani kebutuhan bisnis loan dengan tim teknis.
3. Kompetensi Tambahan
Pengalaman dalam
integrasi API
dengan sistem pihak ketiga, seperti credit scoring, fintech, atau BI Checking.
Pengetahuan mengenai regulasi kredit dan keamanan data (
OJK, BI, GDPR
).
Pengalaman bekerja pada proyek
loan origination system (LOS)
atau
loan management system (LMS)
.
Kemampuan analisis data lanjutan dengan
SQL atau Python
(nilai tambah).
4. Lingkup Kerja
Berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembang, QA, dan desainer dalam merancang solusi digital khusus kredit/pinjaman.
Melakukan analisis proses bisnis kredit untuk menemukan peluang digitalisasi dan otomasi.
Memberikan laporan berkala kepada manajemen mengenai kemajuan proyek loan digital channel.
Mendukung pelatihan end-user dan membuat dokumentasi alur kerja sistem kredit.
Keunggulan Posisi
Posisi ini memberikan kesempatan untuk terlibat langsung dalam
transformasi digital kredit/pinjaman
di industri perbankan, dengan fokus pada efisiensi proses, keamanan, dan peningkatan pengalaman nasabah. Kandidat akan menjadi bagian penting dalam mengembangkan solusi loan digital yang inovatif dan sesuai regulasi.

description:

Conduct daily reviews and make credit decisions for all incoming applications in the pipeline based on applicable credit policies and SOP.

Care about doing an excellent job and exceeding expectations with the quality of what you do in fast-paced environment
Solid oral and written communication skills and ability to communicate the credit recommendation properly backed up with strong judgement.

description:
PURPOSE OF JOB
Bridge between the IT department and the business side of an organization by analyzing business processes, identifying opportunities for improvement, and translating those business needs into technical requirements for IT teams/developers.
Coordinating the implementation, starting from planning, implementing, and until post-implementation review.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Requirements Gathering and Analysis
. Works closely with various stakeholders—from employees to executives—to understand their needs and identify problems or inefficiencies in existing systems. Document these needs in a clear and detailed manner that both technical and non-technical teams can understand.
Solution Design and Recommendation
. Propose and design IT solutions. This can involve recommending new software, hardware, system upgrades, or simply streamlining current processes and lifting constraints. Conduct feasibility studies and cost-benefit analyses to ensure that the proposed solution "what is built" aligns with the company's budget and long-term strategy "what to build".
Testing and Implementation
. Key role in the testing phase, leading user acceptance testing (UAT) to ensure that the new IT solution meets the defined business needs and functions as intended. Assist with implementation and provide training or support to end-users.
Process Improvement
. Continually seek ways to optimize business operations. By analyzing data and workflows, identify opportunities to enhance efficiency, productivity, and profitability through the effective use of technology.
Liaison and Communication
. As the primary communication link, explain complex technical concepts to business stakeholders and, conversely, articulate business goals and requirements to developers, engineers, and other IT professionals.
REQUIREMENT
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Business, or a related field
At least 3 years of experience as an IT Business Analyst,
Data Analysis & Visualization
. Able to work with data to support their findings. This includes SQL for querying databases, Microsoft Excel for data analysis, and data visualization tools like Tableau for presenting insights in an easy-to-understand manner
Requirements Management Tools.
Familiarity with project management and requirements management software like Jira, Confluence, or Trello for documenting, tracking, and prioritizing requirements.
Business Process Modeling.
The ability to visually map out business processes using tools like Microsoft Visio and methodologies like BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation).
Understanding of Software Development Life Cycles (SDLCs).
Understands how IT projects are built and delivered, including knowledge of different methodologies like Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall.
Technical Documentation.
The ability to write clear, concise, and comprehensive technical documentation, such as Business Requirements Documents (BRDs) and functional specifications.
Basic Understanding of Systems and Databases
. Have a conceptual understanding of how IT systems are architected, how different applications integrate, and how data is stored in databases.
Certified in CCBA/CBAP, and also CompTIA Project+, PRINCE2 Foundation/Practitioner, or PMI-CAPM
Familiar with emerging technologies like system automation, system integration, IoT, artificial intelligence, business intelligence, etc.

description:
About the role:
This is an exciting opportunity to join PT Asuransi Tokio Marine Indonesia as a Business Analyst. As a Business Analyst, you will play a crucial role in supporting the organization's strategic initiatives and driving continuous improvement within the business. This is a full-time position based in Central Jakarta, Jakarta.
Responsibilities:
Requirements Expert: Analyze business needs and translate them into clear, concise, and actionable functional and non-functional requirements for our retail initiatives.
System Integrator: Define detailed API specifications and data mapping to ensure seamless integration across our core AS/400 system, Laravel D2C website, Out Systems applications, and other third-party retail tools.
Process Optimizer: Identify opportunities to streamline and enhance our operations, from customer journeys to backend processes, using innovative technology solutions.
Technical Bridge: Act as the primary liaison between business stakeholders (e.g., retail operations, marketing) and our development teams, ensuring clear communication and alignment throughout project lifecycles.
Solution Collaborator: Work closely with development teams, especially those utilizing Out Systems for rapid application development and Laravel for our customer-facing platforms.
Quality Assurer: Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and validate that deployed solutions accurately meet defined business requirements and perform optimally in a retail environment.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree, preferably in IT Information Technology.
Minimum 3 years of experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role within the Information & Communication Technology industry.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to think critically and find creative solutions.
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to translate complex technical information into business-friendly terms.
Experience in the insurance or financial services industry would be an advantage.
Ability to work effectively in fast paced, agile environment.
Experience with API integration concepts and data mapping.
Experience with low code development platforms like Out Systems.
Knowledge of e-commerce platforms and retail business process.
Familiar with AS400 or other legacy core systems is an advantage.
About us:
PT Asuransi Tokio Marine Indonesia is a leading provider of insurance solutions in the country. With a strong track record of excellence and a commitment to innovation, we strive to be the trusted partner of our customers. Our mission is to create value for our stakeholders and contribute to the sustainable growth of the communities we serve.
Apply now to join our dynamic team and be a part of our exciting journey!

position: Campaign Analyst (Work From Home) - Singapore Client
tools: Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Tableau, Power BI, Excel
description:
About the Role
We are seeking a detail-oriented and data-driven
Campaign Analyst
to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for analyzing marketing campaigns across multiple channels, generating actionable insights, and supporting decision-making with clear, data-backed recommendations. This role reports directly to the Senior Manager and will play a key role in improving customer engagement, optimizing campaigns, and driving business performance.
Key Responsibilities
Analyze end-to-end marketing campaign performance across digital and offline channels (SMS, Email, Push, Paid Media, etc.).
Generate insights on campaign effectiveness, customer behavior, and ROI to support optimization and future planning.
Build, maintain, and automate dashboards and reports using
Tableau
(preferred) or
Power BI
for campaign tracking and business performance.
Collaborate with campaign managers and product teams to design data-driven strategies.
Conduct A/B testing and performance benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement.
Translate complex data into clear, actionable recommendations for leadership and stakeholders.
Monitor KPIs such as conversions, CTR, ARPU uplift, churn reduction, and incremental revenue.
Skills & Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Statistics, Economics, Data Analytics, or related field.
4–8 years of experience in campaign analytics, digital marketing analytics, or a similar role (telecom/tech industry experience preferred).
Strong proficiency in digital analytics and campaign measurement.
Hands-on experience with Tableau (preferred) or Power BI (dashboard creation, visualization, and reporting).
Advanced skills in Excel and Google Sheets for data analysis and reporting.
Strong analytical and commercial skills, with the ability to translate data into business impact.
Solid understanding of campaign performance metrics (CTR, conversion, ARPU, churn, uplift, etc.).
Proficiency in Excel, and analytical tools (Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, or similar is a plus).
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to generate actionable insights.
Excellent communication skills to present insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Why Join Us?
Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, data-driven environment.
Direct impact on shaping campaign strategies and customer engagement.
Exposure to advanced marketing automation and CVM platforms.
Collaborative and supportive team culture.

description:
Job Descriptions :
• To bridge between business user and application developer/infrastructure team.
• Interpreting Business User needs and requests into
Functional Design Documents (FDD)
, both new requests and changes (change requests) according to Business User needs.
• Documenting in the form of a
Business Requirements Document (BRD)
and develop user guide.
• Work with user to improve and finalize the business requirement and create functional spec document for core applications. Business requirement will include but not limited to new product development and new services for customers.

description:
Business Analyst – Banking
About us:
Sunline Technology is an industry leader in the provision of Banking IT Solutions and is committed to becoming the most trusted partner of its customers in their quest for business innovation and transformation.
We offer a full portfolio of innovative Banking IT Solutions, spanning across Core Banking, Digital Banking, Foreign Exchange and Treasury, and Big Data, as well as end-to-end technical services. We're passionate about developing the innovative solutions to meet the challenges of the digital economy and we believe that technology has the power to transform the banking and financial industry.
Purpose of the Role:
As a Business Analyst, you're play a pivotal role in providing an expertise consulting to our banking clients, and bridging the gap between the business and technology requirements, ensuring projects deliver value by gathering requirements, documenting business processes and facilitating communication to align with the business goals.
Responsibilities:
Serve as a trusted advisor to clients in the solutions, understanding the business needs and providing strategic guidance and lead and manage consulting projects, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
Communicating with client to gather project requirements and understanding client’s needs and translating them into application requirements i.e. ensuring the development/customization of product meet the client’s business needs.
Drive the design and development of innovative solutions for clients in the core banking areas.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful implementation of solutions.
Demonstrate deep expertise in core banking, regulations, and industry best practices.
Evaluating information collected from multiple sources & collaborating with subject matter experts and developers; to establish & analyze trade-offs between system reusability and technical constraints.
Preparing detailed functional specifications document, user guides, training materials and other relevant functional documentation as deemed necessary.
Being an interface between technology teams, support teams, and business units.
Obtaining Functional Specification sign off.
Conducting user training.
Skills & Specifications:
Diploma or Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field.
Minimum 3 years (mid-level) of proven experience as a Business Analyst or System Analyst, preferably in core banking environments, either: As a consultant/vendor implementing core banking systems; or as an end-user within a financial institution handling operational systems, upgrades, or digital transformation initiatives.
Strong understanding of core banking modules (e.g., customer onboarding, loan/deposit processing, GL, treasury, or payments).
Demonstrated ability to manage end-to-end project cycles including requirement gathering, gap analysis, documentation, testing, and user training.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, able to interpret business needs, document clear specifications, and deliver client/user training effectively.
Critical thinking and keen observation skills, able to detect root causes during requirement discussions and proactively identify potential gaps or conflicts.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, capable of proposing workarounds or alternative solutions for business or system constraints.
Comfortable working directly with stakeholders at various levels, including product owners, end-users, technical teams, and C-level decision-makers.
Willing to travel for project deployment, both domestically and internationally, and open to project placements outside Jakarta as needed.
Self-driven, organized, and capable of managing multiple client engagements simultaneously

description:
Currently Adecco Indonesia is collaborating with a MNC Distribution company who is looking for a
Analyst - Import and Export Compliance position.
Responsibilities:
* Handle import and export documentation, including invoices, packing lists, bills of lading, and customs clearance documents.
* Coordinate with freight forwarders, shipping lines, and customs brokers to ensure timely delivery.
* Ensure compliance with Indonesian customs regulations, trade laws, and international shipping requirements.
* Monitor and track shipments, resolving any delays or issues that may arise.
* Liaise with internal teams, such as procurement, warehouse, and finance, to ensure smooth operations.
* Maintain accurate records of import and export transactions for audit and reporting purposes.
* Stay updated on import/export regulations, tariffs, and trade agreements affecting business operations.
Requirements:
·       Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
·       Minimum 3 years of experience in forwarder, import/export, logistics, or a similar role.
·       Knowledge of Indonesian customs regulations, HS codes, and trade compliance.
·       Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word) and experience with ERP or logistics software is a plus.
·       Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.
·       Good communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English (both written and spoken).
·       Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted, good luck!

description:

Siloam Hospitals Group (SHG) is a leading private hospital network in Indonesia and has become the benchmark for quality healthcare services in the country. Siloam's medical team consists of 2,700 general practitioners and specialists, along with 10,000 nurses and other support staff, and they serve nearly 2 million patients every year.
To meet the need for world-class medical services for all segments of the Indonesian population, Siloam's business strategy, based on economies of scale, allows each of its hospital units to operate at lower costs. Thus, the company's vision to provide internationally quality healthcare in Indonesia, underpinned by divine compassion, can serve as a platform for Siloam to respond to the dynamic social transformation in Indonesia

description:
PT Epiterma Mas Indonesia sedang mencari seorang IT Analyst yang akan fokus pada pengembangan dan penguatan sistem internal perusahaan. Posisi ini akan bekerja erat dengan berbagai departemen seperti Purchasing, Engineering, dan Warehouse untuk mengembangkan sistem yang mendukung kelancaran proses bisnis harian.
Sebagai IT Analyst, Anda akan berperan dalam menganalisis kebutuhan pengguna, merancang alur proses, serta berkolaborasi dengan vendor IT untuk pengembangan teknis. Anda juga akan menangani integrasi data, pembuatan laporan sistem, dan pengembangan berkelanjutan terhadap sistem ERP yang kami gunakan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama:
Menganalisis kebutuhan sistem dari masing-masing departemen terkait proses bisnis internal
Membantu menyusun alur proses (process flow) yang efisien dan terdokumentasi
Terlibat dalam perancangan dan pengembangan sistem berbasis MySQL dan platform ERP lainnya
Berkoordinasi dengan tim internal dan vendor IT untuk pelaksanaan pengembangan dan perbaikan sistem

Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively across departments.

description:
Job Description
Primary Responsibilities and Essential Job Functions:
Support Strategic Initiatives: Assist in gathering and analysing data to provide insights and recommendations and support the development and execution of the company’s strategic plan by coordinating relevant activities and resources.
Enhance Operational Efficiency: Collaborate with various departments to gather information on operational processes and identify potential bottlenecks. Assist in the implementation of initiatives aimed at improving departmental efficiency.
Facilitate Communication and Coordination: Serve as a liaison between the Head of operation and cross-functional teams to ensure effective communication and coordination. Prepare and organize briefing materials, reports, and presentations for executive meetings.
Monitor Performance Metrics: Assist in tracking key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics across departments. Gather and compile performance data to provide regular updates and support the development of improvement plans.
Drive Continuous Improvement: Support initiatives for process optimization and organizational effectiveness. Conduct research on industry trends and best practices to provide insights that help maintain the company's competitive edge.
Cross-train within the supply chain team & operations team managers to serve as back up where needed.

Assists with implementation of changes through lean manufacturing concepts.

Strong collaboration skills with the ability to openly convey information to team members across all levels and functions of the organization and get results through excellent organizational and project management.

Experience in PC-based planning and inventory systems, ERP/MRP.
Advanced skills in data analysis and reporting results via GOOGLE SHEET or EXCEL and POWER  BI will be an added advantage.
Able to develop detailed processes to recreate complex analyses for frequent monitoring of various business conditions.
Can ensure strategies and tactical plans are consistent with overall manufacturing and service functional objectives.

description:
Job Description:
Conduct direct calls & visits to debtors / prospective debtors related to the process of applying for or extending credit facilities together with the RM team, and provide updates on the following:
The debtor’s business development condition.
Comparison of turnover with the previous year.
The debtor’s future business projection.
The debtor’s strategy to achieve such projection.
Any changes in the trade cycle.
The quality of BJI’s service to the debtor.
Monitoring the fulfillment of Throughput.
Prepare NAK (Credit Analysis Memo) related to the extension and restructuring of the debtor’s credit facilities → quantitative analysis section.
Provide analysis on the results of SLIK checking for the credit facility application process.
Provide support to the Relationship Manager (RM) in preparing credit proposals / NAK (new and additional applications) in the quantitative analysis section of the credit facility application, including:
Financial statement analysis (preparation of historical & projected spreadsheets along with analysis).
Preparation of CRS (Credit Rating System).
Cash flow projections.
Bank account statement analysis.
Calculation of working capital / investment needs.
Together with RM, formulate credit covenants related to the debtor’s financial condition and financial ratios.
Recommendations for covenants related to the debtor’s financial ratios.
Industry analysis related to the debtor’s business (if required).
Together with RM, participate in the Round Table, Ratek, and RKK processes related to debtor / prospective debtor credit facility applications.
Assist RM in responding to findings from Internal Auditors, OJK (Financial Services Authority), and External Auditors, for findings related to the debtor’s quantitative/financial aspects.
Requirements:
Candidate should possess at least Bachelor degree (S1)
Minimum 3 (three) years of working experience as Commercial Banking Business Analyst from Banking industry.
Proficient in English both written and verbal
Communicative and able to work both individually or together in a team
Detail-oriented, discipline, and strong integrity person
Able to work in a fast-paced environment with tight deadline(s)

description:
About the role:
We are seeking a talented Finance Analyst to join our dynamic team at PT. HLI Green Power, a leading provider of green energy solutions. As a Finance Analyst, you will play a crucial role in analyzing financial data, driving strategic decision-making, and contributing to the overall financial health of the company. This is a full-time position based in Karawang Barat, West Java.
Job Description:
Conduct comprehensive financial analyses, including budget planning, forecasting, and variance reporting,
Assist in the preparation of financial analyst, regulatory reports, and other key financial documents,
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and interpret financial data, identify trends, and provide insights,
Material cost analysis: Conducted detailed analysis of material costs to identify cost drivers, worked closely with Materials & Logistic team to track material price trends,
Developing short-term movement plans: Prepare and deliver the monthly profit and loss plan for the next six months (M+1 to M+6)
Analyzing performance gaps vs plans: Performed variance analysis between actual performance and planned.
Job Requirement:
Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance,
Minimum 3 years of experience in a finance or accounting role,
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret financial data and translate it into actionable insights,
Proficient in using financial software and tools, such as Excel, ERP systems, and SAP,
Thorough understanding of financial reporting standards, regulations, and best practices
Collaborative mindset and the ability to work effectively within a team

description:
Meratus Group
is a leading integrated maritime and logistics operator in Indonesia, pioneering innovative solutions that drive efficiency and sustainability in the industry. With a rich history dating back to 1957, Meratus has evolved into a powerhouse, operating over 45 shipping routes, a fleet of 100 vessels, and a network of container terminals and logistics centers.
At Meratus, we are committed to
digitalization, innovation, and transformation
, ensuring seamless logistics and maritime services across Indonesia and Southeast Asia. Our
customer-centric approach
and
agile operations
empower businesses to navigate complex supply chain challenges with confidence.
We take pride in fostering a
dynamic and inclusive workplace
, where talented professionals can thrive and contribute to shaping the future of maritime logistics. Join us and be part of a team that is redefining industry standards while making a meaningful impact on global trade and sustainability.
﻿Job Overview
We are seeking a
Process Analyst
to support continuous operational improvement by analyzing business processes and related data, identifying inefficiencies, and recommending data-driven enhancements. This role will work closely with the Data Analyst team to leverage insights that optimize workflows in logistics and forwarding operations.
Responsibilities
Collect and analyze operational and performance data related to key business processes.
Map and document current business processes; identify bottlenecks or inefficiencies using data insights.
Collaborate with Data Analysts to design KPIs and dashboards that monitor process performance.
Conduct root cause analysis using both process mapping and data analysis techniques.
Propose and support the implementation of process improvements based on analytical findings.
Assist in automating data collection and reporting for ongoing process monitoring.
Work with IT and operations teams to integrate improvements into systems and workflows.
Support change management and training activities for new process implementations.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity in all process-related reports and tools.
Participate in cross-functional projects to drive operational excellence.
Requirements
Bachelors degree in
Industrial Engineering, Logistics, Data Science, Business Analytics
, or related field.
Minimum
2 years of experience
in data analysis or process improvement roles, preferably within logistics or supply chain.
Experience working in or with data analyst teams.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Solid understanding of end-to-end logistics operations.
Good communication and presentation skills.
Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia; English proficiency is a plus.
Proficient in tools such as
Excel, SQL/Query, Power BI, Python
, or other analytics

english proficiency is a plus. proficient in tools such as excel, sql/query, power bi, python , or other analytics

description:
Analyze and Assess the financial statements, credit history, and repayment behavior of existing and potential
corporate segment
debtors / lessee, with a deep understanding of key financial ratios and indicators of financial health.
Review and ensure that all Credit Application proposals meet internal policies and external regulatory standards, including thorough Know Your Customer (KYC)
Structure Credit Facilities and financing deals by analyzing business models, cash flow dynamics, collateral strength, and repayment capability—balancing commercial viability with credit risk exposure.
Perform Holistic Risk Assessments, incorporating industry trends, economic outlooks, and counterparty risks to support sound decision-making and proactive risk mitigation.
Make Strategic Credit Recommendations to credit committees and senior management, backed by well-documented analysis, scenario planning, and professional judgment.
Interview and consult with clients regarding financial transactions, payment terms, credit limits, and business activities
Conduct comprehensive Due Diligence including management interviews, site visits, legal verification, and assessment of operational and market risks.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Management Finance, Accounting, or related field
Experience a minimum 5 (five) years in the same position or industry,
Having experience as corporate / conglomeration credit analyst at heavy equipment and/or financial/leasing company would be preferred
Strong expertise in financial modeling, credit structuring, and risk analysis for corporate / conglomeration debtors / lessee, in relation to the repayment capacity and financial health (mandatory)
Strong organizational analytical, detail oriented,  and time management skills
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English and Bahasa Indonesia
Preferable with TOEFL, IELTS or TOEIC Certificate
Disclaimer – Use of Personal Data
By submitting a job application to the Company, including but not limited to the curriculum vitae (CV) and other supporting documents, the applicant hereby gives
consent
to the Company to
use, process, store, and dispose of
the applicant's personal data in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations in Indonesia, including but not limited to Law No. 27 of 2022 on Personal Data Protection.
Any personal data submitted will be used solely for recruitment and selection purposes and will be destroyed in accordance with internal policy once the process is completed.

description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menginterpretasikan data keuangan dan non-keuangan untuk mengevaluasi kelayakan kredit perusahaan.
Menyiapkan laporan kredit yang komprehensif dengan analisis mendalam, rekomendasi, dan mitigasi risiko yang jelas.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim terkait, seperti Hubungan Pelanggan dan Operasional, untuk memastikan proses kredit yang efisien.
Memberikan masukan dan saran kepada manajemen senior tentang tren pasar, risiko, dan peluang kredit.
Memonitor dan mengevaluasi portofolio kredit secara teratur untuk mengidentifikasi potensi risiko dan peluang.
Memberikan dukungan teknis dan pelatihan kepada staf analis kredit junior.
Keterampilan, Kualifikasi, dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar Sarjana atau setara di bidang Keuangan, Akuntansi, Ekonomi, atau disiplin terkait.
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman bekerja sebagai Analis Kredit Korporat atau peran serupa di lembaga keuangan terkemuka.
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat, dengan pemahaman yang solid tentang rasio keuangan, analisis arus kas, dan penilaian kredit.
Pengalaman menggunakan perangkat lunak analitik seperti Microsoft Excel atau solusi serupa.
Pemahaman yang baik tentang peraturan dan persyaratan kredit di industri jasa keuangan.
Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik lisan maupun tertulis, untuk berinteraksi dengan pemangku kepentingan internal dan eksternal.
Berpikir kritis, berorientasi pada detail, dan kemampuan untuk bekerja di bawah tekanan.

Assist in basic integration and data interfacing between ERP and other systems (WMS, supply chain, etc.).

At least 3 years of experience in ERP implementation or support; project experience is a plus.
Familiar with basic ERP business processes (Procurement, Sales, Inventory, Finance, etc.).
Strong communication, coordination, and requirement analysis skills.
Proficient in data tools like Excel and basic SQL queries.
Fluent in English or Chinese.
Strong learning ability and team spirit.
Willing to work from office at Pantai Indah Kapuk

description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a detail-driven and curious
Data Analyst
who thrives on turning raw data into powerful insights. In this role, you’ll help shape smarter business decisions, uncover growth opportunities, and create meaningful stories out of complex datasets. You’ll partner with cross-functional teams, blending analysis and creativity to deliver dashboards, reports, and recommendations that truly make an impact.
About Dentsu
Led by Dentsu Group Inc. (Tokyo: 4324; ISIN: JP3551520004), a pure holding company established on January 1, 2020, the Dentsu Group encompasses two operational networks: dentsu japan network, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations in Japan, and dentsu international, its international business headquarters in London, which oversees Dentsu’s agency operations outside of Japan.
With a strong presence in approximately 145 countries and regions across five continents and with 65,000 dedicated professionals, the Dentsu Group provides a comprehensive range of client-centric integrated communications, media and digital services through its five leadership brands—Carat, dentsu X, iProspect, Dentsu Creative, and Merkle—as well as through Dentsu Japan Network companies, including Dentsu Inc., the world’s largest single brand agency with a history of innovation. The Group is also active in the production and marketing of sports and entertainment content on a global scale.
www.dentsu.com
About Merkle
Merkle is a leading data-driven customer experience management (CXM) company that specializes in the delivery of unique, personalized customer experiences across platforms and devices. For more than 30 years, Fortune 1000 companies and leading nonprofit organizations have partnered with Merkle to maximize the value of their customer portfolios. The company’s heritage in data, technology, and analytics forms the foundation for its unmatched skills in understanding consumer insights that drive hyper-personalized marketing strategies. Its combined strengths in performance media, customer experience, customer relationship management, loyalty, and enterprise marketing technology drive improved marketing results and competitive advantage. With 12,000 employees, Merkle is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland, with 50+ additional offices throughout the Americas, EMEA, and APAC. Merkle is a dentsu company.
Key responsibilities
Gather, clean, and ensure accuracy of data from multiple sources.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to spot patterns, trends, and anomalies.
Build dashboards, reports, and visualizations that make insights accessible and actionable.
Turn stakeholder questions into data-driven answers and recommendations.
Work with data engineers, scientists, and business teams to improve processes and align with business goals.
Track KPIs and business metrics, providing regular insights to stakeholders.
Support special projects and deep dives requested by leadership or clients.
A bit about you
At least 2 years of proven experience as a Data Analyst (or in a similar role).
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or related field.
Proficiency in
SQL, Excel
, and at least one visualization tool (
Tableau, Power BI, Looker
).
Strong analytical mindset with the ability to interpret complex data and simplify it into clear insights.
Basic knowledge of
Python or R
(a plus).
Excellent communication skills to engage both technical and non-technical audiences.
Attention to detail, problem-solving mindset, and ability to perform in a fast-paced environment.
Dentsu Values
Will live the dentsu 8 Ways at all times: We Dream Loud, We Inspire Change, We Team Without Limits, We All Lead, We Make It Real, We Climb High, We Choose Excitement, We Are A Force For Good
Inclusion and Diversity
We’re proud to be different and that starts with our people. We believe in equal opportunities for everyone. We won’t define people by their race, gender, sexual-orientation, age or disability. Individuality is what makes us great, we want everyone to bring their full self to work and create something amazing. That’s what we care about.
So, whether you’re joining us, or looking to move to a different part of the business, we work hard to make sure we create equal opportunities for everyone.
Keeping connected
Please visit our website to find out more and connect with us on social.
www.dentsu.com
*Please include an updated CV in your application.
**We regret that only short-listed candidates will be notified.
#LI-LE1
#LI-HYBRID
Location:
Jakarta
Brand:
Merkle
Time Type:
Full time
Contract Type:
Permanent

description:
Job Description : We are looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for managing, analyzing, and interpreting data to deliver valuable insights that support effective business decisions.
Key Responsibilities:
Collect, clean, and organize data from various internal and external sources
Manage and maintain databases or data warehouses
Conduct statistical analyses to identify trends, patterns, and actionable insights
Build and maintain reports and dashboards using tools such as Excel, Power BI, or Tableau
Provide data-driven recommendations to management and stakeholders
Support cross-functional teams in decision-making by presenting relevant data clearly
Ensure data accuracy and consistency through validation and quality checks
Qualifications:
Proficiency in English (mandatory)
Strong knowledge of SQL and Excel; programming skills in Python or R are an advantage
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Looker)
Hands-on experience in data scraping from multiple sources
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain findings to non-technical stakeholders
What We Offer:
Competitive salary: IDR 4,000,000 – 5,000,000 (commensurate with experience and qualifications)
Opportunity to grow with a dynamic and expanding team
Placement in West Surabaya

description:
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, Information Systems, Economics, or other related fields.
2–3 years of proven experience as a Data Analyst, Business Analyst, or in a similar analytical role.
Demonstrated ability to manage data analysis projects from data collection to reporting.
Able to work independently and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Proficient in advanced SQL, including complex JOINs, subqueries, window functions, CTEs, and query optimization.
Skilled in Microsoft Excel, including PivotTables, Power Query, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, and advanced formulas.
Proficient in using Python (pandas, numpy, matplotlib/seaborn) or R (tidyverse, ggplot2) for data analysis.
Experienced in creating data visualizations using Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio, or Looker Studio.
Familiar with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Google BigQuery, or Snowflake (a plus). Experience with ETL tools like Airflow, dbt, or Talend is preferred. Knowledge of cloud platforms such as Google Cloud (GCP), AWS, or Azure is an advantage.
Responsibilities:
Responsible for collecting, cleaning, and analysing data from various sources.
Developing informative dashboards and producing regular weekly/monthly reports.
Providing business recommendations based on data insights.
Collaborating with marketing, operations, business development, and management teams to support data-driven decision-making.
Improving reporting accuracy and efficiency through process automation.

description:
As a
Data Analyst
, you will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to help drive data-driven decision-making within the organization. You will support business processes by providing valuable insights, reports, and visualizations. Your role will involve developing data analysis processes, assessing analytics continuously, and collaborating with stakeholders to implement data-driven strategies. You will also review marketing campaigns and customer behavior to identify trends and opportunities for growth.
This position requires strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to create dashboards that provide actionable insights for various stakeholders.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain data analysis processes to support business needs.
Continuously assess and improve analytics and reporting.
Oversee the data warehouse, ensuring efficient data collection and utilization.
Create and manage data reports and dashboards that provide actionable insights.
Perform data analysis to evaluate business trends, customer behavior, and campaign effectiveness.
Provide ad-hoc analysis to answer specific business questions.
Communicate with management and stakeholders regularly to share updates and findings.
Analyze marketing campaigns to assess their impact on business growth.
Identify opportunities for process improvement based on data insights.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Science, Information Technology, Statistics, or a related field.
Minimum 2 years of experience working with data analysis, including SQL, ETL processes, and data modeling.
Strong proficiency in data visualization and reporting tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Ability to work collaboratively with stakeholders and communicate complex data insights clearly.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a detail-oriented mindset.
Ability to manage time efficiently and handle multiple tasks.

tools: GCP, R, BigQuery, SQL, Tableau, Snowflake, Looker, Python, Amplitude, Power BI
description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
What You'll Do
Partner with product managers, marketers, and other cross-functional stakeholders to analyze user behavior and marketing performance
Design and evaluate A/B tests and other experiments to drive product and growth improvements
Build dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and uncover trends.
Use forecasting models to help predict user growth, revenue, or campaign performance.
Communicate findings clearly and effectively to technical and non-technical audiences.
Collaborate closely with data engineering and other analysts to improve data infrastructure and tooling.
What We’re Looking For
2+ years of experience in an analytics role, ideally in a product or marketing analytics environment.
Strong SQL skills and experience working with large datasets  and cloud-based data platforms (e.g., BigQuery, Snowflake) [GCP preferred]
Has working experience working with python/R for data analysis and modeling
Experience with experimentation frameworks (e.g., A/B testing, holdout tests).
Familiarity with forecasting techniques (e.g., time series models, regression).
Comfortable with data visualization tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI) and storytelling with data
Experience with tools like dbt or Amplitude/MoEngage is a big plus
You’ll Thrive Here If You
Are intellectually curious and love getting to the "why" behind the numbers
Enjoy leveraging technology and collaborating across teams

description:
We are looking for a data analyst at Flip. You will be responsible for managing data discovery and insights generation for key initiatives. In this role, you will also be expected to collaborate with Data Engineers to improve and enrich existing state of data to meet current as well as possible future use cases.
About Flip
Rafi, Luqman, and Anjar, who were college friends in Universitas Indonesia, started Flip as a project in 2015 to transfer payments to each other at a fraction of what banks would charge them. They are pioneers in the Indonesian market, with their technology now helping millions of Indonesians, both individuals and businesses, carry out bank-to-bank money transfers through a reliable and seamless app.
After nine years of operations, Flip has helped Indonesians transfer money worth several trillions of rupiah and has received double-digit funding from respectable investors such as Sequoia India, Insight Partner, and Insignia. Flip’s ultimate mission is to give Indonesians access to one of the most progressive and fairest financial services in the world.
At Flip, we always strive to provide the fairest place for you to work, learn, and grow with talented and fun people in various opportunities to advance your career and get fair rewards. We believe that we have to treat employees, customers, and all stakeholders fairly and respectfully. Fair treatment for employees means we establish clear goals, facilitate our employees to achieve them, and value their contribution to the company with equitable benefits.
What You'll Do
Partner with product managers, marketers, and other cross-functional stakeholders to analyze user behavior and marketing performance
Design and evaluate A/B tests and other experiments to drive product and growth improvements
Build dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and uncover trends.
Use forecasting models to help predict user growth, revenue, or campaign performance.
Communicate findings clearly and effectively to technical and non-technical audiences.
Collaborate closely with data engineering and other analysts to improve data infrastructure and tooling.
What We’re Looking For
2+ years of experience in an analytics role, ideally in a product or marketing analytics environment.
Strong SQL skills and experience working with large datasets  and cloud-based data platforms (e.g., BigQuery, Snowflake) [GCP preferred]
Has working experience working with python/R for data analysis and modeling
Experience with experimentation frameworks (e.g., A/B testing, holdout tests).
Familiarity with forecasting techniques (e.g., time series models, regression).
Comfortable with data visualization tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI) and storytelling with data
Experience with tools like dbt or Amplitude/MoEngage is a big plus
You’ll Thrive Here If You
Are intellectually curious and love getting to the "why" behind the numbers
Enjoy leveraging technology and collaborating across teams
Can balance speed and rigor when delivering insights
Have a proactive and ownership-driven mindset

description:
What You Will Do
We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join our team. The successful candidate will play a critical role in transforming raw data into actionable insights to support decision-making across the organization. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities, solve business problems, and enhance operational efficiency.
Your key responsibilities will include:
Collaborating with the operations team to gain a deep understanding of business processes and operational workflows.
Partnering with the technology team to understand the database schema and ensure effective data extraction.
Automating weekly and monthly operational reports to improve efficiency and accuracy.
Designing and developing dashboards and visualizations using BI tools such as Metabase, Power BI, or Tableau.
Writing and optimizing complex SQL queries to retrieve and analyze data from multiple sources.
Conducting in-depth analysis of customer and teacher behaviors to uncover trends, patterns, and improvement opportunities.
Driving projects aimed at improving conversion rates, including analysis of lead-to-purchase funnels and customer demographics.
Ensuring data integrity, consistency, and accuracy across reports and dashboards.
Presenting insights and recommendations clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Supporting strategic initiatives by providing data-driven inputs to product, marketing, and operations teams.
Requirements and Qualifications
To succeed in this role, you should meet the following qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
Minimum of 3 years of professional experience in data analytics, business intelligence, or a related discipline.
Proficiency in SQL and experience working with relational databases.
Hands-on experience with BI and visualization tools such as Metabase, Power BI, or Tableau.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
Excellent documentation skills, with the ability to clearly communicate methodologies and findings.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, especially in a multicultural and cross-functional environment.
Fluency in both written and spoken English.
A proactive mindset with the ability to manage multiple priorities and work independently.
Familiarity with the startup ecosystem and interest in contributing to a fast-paced environment.
Passion for creating social impact, particularly in advancing education in Indonesia
Connect with us:
Make yourself updated with Cakap & Cakap Squad activities by follow our social media at:
IG: @lifeatcakap @cakapcom
Twitter: @cakapcom
TikTok: @cakapcom

description:
Posisi Strategis sebagai Business Analyst AS400 untuk Industri Perbankan
Kami dari PT. SIGMA GLOBAL TEKNOLOGI (SIGMATECH) mencari seorang Business Analyst AS400 yang berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di Jakarta Pusat. Dalam peran ini, Anda akan memainkan peran kunci dalam menganalisis dan mengoptimalkan proses bisnis untuk klien kami di industri perbankan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Menganalisis kebutuhan bisnis dan persyaratan fungsional klien perbankan
Mendefinisikan, mendokumentasikan, dan mengkomunikasikan solusi TI yang selaras dengan tujuan bisnis
Berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan untuk menerjemahkan kebutuhan bisnis menjadi spesifikasi teknis
Memantau implementasi dan pengujian solusi TI, memastikan kesesuaian dengan persyaratan
Memberikan dukungan dan pelatihan kepada pengguna akhir setelah implementasi
Mengidentifikasi peluang perbaikan proses dan efisiensi biaya
Keterampilan dan Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana dalam Sistem Informasi, Manajemen, Teknik Komputer, atau bidang terkait
Minimal 5 tahun pengalaman sebagai Business Analyst, dengan pemahaman yang kuat tentang proses bisnis perbankan
Pengetahuan yang mahir tentang bahasa pemrograman AS400 dan alat pengembangan terkait
Kemampuan analitis yang baik untuk mengidentifikasi dan memecahkan masalah bisnis kompleks
Keterampilan komunikasi yang efektif, baik lisan maupun tertulis, untuk berinteraksi dengan tim teknis dan pemangku kepentingan bisnis
Pengalaman dalam manajemen proyek dan kolaborasi lintas fungsi
Manfaat Bekerja di SIGMATECH
Paket kompensasi yang kompetitif dan tunjangan yang menarik
Peluang karir yang beragam di lingkungan kerja yang bersemangat
Budaya inovatif yang mendukung pertumbuhan profesional Anda
Opsi fleksibilitas kerja jarak jauh atau hybrid
Tentang SIGMATECH
PT. SIGMA GLOBAL TEKNOLOGI (SIGMATECH) adalah perusahaan teknologi terkemuka yang menyediakan solusi digital inovatif untuk berbagai industri, termasuk perbankan. Kami berkomitmen untuk membantu organisasi mencapai efisiensi operasional dan keunggulan kompetitif melalui transformasi digital. Tim kami yang dinamis dan berpengalaman berdedikasi untuk memberikan nilai tambah kepada klien kami.
Tertarik untuk bergabung dengan kami? Lamar sekarang!

This is a full-time role for a Data Analyst at Lezenda. The role involves analyzing market data, interpreting trends, and providing insights to optimize marketing strategies. Open to college students pursuing a Bachelor's degree, with a passion for data analysis and a drive to learn in a dynamic digital environment.

Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a Bachelor's degree program
Willingness to learn new things
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong data interpretation and presentation skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel
Proficiency in data visualization tools is a big plus

description:
As a one of top company in the fashion retail industry, we are looking for an experienced and dedicated Sales Data Analyst to join our team in Bandung, West Java.
Responsibilities
Collect, analyze, and interpret sales data from various sources to identify trends, opportunities, and business challenges.
Create informative and easy-to-understand reports and presentations to communicate findings to leadership and stakeholders.
Assist in developing and implementing sales strategies based on data insights.
Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to understand market targets, customer demands, and product preferences.
Identify areas for improvement and provide recommendations to enhance sales performance.
Maintain an accurate and up-to-date sales database.
Skills & Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Business, Data Analytics, or a related field.
Minimum 5 years of experience in sales data analysis or a similar role.
Proficiency in data analysis tools, such as spreadsheets, databases, and data visualization software.
Strong critical thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
Passion for sales and a desire to contribute to business growth.
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets.
Knowledge of programming languages such as SQL.
Familiarity with tools such as MySQL, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL.
Understanding of machine learning is a plus.
Strong communication and presentation skills.
Ability to create effective reports and presentations.
Available to join immediately & willing to work onsite (WFO) at our Bandung office.
Benefits
Opportunity for career growth and development.
A dynamic and collaborative work culture with strong management support.

description:
Kredivo is looking for an experienced Data Analyst to support analytics needs for the
Business Development
function. This role is responsible for tracking and analysis for key metrics and KPIs for the sales promotors, sales operation, merchant acquisition, and business development departments. The successful candidate will be working closely with various stakeholders, namely product manager, product analyst, data engineer, and data scientist to deliver actionable insights and ensure data-driven decision-making.
Responsibilities:
Monitoring and tracking key business metrics and KPIs such as GMV growth, promo spend efficiency, sales channel performance, merchant acquisitions, and store performances.
Creating monthly sales team targets, incentive plans, and performance tracking.
Collecting and organizing data from various sources and generating reports and dashboards.
Analyzing sales promoter performance, patterns, and metrics and presenting insights to stakeholders.
Collaborating with the sales promoter team to understand operational needs and deliver data-driven solutions.
Identifying opportunities for sales promoter growth and improvement.
Providing support for internal product development from data perspective.
Developing, maintaining, and owning sales-related data marts.
Documenting data assets including data marts, automated pipelines, insights, and root cause analysis.
Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree preferably in quantitative subject (e.g. Computer Science, Engineering, Economics, or Mathematics)
Minimum 4 years' experience as Business Data Analyst, Sales Data Analyst, or Product Analyst.
Excellent analytical skills. You need to be comfortable with data - analyze it, question its validity, interpret it, and develop recommendations based on it.
Advanced SQL skills are mandatory.
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets is required.
Great communication skills to translate complex data into clear business insights for non-technical stakeholders.
Experience with data visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, PowerBI, Mode, or Looker.
Proficient in English, with the ability to converse professionally in both written and verbal communication.
Experience with data warehouse modelling is a strong advantage.
Experience with data pipeline automation (Airflow, dbt) and programming skills in Python are a strong advantage.
Comfortable working in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
#LI-AS1

description:
Job Description
·       Menyusun strategi produk CRM
dan roadmap sesuai kebutuhan pasar serta arah bisnis perusahaan.
·       Membuat justifikasi inisiasi bisnis dan COGS untuk pengembangan fitur
maupun produk baru.
·       Menyusun dan memantau biaya serta pendapatan produk guna menjaga
profitabilitas dan efisiensi.
·    Mengelola siklus hidup produk end-to-end, mulai dari perencanaan,
pengembangan, hingga evaluasi.
·       Berkolaborasi dengan tim lintas fungsi (IT, Finance, Marketing dan lainnya )
untuk memastikan implementasi berjalan efektif.
·       Menyusun dan menyajikan
materi presentasi strategis untuk manajemen eksekutif.
·       Melakukan riset pasar, tren
industri, serta benchmarking dengan solusi CRM global untuk menjaga daya saing
produk.
Job Requirement
• S1 Ekonomi/Manajemen, (preferable S2 Manajemen/ Business Manajemen)
• Minimal 1-2 tahun sebagai Product Manager/Owner di CRM atau SaaS
• Berpengalaman mengelola siklus hidup produk end-to-end, menyusun business case, serta analisis biaya-pendapatan.
• Terampil dalam mengoperasikan Excel,Powerpoint, Power BI, Looker.
• Mampu melakukan cross functional unit colaboration
• Berpengalaman mempersiapkan presentasi di level eksekutif.
• Memahami strategi optimasi biaya produk (Capex vs Opex).
• Antusias menghubungkan bisnis, teknologi, dan pengalaman pelanggan menjadi solusi yang berdampak.
Skill Requirement
Product Management
