Berikut ini adalah kualifikasi yang harus Anda penuhi untuk mengajukan lamaran Lowongan Kerja SAMPOERNA UNIVERSITY PART TIME DATA ANALYST Jakarta September 2025 Sampoerna Schools System yang dibuka pada 26 Juni 2024 ini:
Company Description
Sampoerna University is the only university in Indonesia that offers an American-style higher education experience. As part of the Sampoerna Schools System, it represents the culmination of the nation’s only integrated system of schools based on international standards of quality.
Sampoerna University operates programs under the licensure and credentialing authorities of the Ministry of Education and Culture of the Republic of Indonesia. Set up with national and international standards, Sampoerna University is uniquely qualified to make substantive contributions to society through education.
Sampoerna University is more than just a campus — it is a learning community that prepares students to succeed both academically and professionally. Here, students will not only learn and acquire academic rigor—they will be challenged to think, perform, and grow to a more advanced level. With our programs, students are assured to have better skills and credentials that will open the doors to both national or international careers after they graduate.
Sampoerna University Vision
Sampoerna University aspires to foster future leaders with strong moral character and internationally competitive skills sets, enabling them to actively participate in building a more prosperous, equitable, respected, and globally competitive Indonesia.
Sampoerna University Mission
Sampoerna University aims to provide students affordable access to education that meets the highest international standards. Sampoerna University offers a curriculum unique in Indonesia built around an American general education core, successfully preparing students for credential completion at Sampoerna University or for recognized transfer abroad. We also provide a full spectrum of cocurricular and pre-professional opportunities that ensure student success, preparing leaders for a global society.
Job Description
Position Overview:
We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Analyst to join our team on a part-time basis. This role is ideal for candidate who are passionate about leveraging data to enhance student success. The successful candidate will play a critical role in analyzing and interpreting data to support the academic progress and overall success of our students.
Key Responsibilities:
Data Collection and Management:
Gather and manage data from various sources, ensuring accuracy and integrity.
Develop and maintain databases, data systems, and data collection processes.
Data Analysis:
Analyze student performance data to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
Use statistical techniques and software tools to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
Reporting:
Prepare and present comprehensive reports on student performance and success metrics.
Create visualizations and dashboards to effectively communicate findings to stakeholders.
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
Proficiency in data analysis software such as Excel, Spreadsheet, or SQL
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Previous experience in an educational setting is a plus.
Additional Information
Application Process:
Please submit a resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and motivation for the role to info.tutoring@sampoernauniversity.ac.id and thalitha.wardhani@sampoernauniversity.ac.id
Join us in making a meaningful impact on student success through data-driven insights and support. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

description:
Gambaran Umum Pekerjaan
Kami dari PT Clavisindo Berjaya sedang mencari System Analyst yang berpengalaman dan berbakat untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di kantor kami di Gambir Jakarta Pusat. Sebagai System Analyst, Anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam merancang, menganalisis, dan mengimplementasikan solusi sistem informasi yang selaras dengan tujuan bisnis perusahaan kami. Posisi ini membutuhkan pemikir strategis yang dapat mengidentifikasi peluang perbaikan proses dan mengembangkan solusi teknologi yang efektif.
Tanggung Jawab Utama :
Menganalisis kebutuhan bisnis dan persyaratan sistem pengguna untuk mengembangkan solusi sistem yang efektif.
Membuat dokumen BRD (
Business Requirement Document
) dan FSD (
Functional Specification Document
)
Bertangung jawab sebagai perantara antara end user dan IT development untuk menerjemahkan kebutuhan end user sehingga proses requirement dapat di adaptasi dengan baik.
Membuat persyaratan System (BRD & FSD)
Berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan dan pemangku kepentingan lainnya untuk memastikan integrasi sistem yang lancar.
Memantau dan mengevaluasi kinerja sistem, dan memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan yang berkelanjutan.
Mendokumentasikan proses, prosedur, dan spesifikasi sistem dengan rinci.
Kualifikasi :
Pendidikan minimal S1 Sistem Informasi, Teknik Informatika, atau Teknik Komputer.
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai System Analyst atau peran IT serupa. (
Framework Odoo
menjadi nilai tambah)
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat dan pemecahan masalah yang baik.
Pengetahuan mendalam tentang arsitektur sistem, manajemen proyek, dan pengembangan perangkat lunak.
Mengetahui alur SDLC (System Development Life Cycle)
Mengetahui Query (SQL Server, MY SQL, PostGre SQL)
Memahami API & dapat menguji API melalui Postman
Dapat bekerja dengan fungsi menjalankan UAT.
Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik lisan maupun tertulis, untuk berinteraksi dengan tim IT dan pemangku kepentingan bisnis.
Penempatan Head Office Gambir, Jakarta Pusat
Jika Anda tertarik untuk bergabung dengan tim kami yang dinamis, lamar sekarang!
content: system analyst jakarta pusat api, sql, sql server computer science, informatics engineering, information systems data & technology gambaran umum pekerjaan kami dari pt clavisindo berjaya sedang mencari system analyst yang berpengalaman dan berbakat untuk bergabung dengan tim kami di kantor kami di gambir jakarta pusat. sebagai system analyst, anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam merancang, menganalisis, dan mengimplementasikan solusi sistem informasi yang selaras dengan tujuan bisnis perusahaan kami. posisi ini membutuhkan pemikir strategis yang dapat mengidentifikasi peluang perbaikan proses dan mengembangkan solusi teknologi yang efektif. tanggung jawab utama : menganalisis kebutuhan bisnis dan persyaratan sistem pengguna untuk mengembangkan solusi sistem yang efektif. membuat dokumen brd ( business requirement document ) dan fsd ( functional specification document ) bertangung jawab sebagai perantara antara end user dan it development untuk menerjemahkan kebutuhan end user sehingga proses requirement dapat di adaptasi dengan baik. membuat persyaratan system (brd & fsd) berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan dan pemangku kepentingan lainnya untuk memastikan integrasi sistem yang lancar. memantau dan mengevaluasi kinerja sistem, dan memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan yang berkelanjutan. mendokumentasikan proses, prosedur, dan spesifikasi sistem dengan rinci. kualifikasi : pendidikan minimal s1 sistem informasi, teknik informatika, atau teknik komputer. minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai system analyst atau peran it serupa. ( framework odoo menjadi nilai tambah) kemampuan analitis yang kuat dan pemecahan masalah yang baik. pengetahuan mendalam tentang arsitektur sistem, manajemen proyek, dan pengembangan perangkat lunak. mengetahui alur sdlc (system development life cycle) mengetahui query (sql server, my sql, postgre sql) memahami api & dapat menguji api melalui postman dapat bekerja dengan fungsi menjalankan uat. kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik lisan maupun tertulis, untuk berinteraksi dengan tim it dan pemangku kepentingan bisnis. penempatan head office gambir, jakarta pusat jika anda tertarik untuk bergabung dengan tim kami yang dinamis, lamar sekarang!

Company Description
cmlabs is a brand under PT CMLABS INDONESIA DIGITAL, specializes in the SEO field, and was established in 2019. We use to stand in a new term as Software as a Service (SaaS) and located in two big cities in Indonesia, Jakarta, and Malang. This company was initiated with an idea to help companies or enterprises increase the visibility of their brand on the internet. cmlabs serve users in SEO Consultant, Content Writing, Content Marketing, and also have a product such as SERPs Trackers and SEO Tools. SEO Tools are free and available for users who focus on webmaster and SEO writing. cmlabs will expand to a bigger market to present SEO products and serve SEO activities on a global scale for enterprises.
Job Description
Transform data into useful insights for the team
Analysis, interpret and transform data from data/dashboard requests
Help identify the business data needed to produce the most useful insights and future analytics
Support and contribute to data collection efforts
Support and partner with teams across the enterprise
Qualification
Fresh graduates and or senior year students are welcome
Knowledge in programming language (Python, R, SQL)
Familiarity with Big Data frameworks
Comfortable with statistics, datasets, and machine learning exercises.
Understand how to optimize data retrieval and how to develop dashboards, reports, and other visualizations for stakeholders.
Interested in startup culture and passionate about learning
Company Perks
Community & personal development
Financial wellbeing
Flexibility & time off
Miscellaneous allowances
cmlabs extras
Competitive compensation
We care about our employees' financial well-being, which is why we make sure it meets their expectations.
Regular bonus and equity refresh opportunity
The more you perform well, the more bonus you will receive.
Six-month salary equity analysis and adjustment
We evaluate everyone's performance every six months to adjust and possibly raise the salary.
Hybrid Working Environment
We use hybrid work in accordance with the company's arrangement.
Flexible Working Hours
We encourage our employees to take advantage of flexible working hours. They can choose when they want to work the most during the day. This is an effective way to increase work-life balance.
Paid leave
Annual leave, sickness, and any special events are considered paid leave. We want our employees to take time off so that they can come back with other valuable opportunities.
Unpaid leave
In certain conditions, unpaid leave is granted to our employees. We make sure everyone has their rights.
Part-time
We have a part-time program that can benefit students or anyone who wants to participate in achieving our mission.
Employment insurance and health insurance
We provide comprehensive healthcare and employment insurance for a better quality of life.

description:
Get to Know the Team
You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.
Get to Know the Role
As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.

description:
Data Analyst Intern
📍Location: Jakarta Barat
📆 Employment Type: Internship / On-site
Job Overview: We are looking for a Data Analyst Intern who is passionate about data and eager to contribute to a fast-growing, data-driven environment. The ideal candidate is analytical, energetic, and curious, with the ability to turn data into insights that support smarter business decisions.
This role involves developing and maintaining data models, conducting market and customer analysis, and working closely with the management team to build dashboards, reports, and daily insights that help drive performance. You should be comfortable working with marketplace data, Google Analytics, and large datasets.This opportunity is also open for final-year students from relevant majors who are ready for a full-time role.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop, maintain, and update data models, key business metrics, and performance dashboards.
Perform market and customer behavior analysis to provide actionable insights.
Execute end-to-end analytical projects to support business strategy and operational improvements.
Work closely with leadership and cross-functional teams to develop and maintain reports, and dashboards for day-to-day business analysis.
Monitor digital channels (e.g., marketplaces, Google Analytics) to evaluate traffic, conversion, and campaign performance.
Translate raw data into meaningful visualizations and clear recommendations.
Identify trends, gaps, and opportunities through data exploration and logical reasoning.
Ensure data quality, consistency, and integrity across different sources.
Requirements:
Final-year student or recent graduate in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Business Analytics, or a related field.
Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail.Comfortable working with data from marketplaces (e.g., Shopee, Tokopedia) and Google Analytics.
Basic knowledge of Excel, SQL, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio).
Highly data-centric, curious, and enthusiastic with strong problem-solving skills.
Ability to present data findings with clear logic and reasoning.
Strong communication skills and willingness to learn in a fast-paced environment.

Memiliki pengetahuan terkait proses bisnis secara general

tools: SQL, Tableau, Python, R, Power BI
description:
As a Data Analyst embedded in the CEO Office, you will dive deep into data to uncover insights that guide business-critical decisions. Youll be working cross-functionally, presenting analysis to leadership, and gradually transitioning into a Functional Analyst role to help optimize business performance across departments.
What you'll do:
Partner with the CEO Office on high-impact initiatives, from identifying business challenges to delivering data-driven insights.
Build dashboards, reports, and analytical tools to monitor KPIs and strategic goals.
Conduct deep-dive analysis to uncover trends and translate them into actionable recommendations.
Present your findings to senior leadership in a clear, impactful manner both visually and verbally.
Collaborate with multiple departments to understand operational needs and prepare for a future functional role.
Participate in cross-functional projects that shape the banks strategic direction.
Keep your skills sharp by staying updated on the latest in data tools and analytics best practices.
Qualification
:
Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Business Analytics, Economics, or a related field.
Experience in data analytics, business intelligence, or similar roles.
Proficiency in SQL and one or more of: Python, R, Tableau, Power BI.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with a keen business sense.
Excellent communication skills especially in translating data into clear stories for non-technical audiences.
A collaborative team player who can also take initiative and work independently.
Bonus: project management skills and a knack for cross-functional teamwork.
Your Growth Path
:
This role offers a springboard into a more specialized Functional Analyst position, tailored to your strengths and interests. Youll gain a 360° view of the business while building the foundation for long-term career growth in analytics and strategy.

description:
Job Responsibilities
Perform research and analyze requirements.
Determine target environment and/or platform.
Identify high-level business rules for data model.
Adapt conceptual and logical data models to enterprise model.
Validate conceptual and logical data models with clients.
Analyze database relative to other databases.
System activity planning, monitoring and evaluation for Bina Nusantara.
Monitor database system in BINUS units including configuration, security, resource monitoring and reporting, troubleshooting.
Provide excellent service towards user, in relation to the service request, data and information update in BINUS business unit/division.
Design and apply procedures related to data/information request and database in relation to data authorization, change and withdrawal.
Monitor and analyze data synchronization across database in Bina Nusantara.
Ensure all the data complies with legal regulations.
Coordinate with other IT departments to maintain good data center.
Maintain the quality of data analyst processes.
Ensure data security and accuracy in all business units/divisions.
Analyze user need and automated data request service by using reporting application (data access).
Gather and document security requirements.
Implement and enforce security requirements.
Maintain and improve security in response to industry developments and user experience.
Protect corporate data.
Provide and support development and production environments.
Plan and deliver user training.
Adapt existing structure to new business environments.
Management Support Activities
Provide report to direct Supervisor.
Suggest improvement process related to activities in area of responsibilities (especially related to time concern, effort and cost).
Perform activities related to Quality Management System.
Perform additional tasks related to key responsibilities as required by Direct Supervisor.
Education Requirement
Minimum Bachelor’s Degree (S1) in Computer Science, or other major related to Data Science (e.g., Math, Statistics, Information System)
Work Exposure/Experience
Minimum 2 years working experience in Information Technology, particularly in database and application
Experienced in SQL programming
Special Skills
Database Management System (DBMS)
Web Services Administration (system and application)

description:
We at Indepay | Setara Networks are here to revolutionize the Indonesian payment ecosystem by introducing one click checkout services in order to make transactions zero-fee, instant, and rewarding for the consumer.
On one side we’re working with financial institutions to enable real-time account to account transfers through our platform, and on the other-side we’re giving consumers a reliable and secure payment experience which is better than anything else they’ve experienced in the Indonesian ecosystem.
🚀 Where We Are Now: Series A Startup with Boundless Opportunities! 🚀
🎯 Our Vision for Payment Transformation:
We’re on a mission to disrupt the traditional online payment landscape. By pioneering a faster, safer, and incredibly simple payment solution, we're challenging the status quo of virtual account payments and setting a new standard for seamless transactions, enabling payment in just 20 seconds powered by open banking regulatory framework.
📲 Strategic partnership with Top Brands:
As we build a new category in one-click fast payments, you'll have the opportunity to work alongside industry leaders, partnering with top-tier D2C brands ranging from telco providers, banks, FnB, and OTT to create a network that redefines the future of online payments.
🚀 Your Opportunity to Innovate:
If you're passionate about innovation and eager to make a significant impact, this is your chance to be part of something truly transformative and create value.
We’re seeking a versatile Business Analyst with a minimum of 3 years of experience, ideally across various functions such as marketing, strategy, business development, or product management. If you're keen to take on challenges, proactive, adaptable, and skilled at leveraging data for decision-making, this role is a great fit for you. We provide you a place to create value and make impact to accelerate the growth of your career!
Join a multicultural team at the epicenter of transforming Indonesia's future payment industry. Seize this rare opportunity to be a game changer in an environment that thrives on innovation and collaboration. Don't miss out on the chance to be part of a live, dynamic company ready to soar to new heights in the coming year.
Ready to simplify and revolutionize transactions? Apply now and let's embark on this exciting journey to reshape the world of payments together! 🚀💳#IndepaySetaraJourney #PaymentsInnovation
What your current role should be like?
Support partnership initiatives and project management including planning for deals, project, strategy, and due diligence utilizing tools like notion, jira, trello, etc.
Analyze and interpret data to identify trends and support business decisions.
Being part of a 0-1 product development cycle in a consumer facing product with at least 10.000 transactions a day.
Develop financial modeling for business cases for partnership project pitch based on each partner’s problem statement and available data.
Assist in developing go-to-market plans and media planning based on business objectives.
Interfacing with external and internal stakeholders in partnership projects for key stakeholder communications.
What will you do?
Create Go-to-market strategies and media plans for multiple initiatives along with a product marketing manager.
Assist in developing compelling product positioning and messaging that resonates with our target audience.
Engage with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs and provide insights.
Craft business case and monetization model based on each partner’s business needs.
Propose strategies to optimize operations, product performance, and overall business outcomes.
Streamline projects and campaign executions, ensuring proper tracking, documentation, and follow-up.
Work closely with product development, design, and engineering teams to ensure the successful implementation of growth initiatives.
Requirements
What do you have?
Bachelor's degree or Master’s degree with at least 3-5 years of experience.
Financial Services/Payments industry experience preferred.
Team oriented, collaborative and ability to work with complex and ambiguous environments.
Proven ability to partner, communicate and manage through multiple discipline and organizational groups.
Demonstrated track record of implementing strategic initiatives.
Experience “managing up” building executive level communications and delivering presentations.
Strong in analytics/data science.
How do you do it?
You thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment, and are hands-on, independent, self-motivated and fast learner.
You deliver on your commitments without fail.
You have an analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work and have the ability to develop clear & concise documentation.
You are always energetic and work well under pressure.
You are affable and know your way around the organization.
You have excellent communication skills and have the ability to impact and influence.
You have an unparalleled attitude and determination to succeed against all odds.
You can multi-task and have excellent time management and prioritization skills.
You are a strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage.
You have excellent problem solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution.
You have a keen eye for detail.
You stay positive and bring out the best in a team.
You are independent, self-motivated and a fast learner.
Patience and perseverance are your key attributes.
Benefits
What do we offer?
You will be working alongside other passionate and talented people in a beautiful, spacious and well lighted office with all the perks and flexibility of a coveted technology product company. Besides, you will have a sense of purpose and excitement as we offer:
An opportunity to make a positive impact on the world by providing basic financial services to unbanked and underbanked people worldwide.
An opportunity to define and develop a product for the global market.
An opportunity to be part of the core team who will build a global company and define its culture and processes.
An opportunity to move horizontally or vertically across geographies through multiple career paths.
An opportunity to work at the frontier of modern banking solutions technology.
Of course, we do have competitive salaries, long term incentives and many other generous benefits. We promote entrepreneurship culture and look forward to a budding ground for future entrepreneurs.

have the opportunity to work alongside industry leaders, partnering with top-tier d2c brands ranging from telco providers, banks, fnb, and ott to create a network that redefines the future of online payments. 🚀 your opportunity to innovate: if you're passionate about innovation and eager to make a significant impact, this is your chance to be part of something truly transformative and create value. we’re seeking a versatile business analyst with a minimum of 3 years of experience, ideally across various functions such as marketing, strategy, business development, or product management. if you're keen to take on challenges, proactive, adaptable, and skilled at leveraging data for decision-making, this role is a great fit for you. we provide you a place to create value and make impact to accelerate the growth of your career! join a multicultural team at the epicenter of transforming indonesia's future payment industry. seize this rare opportunity to be a game changer in an environment that thrives on innovation and collaboration. don't miss out on the chance to be part of a live, dynamic company ready to soar to new heights in the coming year. ready to simplify and revolutionize transactions? apply now and let's embark on this exciting journey to reshape the world of payments together! 🚀💳#indepaysetarajourney #paymentsinnovation what your current role should be like? support partnership initiatives and project management including planning for deals, project, strategy, and due diligence utilizing tools like notion, jira, trello, etc. analyze and interpret data to identify trends and support business decisions. being part of a 0-1 product development cycle in a consumer facing product with at least 10.000 transactions a day. develop financial modeling for business cases for partnership project pitch based on each partner’s problem statement and available data. assist in developing go-to-market plans and media planning based on business objectives. interfacing with external and internal stakeholders in partnership projects for key stakeholder communications. what will you do? create go-to-market strategies and media plans for multiple initiatives along with a product marketing manager. assist in developing compelling product positioning and messaging that resonates with our target audience. engage with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs and provide insights. craft business case and monetization model based on each partner’s business needs. propose strategies to optimize operations, product performance, and overall business outcomes. streamline projects and campaign executions, ensuring proper tracking, documentation, and follow-up. work closely with product development, design, and engineering teams to ensure the successful implementation of growth initiatives. requirements what do you have? bachelor's degree or master’s degree with at least 3-5 years of experience. financial services/payments industry experience preferred. team oriented, collaborative and ability to work with complex and ambiguous environments. proven ability to partner, communicate and manage through multiple discipline and organizational groups. demonstrated track record of implementing strategic initiatives. experience “managing up” building executive level communications and delivering presentations. strong in analytics/data science. how do you do it? you thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment, and are hands-on, independent, self-motivated and fast learner. you deliver on your commitments without fail. you have an analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work and have the ability to develop clear & concise documentation. you are always energetic and work well under pressure. you are affable and know your way around the organization. you have excellent communication skills and have the ability to impact and influence. you have an unparalleled attitude and determination to succeed against all odds. you can multi-task and have excellent time management and prioritization skills. you are a strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage. you have excellent problem solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution. you have a keen eye for detail. you stay positive and bring out the best in a team. you are independent, self-motivated and a fast learner. patience and perseverance are your key attributes. benefits what do we offer? you will be working alongside other passionate and talented people in a beautiful, spacious and well lighted office with all the perks and flexibility of a coveted technology product company. besides, you will have a sense of purpose and excitement as we offer: an opportunity to make a positive impact on the world by providing basic financial services to unbanked and underbanked people worldwide. an opportunity to define and develop a product for the global market. an opportunity to be part of the core team who will build a global company and define its culture and processes. an opportunity to move horizontally or vertically across geographies through multiple career paths. an opportunity to work at the frontier of modern banking solutions technology. of course, we do have competitive salaries, long term incentives and many other generous benefits. we promote entrepreneurship culture and look forward to a budding ground for future entrepreneurs.

description:
Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab
1.     Pengumpulan & Pengolahan Data
·       Mengumpulkan data penjualan harian dari marketplace (Shopee, Tokopedia, TikTok Shop, Lazada) dan website.
·       Memastikan data akurat, rapi, dan terintegrasi.
·       Membuat dashboard/rekap laporan penjualan.
2.     Analisis Penjualan
·       Menganalisis tren penjualan (produk terlaris, jam/ hari penjualan tertinggi, repeat order).
·       Mengidentifikasi pola pembelian pelanggan (demografi, preferensi parfum, ukuran botol, dll).
·       Melakukan analisis profitabilitas (margin, diskon, biaya iklan).
3.     Monitoring Campaign & Promo
·       Mengevaluasi efektivitas campaign marketing (ads, promo bundling, flash sale).
·       Mengukur conversion rate dari traffic iklan ke penjualan.
·       Memberikan insight apakah promo menguntungkan atau tidak.
4.     Reporting & Insight
·       Membuat laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan untuk tim sales & marketing.
·       Memberikan rekomendasi berbasis data untuk strategi penjualan berikutnya.
·       Membantu Head of Marketing dalam pengambilan keputusan berbasis data.
⸻
Kualifikasi
·       Pendidikan S1 Statistik, Matematika, Ekonomi, Manajemen, atau bidang terkait.
·       Berpengalaman min. 1–2 tahun sebagai Data Analyst (lebih disukai di e-commerce atau FMCG).
·       Mampu mengolah data dengan Excel/Google Sheets, SQL, dan BI Tools (Tableau/Power BI/Looker Studio).
·       Analitis, detail-oriented, dan mampu memberikan insight yang actionable

description:
Job Description
Data Management: Ensure accurate, secure, and efficient handling of AstraPay’s data, supporting effective decision-making and operational efficiency.
Data Governance
: Establish the policies, standards, and processes for managing AstraPay’s data assets, ensuring quality, security, and compliance throughout AstraPay's data lifecycle.
Data Compliance
: Ensure that AstraPay’s data management practices adhere to relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards, safeguarding against legal and regulatory risks.
Data Analytics & Insights
: Examine and interpret AstraPay's complex data sets to identify patterns, trends, and insights that inform decision-making and drive business strategies.
Data Monetization
: Leverage AstraPay’s data assets to create new revenue opportunities and business value through data strategies, such as offering data-driven services, or enhancing product offerings
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. Experienced in data analytic will be prefered
Proficiency in data management tools, analytics platforms and programming languages for data analysis (SQL, Power BI, Python, etc)
Strong ability to analyze complex data, identify trends and insights, and translate findings into actionable business strategies
Strong communication and teamwork skills
Strong attention to data accuracy and integrity, ensuring high-quality data across all business units

description:
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or a related field. Advanced degrees or relevant certifications (e.g., PMP, CBAP) are a plus.
Minimum of 2-3 years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably within the financial services or forex trading industry.
Proficiency in business analysis tools and software such as Microsoft Excel, Visio, SQL, and data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Strong understanding of business processes, financial markets, and the forex trading industry.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets.
Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex information clearly and concisely.
Experience in managing projects, including planning, execution, and monitoring.
Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities.
Job Description
Analyze existing business processes within operations to identify inefficiencies and areas for improvement.
Conduct market research to understand industry trends, competitor strategies, and customer needs.
Gather, analyze, and interpret business data to inform strategic decisions and improve business operations.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements for new projects and initiatives.
Develop and propose business solutions that align with company goals and enhance operational efficiency.
Prepare detailed reports, business models, and documentation to support business strategies and decision-making processes.
Lead or participate in project teams to implement business solutions and ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
Work with product team to gather required information from stakeholders and suggest improvement to the current product or next product development

description:
Business Analyst
Jakarta - Indonesia
About us
We are a global technology company, driving energy innovation for a balanced planet.​
Together, we create amazing technology that unlocks access to energy for the benefit of all.​
Our inclusive culture is the key to our success. We collaborate with our internal community of colleagues, alumni, and our valued external partners to support each other and achieve our goals. We aim to raise the bar high. We look for people who are committed to innovation and success and act with integrity to become and be a part of one of the most diverse group of experts in our industry, anywhere around the globe.
Global in outlook, local in practice – and with a united, shared passion for discovering solutions, we hire talented, driven people and support them to succeed, personally and professionally.
Job Description
The Division GeoUnit Business Analyst is responsible for accounting, reporting and consolidating financial results for the Division within the GeoUnit. This person provides financial support to the Division GeoUnit Controller and Managers by assessing business trends, developing root causes of business issues, complying with Division's accounting practices and identifying opportunities for reduced costs and improved productivity/efficiency.
Roles and Responsibilities:
Monitor and report on the Division’s key performance indicators and objectives within the GeoUnit.
Support the Division GeoUnit Controller in managing the profitability and cash generation of the GeoUnit.
Identify at-risk receivables and follow up with Sales and the customer to ensure overall reduction in receivables and days to invoice ratio.
Assist in review of key tenders (risks and opportunities), contractual terms and evaluate impact on contribution margin associated with pricing in bids vs. optimization of people/resources (i.e. FA, Inventory, M&S...).
Assist in monitoring the working capital for the Division within the GeoUnit; by understanding Materials Management processes to assess and track efficiency metrics, and optimization of inventory level.
Highlight trends in cost inflation and identify opportunities to save and reduce discretionary spend to Supply Chain.
Apply Division specific accounting complexities such as cost and revenue recognition as well as Division Financial Procedures.
Analyse utilization ratios for tools and people with a view to highlighting inefficient locations or Business Lines and identifying opportunities to maximize the value of resources.
Assist in coordination of quarterly and annual financial forecasts and plans.
Analyze Customer Contract Financial Performance
Complete monthly financial reviews and reports, monitor results versus objectives, highlight underlying reasons for variances, and suggest corrective actions.
Ensure compliance with Sarbanes-Oxley requirements as defined in the risk control matrix.
Support internal and external audits.
Qualifications and Experience:
6-8 years of experience in the relevant field
Hold a minimum bachelor's degree in finance or accounting.
SLB is an equal employment opportunity employer. Qualified applicants are considered without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, or other characteristics protected by law.

position: Business Intelligence Analyst (Freelance and Full Time)
description:
About Luxehouze
Luxehouze is Asia's leading online marketplace platform to buy and sell authentic luxury watches and bag from the likes of Richard Mille, Patek Philippe, Hermes and many more. Established in 2021, Luxehouze was created as a safe marketplace platform with two end customers in mind: both buyers and sellers. We ensure that all luxury goods being sold through our platform are 100% authentic and that our sellers are both credible and trustworthy through our rigorous verification and authentication processes that we have in place.
Responsibilities:
Collect and analyze data from various sources such as databases, spreadsheets, and data warehouses.
Develop and maintain databases, data systems, dashboards, and reports to aid in data analysis and decision-making.
Create and present reports, visualizations, and dashboards to support strategic and operational decision-making.
Develop and maintain performance measurement frameworks and scorecards.
Identify trends, patterns, and insights from data to assist in identifying business opportunities and risks.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements.
Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and reliability through regular data quality assessments and cleansing activities.
Identify and address data inconsistencies and anomalies.
Conduct ad-hoc analysis and data mining to answer business questions and solve problems.
Requirement & Qualifications:
Having more than 1 year of experience in a similar role, preferably in a business intelligence or data analysis.
Proficiency in SQL for data querying.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Lookr.
Knowledge of statistical analysis and data mining techniques.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to identify data patterns and translate complex data into actionable insights.
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to understand business requirements and priorities.
Understanding of business processes and operations. Having experiences working in inventory analysis or retail will be a plus.
Strong team player with the ability to work collaboratively as part of a team and independently when required.

description:
We at Indepay | Setara Networks are here to revolutionize the Indonesian payment ecosystem by introducing one click checkout services in order to make transactions zero-fee, instant, and rewarding for the consumer.
On one side we’re working with financial institutions to enable real-time account to account transfers through our platform, and on the other-side we’re giving consumers a reliable and secure payment experience which is better than anything else they’ve experienced in the Indonesian ecosystem.
🚀 Where We Are Now: Series A Startup with Boundless Opportunities! 🚀
🎯 Our Vision for Payment Transformation:
We’re on a mission to disrupt the traditional online payment landscape. By pioneering a faster, safer, and incredibly simple payment solution, we're challenging the status quo of virtual account payments and setting a new standard for seamless transactions, enabling payment in just 20 seconds powered by open banking regulatory framework
📲 Strategic partnership with Top Brands:
As we build a new category in one-click fast payments, you'll have the opportunity to work alongside industry leaders, partnering with top-tier D2C brands ranging from telco providers, banks, FnB, and OTT to create a network that redefines the future of online payments.
🚀 Your Opportunity to Innovate:
If you're passionate about innovation and eager to make a significant impact, this is your chance to be part of something truly transformative and create value.
The ideal candidate is expected to be a born leader who is passionate about following through risk mitigation policies and processes, enjoys building new things and has a proven track record of successfully participating in growing businesses and has experience working in similar startups in its Series A stage and beyond.
The Finance Recon Analyst will be responsible for executing the back-end reconciliation process and ensuring that cross-checking existing data and pre-matching between bank and internal reporting are performed. As a Finance and Reconciliation Specialist, you will be responsible for reporting and documentation related to Escrow Account and will be able to display complex quantitative data in a simple, intuitive format, and present findings in a clear and concise manner.
Join a multicultural team at the epicenter of transforming Indonesia's future payment industry. Seize this rare opportunity to be a game changer in an environment that thrives on innovation and collaboration. Don't miss out on the chance to be part of a live, dynamic company ready to soar to new heights in the coming year.
Ready to simplify and revolutionize transactions? Apply now and let's embark on this exciting journey to reshape the world of payments together! 🚀💳#IndepaySetaraJourney #PaymentsInnovation
What your current role should be like?
Finance Operations Expertise:
Hands-on experience in reconciliation processes, managing discrepancies, and ensuring accurate reporting, ideally in dynamic, fast-paced environments like startups.
Problem-Solving & Collaboration:
Skilled in resolving disputes, coordinating with cross-functional teams, and liaising with external stakeholders such as banks or partners.
Data Reporting & Analysis:
Proficient in simplifying complex financial data and delivering actionable insights. Experience with regulatory reports or dashboards is a plus.
Technical Skills:
Strong knowledge of MS Excel, intersystem reconciliation, and familiarity with finance-related tools or software.
Proactive & Strategic:
Adaptable with a solution-oriented mindset, balancing execution and strategic planning in a challenging environment.
What will you do?
In this role, you will execute the back-end reconciliation process while ensuring that:
Cross-checking existing data and pre-matching between bank and internal reporting.
Responsible for reporting and documentation as needed by the Finance Team related to Escrow Account.
Able to display complex quantitative data in a simple, intuitive format and to present findings in a clear and concise manner.
In the case of any dispute amount, involved in the investigation, and collaborate with related partners and stakeholders.
Manage complaints and disputes and close the issues accurately in a timely manner; Interact and interface with various involved parties and entities to ensure the same.
Involve appropriate internal teams to efficiently and effectively handle the complaints/disputes related to the transactions.
Play an integral role in showcasing Indepay as a consumer-friendly organization and best service provider.
Provide insight to management on the offerings through publishing dashboard of the queries and complaints periodically.
Performing independent controls on regulatory reports, Additional controls.
Expertise in performing processes, Basic excel skills.
Intersystem Reconciliation, Breaks Resolution, Running of Controls, ensuring KPIs are met for the process
Ensure highest standards of customer communication & services.
Continuously update yourself with new products and services that are rolled out.
Requirements
What do you have?
For the role, we are hiring professionals who are performing at an exceptional high level in their current profile:
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting/Economy/Management or related field.
3+ years of experience in Finance and Reconciliation.
Ability to display complex quantitative data in a simple, intuitive format and to present findings in a clear and concise manner.
Must be comfortable working in an early stage to growth stage company and should be able to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
Have a proven track record of success in previous roles and have worked in a similar setting, such as a Pre series A-B company will be a plus.
A leader who takes fun in taking risks and understands that taking calculated risks is necessary for growth. They should have the ability to balance risk-taking with sound decision-making to build something innovative and groundbreaking.
Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines, good understanding and judgment under limited supervision and under pressure situations.
Strong ability in effective problem-solving, attention to details, and being able to extract, analyze and work.
Possess a conscientious and meticulous work ethic, have ability to work independently in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex information and manage cross functional teams.
Proficiency in MS Office (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint, etc), with an emphasis on Excel.
How do you do it?
You thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment.
You deliver on your commitments without fail.
You have an analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work.
You are always energetic and work well under pressure.
You are affable and know your way around the organization.
You have excellent communication skills and have the ability to impact and influence.
You have an unparalleled attitude and determination to succeed against all odds.
You can multi-task and have excellent time management and prioritisation skills.
You are a strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage.
You have excellent problem solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution.
You have a keen eye for detail.
You stay positive and bring out the best in a team.
You are independent, self-motivated and a fast learner.
Patience and perseverance are your key attributes.
Benefits
What do we offer?
You will be working alongside other passionate and talented people in a beautiful, spacious and well lighted office with all the perks and flexibility of a coveted technology product company. Besides, you will have a sense of purpose and excitement as we offer:
An opportunity to make a positive impact on the world by providing basic financial services to unbanked and underbanked people worldwide.
An opportunity to define and develop a product for the global market.
An opportunity to be part of the core team who will build a global company and define its culture and processes.
An opportunity to move horizontally or vertically across geographies through multiple career paths.
An opportunity to work at the frontier of modern banking solutions technology.
Of course, we do have competitive salaries, long term incentives and many other generous benefits. We promote entrepreneurship culture and look forward to a budding ground for future entrepreneurs.

Attention to detail and a high level of accuracy

description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menginterpretasikan data operasional pabrik, seperti data produksi, pemeliharaan, dan persediaan, untuk mengidentifikasi tren, pola, dan peluang perbaikan.
Mendesain dan mengembangkan dashboard dan pelaporan yang dapat diakses untuk memantau kinerja pabrik secara real-time.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim pemeliharaan untuk menganalisis penyebab utama downtime dan gangguan produksi, serta memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan.
Berkontribusi dalam pengembangan strategi pemeliharaan prediktif dengan menggunakan analisis data dan pemodelan.
Mengidentifikasi peluang efisiensi biaya dan proses dalam operasi pabrik, dan membuat proposal rekomendasi.
Menyiapkan presentasi dan laporan yang jelas dan persuasif untuk mengomunikasikan temuan dan wawasan kepada manajemen.
Keterampilan, Kualifikasi, dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana dalam bidang Teknik Industri, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Mesin atau disiplin ilmu terkait.
Minimal 1 tahun pengalaman sebagai Analis Data atau Analis Bisnis di industri manufaktur atau tekstil (Terbuka untuk freshgraduate).
Mahir dalam menggunakan Microsoft Excel.
Pengalaman dalam pemodelan prediktif, analisis regresi, dan teknik visualisasi data.
Pemahaman yang baik tentang proses manufaktur tekstil dan konsep pemeliharaan peralatan industri.
Kemampuan komunikasi yang kuat, baik lisan maupun tertulis, dan keterampilan presentasi yang efektif.
Berpikir kritis, berorientasi pada detail, dan kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim.

position: GenAI Creative Optimisation Analyst (Senior Data Analyst)
description:
Established in 2004,
OLIVER
is the world’s first and only specialist in designing, building, and running bespoke in-house agencies and marketing ecosystems for brands. We partner with over 300 clients in 40+ countries and counting. Our unique model drives creativity and efficiency, allowing us to deliver tailored solutions that resonate deeply with audiences.
As a part of
The Brandtech Group
, we're at the forefront of leveraging cutting-edge AI technology to revolutionise how we create and deliver work. Our
AI solutions
enhance efficiency, spark creativity, and drive insightful decision-making, empowering our teams to produce innovative and impactful results.
Role:
GenAI Creative Optimisation Analyst (Senior Data Analyst)
Location:
Jakarta, Indonesia
About the role:
As the only company to exclusively design, build and run in-house marketing agencies, OLIVER (part of the Inside Ideas Group) holds a unique position in the market.
Join us at U-Studio, where we're pioneering the future of generative AI with our brand-new global AI studio function. As a Content Optimisation Analyst, you'll be at the forefront of this innovation, uncovering insights to drive peak performance of our content. Join our dynamic team and be part of shaping the next generation of AI-powered marketing for one of the world's most renowned FMCG brands.
What you will be doing:
Defining, Measuring & Evaluating Success
Set, track, and evaluate KPIs / effectiveness of cross-channel gen AI content (pilots, campaigns, and overall programmes of work).
Craft test, learn, and optimise plans to driving continuous content improvements at every turn and provide robust learning outcomes.
Combine diverse data sources (including generation of meta data) to paint an insightful, actionable picture of content performance, empowering data-driven decision-making.
Utilise various measurement techniques to evaluate effectiveness. Comfortable with various techniques (from last-click attribution to brand lift studies and MMM).
Hacking Insight & Performance
Analyse performance data and map it to creative recommendations, uncovering insights and opportunities to optimise content.
Maximise in-platform audience insights (prompt recommendations), and integrate external sources (e.g. social listening, search, panel data) for improved audience understanding / creative outputs.
Design and maintain dashboards for real-time performance tracking, ensuring we're always ahead of the curve.
Craft analytics solutions to unlock better creative outputs – including 'out of the box' pre-trained predictive models through to building of bespoke models with data science colleagues as required.
Unlocking Potential
Explore and assess emerging data analytics capabilities of Gen AI platforms, leading innovation in content analytics / optimisation.
Stay at the forefront of AI and data analytics advancements, fuelling our pursuit of excellence and identifying novel approaches to enhance analytics / creative outputs.
What you need to be great in this role:
AI, Analytics & Strategic Skills
Hands on experience with the major LLMs and other providers for analytics, data, and insight work.
Possess strong analytics and data-driven experience, driving insights that push boundaries.
Demonstrated expertise in setting diverse measurement frameworks for content, working with data across digital media, content, brand, and meta data.
Embrace an innovative approach to data and consumer insights, pioneering new paths to success.
Leverage interest in applying data to understand audience behaviour.
Technical Proficiency
Deep understanding of ad account setups, metrics, evaluation and how this drives results.
Comfortable aggregating multiple data sources to evaluate effectiveness.
Proficiency with tools such as Brandwatch, Global Web Index, Audiense.
Excel in data storytelling for non-technical audiences, ensuring insights resonate.
Personal Attributes
Possess a keen eye for detail and critical thinking, driving impactful decision-making.
Comfortable thriving in a fast-paced, changing environment.
Has a thirst for continual learning and pushing boundaries, driving innovation at every turn.
Embrace a collaborative, open-minded approach, fostering a culture of teamwork and excellence.

across our community, clients and creations
OLIVER, a part of the Brandtech Group, is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive working environment where all employees are encouraged to reach their full potential, and individual differences are valued and respected. All applicants shall be considered for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, neurodivergence, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by local laws.
OLIVER has set ambitious environmental goals around sustainability, with science-based emissions reduction targets. Collectively, we work towards our mission, embedding sustainability into every department and through every stage of the project lifecycle.

description:
About Us
INDICO is a digital technology subsidiary company of Telkomsel, Indonesia's leading digital telecom company. INDICO plays a strategic role as a holding company that houses current and prospective vertical digital business portfolios, including Kuncie (edu-tech), Fita (health-tech), and Majamojo (game). Moving forward, INDICO aims to explore opportunities in multiple verticals adjacent to Telkomsel’s digital businesses. As a digital platform company, INDICO aims to leverage Telkomsel’s digital assets and capabilities to create a flywheel effect of innovations to develop cross-sectoral digital solutions that will empower Indonesia’s digital economy.
INDICO believe we can reach beyond to empower Indonesians and enable businesses through our strong core values of EPIC WAY (Excellence, Positivity, Impactful Collaboration, Customer First, Walk the Talk, Accountability, Yes-if Mindset).
What you will do but not limited to:
Conduct data analysis to identify anomalies in billing and revenue processes.
Analyzing products to find misconfigurations and inconsistencies.
Perform regular audits of financial transactions and revenue reports.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address discrepancies and improve processes.
Develop and maintain revenue assurance policies and procedures.
Prepare and present detailed reports on revenue assurance findings and recommendations to management.
Monitor telecom revenue streams, ensuring compliance with company standards and industry regulations.
Work closely with finance and accounting teams to align on revenue recognition processes.
Identify opportunities for revenue enhancement and cost optimization.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field.
Has minimum 5 years of experience in Telco industry, experienced in Telco billing, Product management, Data Analytics and Cybersecurity.
Strong understanding of telecom billing product Managementems and revenue recognition practices.
Knowledge of regulatory frameworks governing revenue assurance.
Excellence communication skill, both in Bahasa and English.
Proficient in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, SQL, Tableau).
Detail-oriented with exceptional analytical problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
Self-motivated and able to work both independently and as part of a team.

description:
You are as unique as your background, experience and point of view. Here, you'll be encouraged, empowered and challenged to be your best self. You'll work with dynamic colleagues - experts in their fields - who are eager to share their knowledge with you. Your leaders will inspire and help you reach your potential and soar to new heights. Every day, you'll have new and exciting opportunities to make life brighter for our Clients - who are at the heart of everything we do. Discover how you can make a difference in the lives of individuals, families and communities around the world.
Job Description:
Job description:
The position is responsible for the identification, analysis and development of business requirements for systems development projects; defining and reviewing the design of the proposed system solution; and testing, implementation and documentation of the supported systems used in the assigned business unit; and support for the production problems following the agreed time table and procedure.
Responsibilities:
Identifies areas for improvement/enhancement on existing system on new ones being developed
Determines, analyses, and transform business requirements to produce specifications at the system and programming levels
Facilitates change management by working with various business areas to address issues and potential impact and/or benefits of the changes in the proposed system.
Communicates with the developers for clarification of business requirements and reporting of errors found in the systems being supported
Identifies all possible test scenarios and prepares the test plan for the systems under development
Executes the test plan and conducts the acceptance testing for the developed programs as required.
Prepares and documents manual and system procedures in support of the business needs.
Provides post-implementation and production support for supported systems including analysis of production problems rose by business users
Conducts systems training for the business community as needed
Prepares progress reports within agreed time frames.
Prepares daily time charges reporting
Qualification:
University graduate with a degree in Information Systems, Business Analytics, Computer Science or Mathematics
2-4 years experience in IT field as Business or System Analyst
Knowledge in SDLC process - Initiating, Planning, Executing, Controlling and Closing
Preferably knowledgeable of SQL programming tools
Knowledge in the Life Insurance system and developing system documentations
Must be familiar with Office Automation tools such as MS Office, MS Project, Visio and Lotus Notes
Possesses strong analytical, conceptual skills, good verbal and written communication skills in English as well as good interpersonal skill
Job Category:
Business Analysis - Systems
Posting End Date:
30/12/2025

description:
Company Description
PT Bank Nationalnobu Tbk (Nobu Bank) is committed to addressing the diverse needs of today's banking world. With a vision to reach global standards, the bank steadily enhances its products and services while consistently improving quality. Leveraging the rapid development of the digital world, Nobu Bank ensures its presence through ever-evolving electronic channels to meet the increasing mobile needs of society. Nobu Bank is licensed and regulated by the Financial Services Authority (OJK) and Bank Indonesia (BI), and is a member of the Deposit Insurance Corporation (LPS).
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Threat Intelligence Analyst located in Kecamatan Karawaci. The Threat Intelligence Analyst will be responsible for monitoring and analyzing cyber threats, creating threat assessments, and developing mitigation strategies. The analyst will also collect and analyze data from various sources to identify potential security risks, work closely with the cybersecurity team to enhance threat detection, and provide actionable intelligence to support incident response efforts. Additionally, the role involves staying informed about the latest cybersecurity trends and hacking techniques.
Qualifications
Experience in monitoring and analyzing cyber threats
Knowledge of threat assessment and mitigation strategies
Proficiency in data collection and analysis from various sources
Strong understanding of cybersecurity trends and hacking techniques
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to work well in a team and communicate effectively
Relevant certifications such as CEH, CISSP, or equivalent are a plus
Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity, Information Technology, or a related field
Experience in the banking or financial sector is highly desirable
Fresh Graduates are welcome

description:
Level : Analis
Industri : Transportasi
Penempatan : HO, Jakarta Timur
Tugas & Tanggung Jawab
Melakukan analisis harga produk/jasa berdasarkan biaya operasional, tren pasar, kompetitor, dan proyeksi permintaan.
Mengembangkan dan mengevaluasi strategi harga yang mendukung peningkatan pendapatan serta daya saing perusahaan.
Menyusun model analisis harga menggunakan tools data analytics (SQL, Python/R, Excel, Tableau/Power BI).
Melakukan analisis spasial dengan GIS untuk mendukung perencanaan jaringan transportasi dan evaluasi rute.
Memantau dan menganalisis indikator kinerja transportasi (misalnya load factor, jarak tempuh, produktivitas).
Memberikan rekomendasi kebijakan harga yang aplikatif untuk mendukung efisiensi operasional dan peningkatan profitabilitas.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim Finance, Manajemen Strategi, Operasional, dan Marketing dalam penetapan kebijakan harga.
Menyusun laporan analisis harga dan menyajikan hasil dalam bentuk visualisasi yang mudah dipahami manajemen.
Melakukan evaluasi berkala atas efektivitas kebijakan harga yang diterapkan serta mengusulkan perbaikan berkelanjutan.
Menjaga akurasi, konsistensi, dan integritas data yang digunakan untuk pengambilan keputusan.
Kualifikasi
Pendidikan minimal S1 dari jurusan Ekonomi, Manajemen, Statistika, Teknik Industri, atau Perencanaan Wilayah & Kota.
Pengalaman kerja 2–3 tahun di bidang Analisis Harga, Keuangan, Transportasi, atau Pengembangan Strategi Harga.
Mahir menggunakan tools analisis data: SQL untuk query dan pengolahan data, GIS (spasial) untuk analisis wilayah dan jaringan, Python/R untuk analisis statistik dan pemodelan, Excel tingkat lanjut, dan Tableau/Power BI untuk visualisasi data.
Memahami dasar-dasar perencanaan jaringan transportasi dan indikator kinerja rute (load factor, jarak tempuh, produktivitas).
Memiliki kemampuan analitis dan berpikir kritis, teliti, serta mampu menyusun rekomendasi berbasis data yang praktis dan aplikatif.
Komunikatif dan mampu menyajikan hasil analisis dalam bentuk presentasi yang jelas kepada berbagai level pemangku kepentingan.
Adaptif terhadap perubahan, proaktif dalam mencari solusi, dan mampu bekerja dalam tim lintas fungsi.

description:
Our insurance client is seeking an
IT Business Analyst
to join their team. This role is essential for mapping and automating business processes, gathering and translating business requirements, and developing test scenarios and cases. The ideal candidate will have a strong proficiency in data analysis and a keen attention to detail.
Responsibilities
Conduct thorough analysis of business processes to identify areas for improvement and automation.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and translate business requirements into functional specifications.
Design and develop comprehensive test scenarios and test cases to ensure the accuracy and effectiveness of business solutions.
Perform detailed data analysis to support decision-making and identify trends or anomalies.
Ensure high attention to detail and accuracy in all aspects of work, including documentation and data analysis.
Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for implemented business solutions.
Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to ensure alignment and understanding of project goals and deliverables.

2 years
of relevant experience in a similar role.

business process mapping
and
automation
, with a strong understanding of methodologies and tools.

into actionable plans.

test scenarios
and
test cases
, with a focus on thoroughness and accuracy.

data analysis
, including the ability to interpret complex data sets and provide actionable insights.

detail and accuracy
, ensuring all work is meticulously checked and validated.

General Insurance knowledge as an advantage.
Available to join immediately.
Work Arrangement
Employment type: Outsourced-Contract.
Contract duration: 6 months (with extension possibility).
Location: South Jakarta.
Work type: On-Site/Work from Office (WFO).

mengembangkan prototipe/simulasi untuk bisa di ujicoba kepada stakeholder, agar stakeholder memiliki keyakinan atas requirement yang diminta telah dikerjakan oleh Software Engineer.

Translate business needs into functional specifications for IT systems.

Fluent in English and Bahasa Indonesia both written and spoken

description:
Get to Know the Team
We drive innovation and operational excellence by turning data into actionable strategies that elevate the end-to-end experience for consumers, driver-partners, and merchant-partners. From optimizing transaction flows and platform efficiency to enhancing reliability, we strive to make Grab the first choice, every time.
Get to Know the Role
You will report to the Product Analytics Manager, Business Platform and you'll have the unique opportunity to collaborate across disciplines (Product, Business, Engineering, Design, Data Science) to transform data into dynamic solutions. Your insights will directly contribute to developing groundbreaking products and initiatives, setting new benchmarks for excellence. This isn't just any role; it's a chance to make a tangible impact on millions of lives every day.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will understand our requirements and outcomes to ensure data-driven decision-making.
You will conduct tailored analyses for specific products and operations, define critical business metrics, track them rigorously, and recommend continuous improvements.
You will frame business scenarios and propose features that impact critical business processes and decisions.
You will transform requirements into concise insights through reports, presentations, and dashboards, and consolidate data from multiple sources to create comprehensive views for decision-making.
You will develop data pipelines and custom data science models to solve identified problems.
You will launch A/B tests, analyze the results, and provide recommendations based on your findings.
You will be a pioneer in the adoption of Gen AI across functions, and leverage Gen AI to optimize product features, business operations, and internal productivity.

Karena ekspansi dan pembukaan cabang baru yang pesat, jenjang karier Anda di Bank AKP akan semakin terbuka lebar dengan peluang promosi yang lebih cepat bagi karyawan berprestasi dan berdedikasi. Program pelatihan pengembangan profesional.
Lingkungan kerja yang suportif dan dinamis.

Job Description:
Job description:
The position is responsible for the identification, analysis and development of business requirements for systems development projects; defining and reviewing the design of the proposed system solution; and testing, implementation and documentation of the supported systems used in the assigned business unit; and support for the production problems following the agreed time table and procedure.
Responsibilities:
Identifies areas for improvement/enhancement on existing system on new ones being developed
Determines, analyses, and transform business requirements to produce specifications at the system and programming levels
Facilitates change management by working with various business areas to address issues and potential impact and/or benefits of the changes in the proposed system.
Communicates with the developers for clarification of business requirements and reporting of errors found in the systems being supported
Identifies all possible test scenarios and prepares the test plan for the systems under development
Executes the test plan and conducts the acceptance testing for the developed programs as required.
Prepares and documents manual and system procedures in support of the business needs.
Provides post-implementation and production support for supported systems including analysis of production problems rose by business users
Conducts systems training for the business community as needed
Prepares progress reports within agreed time frames.
Prepares daily time charges reporting
Qualification:
University graduate with a degree in Information Systems, Business Analytics, Computer Science or Mathematics
2-4 years experience in IT field as Business or System Analyst
Knowledge in SDLC process – Initiating, Planning, Executing, Controlling and Closing
Preferably knowledgeable of SQL programming tools
Knowledge in the Life Insurance system and developing system documentations
Must be familiar with Office Automation tools such as MS Office, MS Project, Visio and Lotus Notes
Possesses strong analytical, conceptual skills, good verbal and written communication skills in English as well as good interpersonal skill
Job Category:
Business Analysis - Systems
Posting End Date:
30/12/2025

description:
Make an impact with NTT DATA
Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion – it’s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive.
Your day at NTT DATA
The Senior Associate Business Analyst is a developing subject matter expert, responsible for working with internal and external clients to determine requirements and to define solutions to address business, process and systems problems, and improvements in the organization.
Working under supervision when needed, this role acts as a liaison among stakeholders in order to understand the structure, policies, and operations of an organization, and to recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals.
Key responsibilities:
Acts as a bridge between the business problems and the technology solutions.
Supports the analysis, transformation and ultimately works towards resolving business problems with the help of technology.
Works with internal clients and applies best practice methodologies to determine business requirements and to define solutions to address business, process, information and system problems, improvements or change.
Delivers business projects in line with sponsor requirements and enterprise architecture.
Proactively develops and deploys enhanced services and platforms, covering all the functional aspects from service/product definition through to build and deployment.
Ensures the identification and documentation of operational gaps including user guides, templates, test cases and related user training.
Assists with the resolution of issues pertaining to the service.
Adheres to and follow the relevant development and support processes.
Communicates and escalates if any issues arise or deliverables cannot be met and request assistance to ensure closure of issues.
Takes responsibility for delivery of project elements under relevant guidance and supervision.
Performs any other related task as required.
To thrive in this role, you need to have:
Developing understanding of business practices and processes.
Team player who displays good client service orientation with well-developed administrative and organization skills.
Developing expertise in specific systems, processes and technologies that they will be required to analyze.
Meticulous attention to detail whilst working under pressure.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to listen empathetically.
Ability to build rapport and engage effectively with a variety of stakeholders.
Knowledge of project management methodology.
Good analytical skills with the ability to convert business requirements into operational deliverables (functional requirements) to meet business objectives.
Good documentation skills, in particular, functional requirements, test cases, system user documentation, processes and procedures and presentations.
Wworking knowledge of Microsoft Exchange, Word, Excel Project, PowerPoint and Visio
Understanding of systems generally used in a services organization e.g. ServiceNow, Siebel, Remedy, SAP, EMS would be advantageous.

On-site Working

NTT DATA is a $30+ billion trusted global innovator of business and technology services. We serve 75% of the Fortune Global 100 and are committed to helping clients innovate, optimize and transform for long-term success. description:
📝 What You'll Do
1. Audience Insights & Narrative
Conduct customer research to identify growth & retention opportunities.
Segment users and prioritize marketing opportunities.
Shape positioning & borrower-facing messaging for new features.
2. Campaign Development & Execution
Plan & execute CRM campaigns: push notifications, WhatsApp nudges, SMS, & in-app.
Manage campaign workflows: targeting, scheduling, copywriting, testing, & reporting.
Design and launch retention and awareness campaigns such as renewal reminders, promotional offers, and seasonal campaigns.
3. Operational CRM Management
Own and optimize the CRM platform: manage customer databases, audience lists, templates, and automation workflows.
Set up A/B tests for campaign timing, messaging, and channels to improve engagement and repayment rates.
4. Measurement & Reporting
Track and analyze campaign performance across key metrics (open rate, CTR, CVR)
Provide reporting on marketing impact, flagging risks and opportunities proactively.
Collaborate with ops team to refine dashboards and feed insights back into the product roadmap.
5. Customer Advocacy & Cross-Functional Collaboration
Act as the voice of the customer in campaign and product discussions.
Work with design, comms, ops, and product to deliver consistent, customer-centered experiences.
✒️ You’re a Great Fit If You
1–2 years experience in CRM, digital marketing, or product marketing (fintech/retail/e-commerce a plus).
Familiarity with CRM platforms (Netcore, MoEngage, Infobip, or equivalent).
Analytical skills with comfort in Excel/SQL/BI tools to measure campaign effectiveness.
Strong project management and attention to detail for running high-volume campaigns.
Clear communication and copywriting skills for customer-facing messaging
Comfortable working in a fast-paced, high-growth environment with minimal handholding.

Scope, analyze, and develop business insight.
Provide consultancy with customers to identify business challenges by eliciting requirements and to provide solution with activities leading to high value-business solutions to overcome customer’s business issues.
Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, developing and implementing solutions to formulate new business programs and initiatives.
Presenting solutions in written or oral reports.

Proactive update continuously regarding update progress.

Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills.
The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.
Growth mindset and excited to work on a variety of functional areas
Good attitude and commitment towards work as well good team player.
Having Agile (Scrum) knowledge is a plus point
