description:
Job Description
Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?
Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.
You deliver detailed continuous business and customer analysis and insight with a focus on driving best practice through simplification, system integration, analyzing data, consistency by providing insights to improve business processes and decision-making. This role requires a strong understanding of data integration, SAP systems, Power BI, Python, and SQL.
How you will contribute:
Data Analysis and Integration:
Collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources, including SAP and other internal databases.
Develop and maintain data integration processes to ensure data quality and consistency.
Identify and troubleshoot data discrepancies.
System Analysis and Support:
Analyze existing systems and processes to identify areas for improvement.
Collaborate with IT and business stakeholders to design and implement new solutions.
Provide technical support and training to users.
Reporting and Visualization:
Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs).
Present data insights and recommendations to stakeholders.
Programming and Scripting:
Utilize Python and SQL to automate data analysis and reporting tasks.
Develop and maintain scripts for data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
SAP Support:
Work with SAP data and systems to extract relevant information.
Understand SAP data structures and tables.
What you will bring
A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career and the following experience and knowledge:
Relevant experience in IT and sales
Knowledge of sales processes and systems
Facilitation skills to demonstrate use and functionality of sales systems
Problem-solving skills
Qualifications:
Education:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related field.
Experience:
*   Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Data and System Analyst or in a
similar role.
*   Proven experience with data integration techniques and tools.
*   Experience with SAP systems and data structures.
Technical Skills:
*   Proficiency in SQL for data querying and manipulation.
*   Strong programming skills in Python for data analysis and automation.
*   Experience with Power BI for data visualization and reporting.
*   Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
Soft Skills:
*   Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
*   Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
*   Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
*   Ability to present technical information to non-technical audiences.
No Relocation support available
Business Unit Summary
Mondelēz International in Southeast Asia is in five countries serving 19 markets with more than 18 nationalities and 7,500 employees. This group is emerging as one of the fastest growing regions in Asia, the Middle East and Africa, and we are proud of consistently producing high quality products in nine manufacturing sites. We are market leaders in key snacking categories, making and selling brands like Oreo and Tiger biscuits, Kinh Do mooncakes, Jacob’s crackers, Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate, Tang powdered beverage, Halls candy and Eden cheese. We set the benchmark in being a responsible business and contributing to the communities in which we operate.
Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Job Type
RegularSales OperationsSales

Menyampaikan visi produk kepada tim pengembang.8. Melakukan tinjauan berkala terhadap progres proyek dan menyesuaikan roadmap sesuai kebutuhan.9. Menjadi penghubung antara pengguna dan tim teknis selama proses pengembangan.10. Menjalankan Scrum Daily Update untuk memantau jalannya pekerjaan.Kualifikasi:1. Minimal lulusan S1 (jurusan terkait diutamakan).2. Memiliki pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai Product Owner.3. Memahami proses bisnis keuangan, akuntansi, rekonsiliasi, dan pembayaran (menjadi nilai tambah).4. Memahami proses investasi merupakan nilai tambah.5. Pengalaman bekerja di perusahaan asuransi atau keuangan lebih diutamakan.6. Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan negosiasi yang kuat.7. Mampu berbahasa Inggris dengan baik.8. Memiliki keterampilan teknis atau pemahaman terkait pemrograman akan menjadi nilai tambah.

position: 2026 Asia Analyst Development Program - Summer Analyst - Indonesia
description:
Job Description
Join our Asia Analyst Development Program as a Summer Analyst to gain hands-on experience, contribute to key projects, and develop professional skills in a revenue or non-revenue generating area of the bank. Work with industry experts in a collaborative team, where diverse perspectives and innovative ideas are valued.
Interns will gain exposure to our ASEAN franchise, learning across revenue and non-revenue divisions, including front, middle, and back-office roles. Experience the breadth of functions within the bank and understand how our businesses collaborate to deliver client value.
This 9-week internship serves as a talent pipeline for our full-time rotational program in Indonesia, and successful interns may receive an offer for the 2027 full-time Asia Analyst Development Program, with opportunities to work with various teams within the Indonesia location of the ASEAN franchise.
Job Responsibilities
As a Summer Analyst in the Asia Analyst Development Program, focus on the Indonesia market and clientele in assignments or roles that expect you to:
Collaborate with professionals to drive growth and innovation.
Ensure operational effectiveness and manage risk while upholding the highest standards.
Work on process improvements and client engagement.
Required qualifications, capabilities, and skills
Pursuing a degree qualification with a well-rounded academic background and expected graduation between December 2026 and June 2027.
Demonstrated proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to thrive in ever-changing environments.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.
A proactive, responsive team player who excels in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
Aptitude for digesting large amounts of information and developing innovative solutions with strong attention to detail.
Enthusiasm for financial services and a desire to participate in a rotational program across all lines of business.
Relevant internship experience and demonstrated leadership in school or community organizations.
Knowledge of Bahasa Indonesia is essential.
Holding the right to work and necessary work authorizations. Note that relocation assistance for flight and accommodation is not provided, and work visa sponsorship is not available.
Join Us
At JPMorganChase, we're creating positive change for the communities we serve. We do this by championing your innovative ideas through a supportive culture that helps you every step of the way as you build your career. If you're passionate, curious and ready to make an impact, we're looking for you.
Application Deadline:
November 30, 2025
Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We strongly encourage you to submit your application as early as possible, as programs will close once positions are filled.
What's Next?
Help us learn about you by submitting a complete and thoughtful application, including your resume. Your application and resume are our initial way to get to know you, so it's important to complete all relevant application questions to provide us with as much information as possible. After confirming your application, we will review it to determine if you meet the required qualifications.
If you advance to the next step, you'll receive an email invitation to complete a video interview powered by HireVue. This is your opportunity to bring your resume to life and showcase your experience to our recruiting team and hiring managers. The HireVue interview is required, and your application will not be considered for further review until you complete this step. We strongly encourage you to apply and complete these elements promptly, as programs will close once positions are filled.
About Us
We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs.
©2025 JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPMorgan Chase is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer, including Disability/Veteran
About Us
JPMorganChase, one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world's most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.
We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. We also make reasonable accommodations for applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as mental health or physical disability needs. Visit our FAQs for more information about requesting an accommodation.
About the Team
Our professionals in our Corporate Functions cover a diverse range of areas from finance and risk to human resources and marketing. Our corporate teams are an essential part of our company, ensuring that we're setting our businesses, clients, customers and employees up for success.

description:
Get to Know the Team
Join the Commercial Team at Grab - a dynamic team shaping the future within Grab that helps to simplify business transportation, corporate food and package deliveries and related services for companies across Southeast Asia.
Get to Know the Role
We are looking for a Sales Compensation Analyst to join our team onsite in South Jakarta, Indonesia. You will design, manage, and analyse sales compensation plans that motivate, reward, and also increase sales performance. You will report to the Sales Compensation Manager, and will work fully on-site.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Establish target configurations for each OKR metric at the individual level.
Create financial models to forecast sales compensation costs and impact.
Manage the sales compensation administration process nationwide, including a tracker, calculation and validation of commissions and bonuses at the end of each month and collaborate with other teams for disbursements.
Conduct analyses and discussion of sales OKR performance data metrics, targets and compensation structures, with the respective stakeholders to ensure smooth OKR implementation that leading to actionable insights to improve sales team performance.
Liaise with Analytics team to retrieve data to track sales performance
Contribute to internal projects designed to support the sales team and ensure compliance with company policies and regulations.
Communicate and provide training regarding compensation plans and the tools to the sales team and Serve as the contact for compensation plan inquiries, addressing questions from the sales team.

description:
Job Title
: Junior Analyst
Location
: Jak (or remote)
Company Information
: Daniel P. O’Reilly and Company (DPO&Co.) is a boutique strategy consulting firm that specializes in rapidly delivering value to our clients. We engage with Private Equity firms and traditional corporate clients on projects similar to those done at A.T Kearney, McKinsey, Bain, BCG, Strategy&, etc. Additionally, our BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) services are specifically targeted to mid-market clients to improve any inefficiency in the back-office functions by leveraging labor cost arbitrage and time zone difference. BPO performs several services, including Finance & Accounting, CRM, Supply Chain, Data Analytics, HR, Admin functions, and many more based on our client’s specific needs. After several successful years and completing over 50 engagements, we have also entered the Principal Investing arena, closing our first deal on a Printed Circuit Board Manufacturing company in September 2020.  The team spans globally with team members in Chicago, Puerto Rico, Denver, New Delhi, Colombia, Indonesia, and Philippines. Our BPO team has tripled since 2020 and we are looking for new team members who could elevate our team’s experience and skills to the next level!
Job Description
Provide support to Business Analysts in executing client projects related to consulting, market research, and/or BPO work execution
Conduct end-to-end data gathering, perform insightful analysis to develop presentations on the ‘so-what’ recommendation for client deliverables
Support team in other capacity such as business development and internal firm-building activities, including but not limited to, prepare research dossier and potential clienteles
Perform miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned
Key Qualifications / Experience
Sophomore, Junior or Senior
Undergraduates
pursuing Engineering / Economics / Business degree with min 3.4 GPA.
Conform to our values: honest with integrity, humble, respectful, and fair, committed and has exceptional analytical skills
Highest of ethical standards; stands up for those without a voice and consistently does the “right thing”- no jerks allowed
Good track record in team working situation, able to communicate in situation with high level of diversity.
Ability to multitask and organize between projects, and work under pressure, willing to roll up their sleeves to get things done in the best way possible.
Having a growth mindset and problem-solving skills, energized to discover new things and find the way to clear up various issues.
Strong communication and
English proficiency
(both oral and written)
Candidates must be able to produce results in a fast-paced, intellectually intense, client-oriented environment
Strong Microsoft Word & Excel skills with basic functions. Having Microsoft PowerPoint experience would be a plus
Commit to work
40 hours/week.
Available to join
immediately
Please visit our website at www.dpoandco.com to learn more about us!

description:
Position Overview
Insurance Operation Analyst bertanggung jawab memastikan seluruh proses klaim dan polis asuransi berjalan akurat, valid, dan sesuai standar masing-masing provider. Posisi ini berfokus pada
analisis gap saldo/data
,
validasi dokumen
, serta
optimisasi prosedur
agar klaim dapat diproses 100% sesuai kriteria approval perusahaan asuransi.
Key Responsibilities
Melakukan
validasi saldo
(balance checking) antara data internal dengan laporan asuransi; mengidentifikasi dan menjelaskan alasan perbedaan sebelum klaim diajukan.
Menentukan
kelengkapan paperwork
yang dibutuhkan sesuai standar tiap provider (surat keterangan, form klaim, kuitansi asli, dsb.).
Mengarahkan tim agar memilih
jenis prosedur yang tepat
pada sistem asuransi (misalnya kode tindakan/procedure name sesuai guideline masing-masing provider).
Mengkaji
format pengisian data
(manual vs sistem) dan memberikan rekomendasi agar sesuai preferensi/aturan provider.
Mengembangkan
checklist klaim
untuk memastikan semua dokumen, kode, dan deskripsi sesuai agar approval dapat mencapai 100%.
Menjadi
subject matter expert
dalam membandingkan requirement antar provider (Hanwha vs Fullerton, dsb.), serta menyusun guideline internal.
Menyusun laporan analisis klaim yang ditolak (reason of rejection), tren error, dan rekomendasi perbaikan.
Berkoordinasi erat dengan provider, broker, dan tim internal (finance/HR) untuk mempercepat penyelesaian klaim.
Qualifications
Pendidikan minimal S1 (Manajemen, Asuransi, Akuntansi, atau bidang terkait).
Pengalaman 2–4 tahun dalam
operasional klaim asuransi/TPA (third party administrator)
.
Memahami detail teknis: balance reconciliation, SLA approval, jenis dokumen legal yang disyaratkan provider.
Terbiasa membaca policy wording dan guideline asuransi.
Kritis, detail-oriented, dan problem solver.
Komunikasi baik dan terbiasa berhubungan dengan banyak stakeholder.

description:
About Igloo
Igloo (formerly Axinan) is the first full-stack insurtech firm to emerge from Singapore. With offices across Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, the Philippines, Vietnam, Malaysia, China and India, Igloo is fueled by a mission of making insurance accessible and affordable for all. Igloos innovation solutions empower companies to eliminate operational risk, drive new revenue streams and optimise and enhance their existing products and services. With a successful Pre-Series C fund round of US$36 million in Dec 2023, Igloo has now raised over US$100 million. The leading regional insurtech firm looks to expand regionally with strategic acquisitions and hiring great talent.
As a passionate team building meaningful solutions to make an impact, we are looking for like-minded individuals to join us at Igloo. At our core, we prioritise teamwork and foster a culture built on strong collaboration and we are looking for talented people like you.
About the role
We are seeking an experienced Data Analyst with a strong focus on reconciliation data skills and quality assurance. to join our dynamic team. As a Data Business Operations Analyst, you will be working with the Operations team.
Job Responsibilities
Data Operations Analysis & Reporting
Collect, process, and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and trends and publish monthly reports to clients.
Develop and maintain performance dashboards and regular reports to track key operational metrics (CS & Claim).
Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to drive business decisions and improvements.
Process Analysis & Optimization:
Conduct thorough process analysis and mapping of current business processes to identify areas of inefficiency to all departments in ID Country Level.
Design and implement new and improved processes to enhance operational efficiency and productivity.
Ensuring adherence to all relevant stakeholders in all departments in ID Country Level, to follow the SOPs properly.
Risk Quality Control & Inspection:
Perform detailed inspections, control monitoring of processes, systems and people to ensure business operational risk assessment alignment with procedures.
Monitor and document quality metrics and performance indicators.
Identify inefficiencies and areas for improvement in existing processes and systems.
Business Operational Excellence:
Ensure business operational excellence comply with industry regulations, standards, and best practices apply to all Department in ID Country Level.
Business Operational excellence to go into the truth of source apply to all business lines.
Stay updated with changes in regulatory requirements and quality standards, liaised with the Legal & Compliance team.
Assist in supporting any internal and or external audit processes.
Job Requirements
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience preferably from Industrial Engineering / Management Business / Information and Communication Technology - Information System fields
Min. 3-5 years of of experience, preferably prior experience working in a high-growth environment, ideally with a mix of experience in MNCs and start up
Have intermediate level experience of Data Analyst, Reconciliation Data skills (formulation in EXCEL Files & Google Sheet), Quality Assurance
Excellence skill in Visio, Project Management, Agile methodologies/framework, SQL - back end data analyst
Excellence knowledge in best practices and common sense of Business Operational Excellence
Strong empathy and positive attitude
Good interpersonal skill & communication skill
Critical thinking skills and growth mindset

description:
What you'll be doing
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements for API integrations, including payment services and partner ecosystems.
Create detailed user stories, acceptance criteria, and process flows to guide the development of API Management solutions.
Facilitate workshops and interviews to align business needs with technical capabilities, ensuring compliance with standards like SNAP BI and OAuth 2.0.
Work with the API Engineer team to ensure APIs meet business requirements and are accessible via the Developer Portal.
Analyze API analytics data (e.g., via Elastic Stack) to provide insights for optimizing business processes and user experience.
Participate in Agile ceremonies (sprint planning, reviews, retrospectives) to ensure timely delivery of project milestones.
Maintain comprehensive documentation for requirements, workflows, and API specifications.
Elicit, analyze, and document system requirements for API Management components (e.g., API Manager, Gateway Service, Analytic Service, Developer Portal) to support technical implementation.
Design system architectures for API Management components, ensuring scalability, security, and compatibility with High Availability (HA) setups across multiple data centers.
Define integration strategies for APIs with backend systems (e.g., SOAP, XML, RPC) and external systems like LDAP, OAuth, Splunk, Syslog, or Kafka.
Incorporate security measures (e.g., OAuth 2.0, SNAP BI compliance) into system designs to mitigate risks.
Support the integration of analytics tools (e.g., Elastic Stack, Splunk, Grafana) into system designs for monitoring API performance and health.
Create system architecture diagrams and technical specifications to guide developers and ensure seamless system integration.
Support Quality Assurance teams by providing technical guidance on system testing, including functional, performance, and security testing, as needed
What we're looking for
Bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, Management Information Systems, or a related field.
3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in banking or financial services.
Strong understanding of API Management concepts, RESTful APIs, and integration protocols (e.g., SOAP, JSON, XML).
Experience with Agile methodologies and tools like Jira, Confluence, or Notion.
Familiarity with security standards such as OAuth 2.0 and SNAP BI.
Knowledge of system architecture design and microservices architecture.
Experience with database systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle) and integration technologies (e.g., Kafka, Redis).
Familiarity with API Management platforms like IBM API Connect or similar tools.
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills to bridge business and technical teams.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights from API analytics tools.
Ability to create technical documentation, including system architecture diagrams and integration workflow.
Knowledge of banking processes (e.g., payment systems, fund management) is a plus.
## Preferred Skills
- Experience with IBM API Connect or similar API Management platforms.
- Proficiency in creating API documentation for Developer Portals.
- Familiarity with analytics tools like Elastic Stack, Splunk, or Grafana.
- Experience with High Availability (HA) architectures and ensuring Recovery Time Objectives (RTO) and Recovery Point Objectives (RPO).
- Knowledge of protocol transformation (e.g., REST to SOAP) and data aggregation techniques.

Mampu membuat dan menjalankan skenario pengujian fungsional untuk validasi solusi.

Sertifikasi terkait Business Analysis (CBAP, CCBA) atau Odoo.
Terampil memimpin sesi workshop dan diskusi kebutuhan bisnis.
Penempatan: Sunter, Jakarta Utara

description:
Our
automotive manufacturing client
is seeking a skilled
System Analyst
to gather and analyze user requirements, prepare comprehensive documentation, design system workflows and database structures, collaborate with developers, conduct system testing, and coordinate between users and the technical team to ensure smooth communication and successful project delivery.
Responsibilities
Gather and analyze user requirements to ensure business needs are well understood.
Prepare comprehensive documentation, including Business Requirement Document (BRD), Functional Specification Document (FSD), and Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD), to support the development process.
Design system workflows and database structures, including sequence diagrams and stored procedures.
Collaborate with developers to ensure technical solutions align with requirements.
Conduct system testing prior to User Acceptance Test (UAT) to ensure quality and functionality.
Coordinate between users and the technical team to ensure smooth communication and successful project delivery.
Required Skills and Experience
Minimum
Bachelor’s degree
in Information Technology, Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.
At least
2 years
of proven experience as a System Analyst or Business Analyst.
Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in:
Creating
ERD
(Entity Relationship Diagram).
Developing
BRD
(Business Requirement Document) and
FSD
(Functional Specification Document).
Designing
sequence diagrams
and
database structures
.
Writing and optimizing
stored procedures
.
Performing
Quality Assurance testing
to validate system functions.
Excellent analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication skills to effectively liaise between stakeholders and technical teams.
Preferred Qualifications (if any)
Experience working in an automotive manufacturing company or related industry is an advantage.
Work Experience
Employment type: Outsourced-Contract.
Contract duration: 6 months (with extension possibility).
Location: Sunter, North Jakarta.
Work type: Work from Office (WFO).

description:
Responsibilities:
Conduct field observations and requirement gathering to analyze business needs and propose suitable solutions.
With technical writer, develop key project documentation, including Functional Specification Documents (FSD), Business Requirement Documents (BRD), flowcharts, and testing documents.
Act as a liaison between end-users and the technical team to ensure clear communication and alignment.
Oversee quality assurance (QA) and User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and manage the implementation training for users on new applications or modules.
Perform initial system configuration during the implementation of new modules in an ERP or other applications.
Job Requirements:
Highly curious and enthusiastic in collaborate with many department and people, strong analytical, logical thinking, and structured problem-solving skills.
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Information System, Business, Finance, Accounting or a related field.
Minimum of 1-2 years of experience as a functional analyst or IT business analyst, with a focus on finance and accounting systems.
Strong knowledge of core financial and accounting principles, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger, fixed assets, and financial reporting.
Proficiency in creating application testing scenarios for both System Integration Testing (SIT) and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
Familiarity with project documentation standards (BRD, FSD, business process model notation & flowchart).
Good in office tools (Excel, spreadsheet etc.)
Demonstrated understanding and experience in ERP implementation (experience with Odoo ERP is a plus).
Experience with Agile and/or Waterfall project management methodologies

description:
As an Operations Analyst Intern, you will play a key role in supporting supply chain and operational improvement initiatives within the company. You will gain hands-on experience in logistics, process optimization, and performance analysis while working closely with cross-functional teams. This internship is designed to provide you with valuable industry insights and professional growth opportunities in a fast-paced environment.
Responsibilities:
Supply Chain
Assist in analyzing historical shipping data to support 3PL Performance Evaluation.
Monitor stock levels and help develop strategies to optimize inventory.
Analyze 3PL performance data to identify areas for improvement.
Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to Logistic & Supply Chain.
Invoice validation & reconciliation from 3PL collaborate with the Finance Team.
Develop strategies to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.
Operations Improvement
Collaborate with cross function teams to streamline processes and Develop strategies to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.
Implement tools and systems to automate and optimize operational tasks.
Provide regular reports and insights to management on operational performance.
Document business processes and owners, and ensure that Standard Operating Procedures are adhered throughout the flow.
Requirements:
Final year student with no class to attend / Fresh Graduate are welcomed to apply, majoring in Business Management, Supply Chain
Management, Industrial Engineering or related fields.
No prior experience necessary—just an eagerness to learn and develop new skills.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
A proactive and positive attitude with the ability to take on new challenges.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
Strong organizational and time-management skills.
A genuine interest in contributing to a dynamic team and growing professionally.

Fresh Graduates welcome to apply

description:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. With our ecosystem of software solutions—including Mekari Jurnal, Mekari Talenta, Mekari Qontak, and Mekari Flex, we aim to facilitate entrepreneurs and leaders as they accelerate the digital transformation of their businesses.
In our 10+ years of journey we have reached over 1 Million platform users, and we're not planning to stop any time soon. We need more people like you: builders and owners with calculated ambition who are eager to grow and create their #BiggestImpact.
Job Descriptions:
Produce marketing KPI dashboards and deliver daily-weekly-monthly cross-channel performance reports with actionable insights
Come up with conversion optimization strategies with the aim of improving efficiency in digital marketing and increasing ROI
Implement tracking into various marketing initiatives using Google Tag Manager or other tools
Benchmark performance across all digital channels and advice on KPIs based on performance analysis
Analyze end-to-end user behavior, conversion data, customer journeys, funnel analysis, and multi-channel attribution
Identify risks & opportunities to try innovative new methodologies and improve the analytical procedure
Work daily with analytical software including but not limited to Google Adwords, Google Analytics, Zoho Analytics, Tableau, and more
Requirements/Qualifications:
Bachelors degree with related major
2+ years of proven working experience in a related position.
Detail-oriented, analytic problem-solving, critical thinking, effective communication
Fluent in data mining, data visualization, business intelligence, and reporting software
Have successfully built predictive models to recommend impactful next steps for a business
Proficient in SQL
What You Will Get:
1. Competitive salary + daily allowance.
2. Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
3. Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.
4. Allowance for glasses/contact lenses.
5. Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.
6. Notebook Ownership Program.
7. Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
8. Friendly and dynamic work environment.
9. Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company
Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

description:
Description
Responsibilities
- Create innovations and contribute significantly to independent progress and organizational growth.
- Perform technical process analysis and map business processes.
- Coordinate products or projects, interpret applied solutions, and conduct detailing sessions for deeper understanding.
- Document and analyze current business processes and their underlying systems/applications.
- Prepare documentation and develop detailed functional requirement specifications and related business activities.
- Negotiate requirements based on the technical effort analysis.
- Create detailed designs at both high-level and screen-level, including corresponding business processes.
Work Arrangement
- Employment type: Outsourced-Contract.
- Contract duration: 12 months (extension possibility based on performance and company needs).
- Location: West Jakarta.
- Work type: On-site/Work from Office (WFO).
Job Requirement
Minimum Qualifications
- Bachelor’s degree in IT, Information Systems, or other relevant fields.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Solution Designer, Developer, Solution Architect, or equivalent role.
- Open to candidates with a combined background in IT Business Analysis, System Analyst, Product Management, and Quality Assurance/Software Testing.
- Proactive, disciplined, responsible, detail-oriented, and organized.
- Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, and coordinate effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Strong analytical skills and the ability to provide ideas/input for team improvements.
Required Skills
- Experience with Microservices, SOA concepts, and core programming principles.
- Understanding of SDLC and Agile methodology.
- Familiarity with Jira and Confluence administration.
- Proven experience as a Developer is mandatory.
Additional Skills (preferred, but not mandatory)
- Experience in leading or supervising a team.
- Experience as a Solution Architect.

description:
Support Analyst
About
Worldline
Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
The O
pportunity
Join our Financial Services APAC team as a
Support Analyst
based in Indonesia, where you'll work with our AS400 team to support mission-critical business applications. This role offers the opportunity to develop your technical expertise whilst contributing to the smooth operation of systems that power financial services across the region.
Day-to-Day Responsibilities
Support and maintain the company's mission-critical business applications
Take ownership of incidents and progress through to closure
Investigate and resolve incidents by applying fixes on time and efficiently
Document the troubleshooting and problem resolution steps, testing and results
Provide assistance and advice to customers in the effective use of systems and applications
Communicate clearly with customers, teammates and team lead
Create, enhance, test and implement programs in accordance with requirements and scope
Ensure that any assigned project work is completed on time and meets quality standards
What are we looking for
We look for big thinkers. People who can drive positive change, step up and show what's next - people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. In practice this means:
BSc degree in Software Engineering, IT or equivalent qualification
1-2 years experience in troubleshooting and analytical problem-solving (fresh graduates encouraged to apply with training provided)
Programming/support and debugging experience in COBOL, RPG, Java, C or C++
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Willingness to adapt to new systems and platforms, particularly AS400
Perks & Benefits
At Worldline you'll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
Be part of a company guided by a strong purpose to do good and recognized as top 1% of the most sustainable companies in all sectors worldwide.
Hybrid work model
Flexi working hours
Shape the evolution
We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you'll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com
We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.
#LI_KF1
Information at a Glance

description:
Bergabunglah dengan Tim Kami! Marketing Analyst Staff (Suplemen)
PT Suryaprana Nutrisindo (Nutrimax)
Merupakan perusahaan farmasi terkemuka di Indonesia yang berkomitmen untuk memberikan produk berkualitas tinggi untuk kesehatan dan kesejahteraan pelanggan. Kami menggunakan teknologi terbaru dan proses inovatif untuk memproduksi suplemen yang aman serta efektif.
Tanggung Jawab
Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data pasar, tren konsumen, dan informasi kompetitif untuk memberikan wawasan yang berharga bagi tim pemasaran
Mengembangkan dan mengelola laporan analitik untuk melacak kinerja kampanye pemasaran dan mengidentifikasi peluang perbaikan
Mengidentifikasi segmen pasar potensial dan menyusul profil konsumen
Menyusun hasil temuan penelitian dalam bentuk laporan dan merekomendasikan kepada manajemen senior secara jelas dan meyakinkan
Memantau dan menganalisis aktivitas pesaing untuk memahami tren, peluang, dan ancaman di pasar
Membantu tim dalam pengembangan profil pelanggan dan segmentasi pasar yang mendorong inisiatif pemasaran yang lebih efektif.
Kualifikasi
Gelar sarjana dalam bidang Marketing, Ekonomi, Statistika, atau disiplin ilmu terkait
Minimum 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai Analis Pemasaran atau peran serupa di perusahaan suplemen, farmasi atau obat-obatan
Kemampuan analitis yang kuat dengan keahlian dalam menggunakan perangkat lunak analitik seperti Excel, SQL, Meta Business Suite
Memahami metode riset pasar, segmentasi konsumen dan analisis kompetitor
Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik, baik secara lisan maupun tertulis, untuk menyampaikan temuan dan rekomendasi dengan jelas
Kemampuan bekerja dalam tim, beradaptasi dengan perubahan, dan multitasking di lingkungan yang dinamis
Kenapa harus gabung bersama kami?
🌟Kesempatan untuk pergi ke luar negeri
🌟Side income dari penjualan produk secara online di akun TikTok masing-masing
🌟Lingkungan kerja profesional dan peluang jenjang karir
📩Lamar sekarang melalui Jobstreet dengan CV dan Portofolio terbaik Anda!

description:
As an Operations Analyst Intern, you will play a key role in supporting supply chain and operational improvement initiatives within the company. You will gain hands-on experience in logistics, process optimization, and performance analysis while working closely with cross-functional teams. This internship is designed to provide you with valuable industry insights and professional growth opportunities in a fast-paced environment.
Responsibilities:
Supply Chain
Assist in analyzing historical shipping data to support 3PL Performance Evaluation.
Monitor stock levels and help develop strategies to optimize inventory.
Analyze 3PL performance data to identify areas for improvement.
Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to Logistic & Supply Chain.
Invoice validation & reconciliation from 3PL collaborate with the Finance Team.
Develop strategies to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.
Operations Improvement
Collaborate with cross function teams to streamline processes and Develop strategies to improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.
Implement tools and systems to automate and optimize operational tasks.
Provide regular reports and insights to management on operational performance.
Document business processes and owners, and ensure that Standard Operating Procedures are adhered throughout the flow.
Requirements:
Final year student with no class to attend / Fresh Graduate are welcomed to apply, majoring in Business Management, Supply Chain
Proficient in
Adobe Photoshop
is a plus.
Management, Industrial Engineering or related fields.
No prior experience necessary—just an eagerness to learn and develop new skills.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
A proactive and positive attitude with the ability to take on new challenges.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
Strong organizational and time-management skills.
A genuine interest in contributing to a dynamic team and growing professionally.
Able to join immediately.

description:
Peluang Karir sebagai IT Business Analyst
PT Prawathiya Karsa Pradipta, sebuah perusahaan teknologi terkemuka di Bekasi, Jawa Barat, sedang mencari seorang IT Business Analyst yang berpengalaman dan berbakat untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. Dalam peran ini, Anda akan memainkan peran penting dalam menghubungkan kebutuhan bisnis dengan solusi teknologi, memastikan bahwa sistem dan proses kami selaras dengan tujuan strategis perusahaan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis persyaratan bisnis dari berbagai pemangku kepentingan.
Merancang dan mendokumentasikan proses bisnis dan persyaratan fungsional untuk proyek-proyek IT.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim pengembangan untuk memastikan solusi teknologi sesuai dengan kebutuhan bisnis.
Membuat model data, diagram alur, dan dokumen spesifikasi yang jelas.
Menguji dan memvalidasi solusi IT untuk memastikan kesesuaian dengan persyaratan.
Memberikan pelatihan dan dukungan pengguna untuk memastikan adopsi teknologi yang lancar.
Memantau dan melaporkan kinerja sistem serta mengidentifikasi peluang perbaikan.
Keterampilan dan Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana dalam bidang Teknologi Informasi, Sistem Informasi, atau bidang terkait.
Berpengalaman sebagai Business Analyst.
Terbuka untuk Fresh Graduate
Paham Query SQL, BRD, FSD
Pengetahuan tentang alat dan teknik analisis bisnis, seperti UML, flowchart, dan spreadsheet.
Pemahaman yang baik tentang proses bisnis, analisis kebutuhan, dan pemodelan data.
Kemampuan komunikasi yang kuat, baik secara lisan maupun tertulis, untuk berinteraksi dengan berbagai pemangku kepentingan.
Pemahaman yang baik tentang metodologi pengembangan perangkat lunak dan praktik terbaik.
Kemampuan untuk bekerja secara mandiri dan dalam tim di lingkungan yang cepat berubah.
Mengapa Bergabung dengan PT Prawathiya Karsa Pradipta?
Peluang untuk pengembangan profesional dan pelatihan yang berkelanjutan.
Lingkungan kerja yang kolaboratif dan mendukung, dengan fokus pada keseimbangan kehidupan kerja.
Kesempatan untuk terlibat dalam proyek-proyek inovatif dan menantang di industri teknologi yang cepat berkembang.
Tentang PT Prawathiya Karsa Pradipta
PT Prawathiya Karsa Pradipta adalah perusahaan teknologi terkemuka yang berspesialisasi dalam memberikan solusi inovatif untuk berbagai industri. Kami berkomitmen untuk menjadi mitra terpercaya bagi klien kami, dengan fokus pada kualitas, keamanan, dan inovasi. Tim kami yang dinamis dan berpengalaman bekerja sama untuk mewujudkan visi kami dalam mengembangkan teknologi yang mempercepat kemajuan bisnis. Bergabunglah dengan kami dan jadilah bagian dari perjalanan kami menuju kesuksesan yang berkelanjutan.
Lamar sekarang dan bergabunglah dengan tim kami yang berdedikasi!

description:
We are seeking strong analytic person who is fluent in English to join our rapidly growing team based in Indonesia. The role will focus on developing and expanding our structured product database, with a specific emphasis on US and EU markets. The database will be used for market intelligence, reference data, and lifecycle management for the structured products industry.
As a member of the team, the successful candidate will be expected to take full responsibility for improving coverage and upgrading the system to create a comprehensive and fully featured database. The role will involve handling complex data entries and rules.
This is a full-time, staff position located in Indonesia, to coordinate with other team in different countries and report directly to the Team Lead.
Key Responsibilities:
Increase coverage of our structured product database
Oversee and improve our daily prices database
Responsible for automating of the data extraction process from public sources
Daily interaction with structured products distributors and issuers to expand product coverage
Requirements:
Ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines set
At least 1 year experience in any field is preferable
Minimal D3/S1
Fluency in English is mandatory; any other language is preferable.
Reliable with a strong work ethic
IT literate in appropriate Microsoft systems including advanced Excel
Ability to manipulate large data set
Strong numerical and analytical skills with ability to assimilate information.
Highly organized with the ability to schedule your own and other workloads.
Ability to work on projects independently and as part of a team.
About WSD
WSD is a leading provider of SaaS-based technology solutions for manufacturers of structured products and OTC derivatives, covering all aspects of the process from pre-trade workflows to order management, document production, data dissemination to exchanges, data vendors and the buy-side, as well as lifecycle management with offices in the UK, USA, Brazil, Germany, Hong Kong, Bangladesh and Indonesia.
WSD also operates RegXchange, an industry utility connecting the sell-side and buy-side, and Transparitrade, a white-labelled client-facing structured products platform featuring comprehensive education as well as trade execution and analytical tools. WSD serves its global Tier 1 clients with a staff of almost 200 and has offices in all major time zones.

description:
Do you have expertise in, and passion for Finance? Would you like to apply your expertise to impact the lives of patients in a company that follows the science and turns ideas into life changing medicines? Then AstraZeneca might be the one for you!
ABOUT ASTRAZENECA
AstraZeneca is a global, science-led, patient-focused biopharmaceutical company that focuses on the discovery, development and commercialisation of prescription medicines for some of the world’s most serious diseases. But we’re more than one of the world’s leading pharmaceutical companies.We are on a journey to bring life-saving medicines to patients. Our role in contributing to decreasing mortality rates globally is clear – shaping the future by spotting a scientifically-led commercial opportunity and acting now to operationalise and scale it.
BUSINESS AREA – Indonesia Commercial Team
Our team proudly leads the way as the fastest growing pharmaceutical. But we’re not done yet – we’re fearless in setting the direction for a new future to keep progressing for our patients. We’re bringing transformative drugs to those that need them the most by combining continuous new launches with unique solutions across the whole patient journey. It’s how we are able to truly make a difference to the quality of lives and answer huge unmet patient needs.
In our ever-evolving and complex markets, it takes entrepreneurial thinking to stay at the forefront. Fusing our diverse minds with local ownership we’re powered with everything we need to shape a new future for AstraZeneca, our markets and our patients.
Here you will experience a fast paced and agile environment as we continue to support the business on a journey of evolution and growth, driven by new, exciting technology and digital innovations. It’s challenging and sometimes demanding, and that’s why we love it.
What you’ll do
Reporting to the Cluster CFO, this role will provide support to Financial Planning & Reporting Group including analysis and reporting for the RBU/ABU as well as preparing monthly financial and business performance reports. Responsible for working with all areas of the business to complete the enterprise wide budgeting and planning process. This includes the preparation and timely submission of financial reports, financial analysis and commentary. Additionally, analyst is also expected to understand operational matters in relation to accounting and administration. The role will also support on-going projects in finance.
This role will be hired as contract based for 6 months up to 1 year duration.
Typical Accountabilities:
Responsible for preparing in depth financial analysis of budgets, forecasts and actual results for review by Senior Management.
Coordinates and prepares presentations for regional Sr. Mgmt, Group CFO and other meetings.
Coordinate the completion of the enterprise wide planning cycle for the region.
Responsible for region RBU/ABU submission to Hyperion Planning (UK). Serve as Liaison with Group Reporting Services (UK).
Liaise with the O&FS (IS) Group to consolidate regional Business planning data.
Responsible for obtaining a solid understanding of key business drivers, risk factors and industry trends and applying this knowledge to financial analyses.
Identifies and implements continuous improvement opportunities to the planning and monthly reporting processes.
Performs ad-hoc reporting requirements and financial analysis.
Performs various local transactional troubleshooting in relation to accounting process.
Essential for the role
B.S. Degree in Finance or Accounting
Minimum 3-5 years of experience preferably from consulting/audit company.
Knowledge of regional operating model
Excellent PC skills and experience including SAP, BW, Excel and Powerpoint
Strong analytical ability
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, including oral and written
Demonstrated ability to perform in an environment that emphasizes teamwork
Demonstrated capacity to effectively manage multiple and frequently changing priorities
High degree of accuracy with attention to detail
Demonstrated ability to meet strict deadlines
Good sense of business acumen and analytic
High initiative and curiosity level.
Fluent at English, both spoken and written.
Understanding of P&L Structure/ Financial Statement.
Desirable for the role
Pharmaceutical Industry Experience
MBA or CPA
Why join AstraZeneca?
At AstraZeneca we’re dedicated to being a Great Place to Work. Where you are empowered to push the boundaries of science and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit. There’s no better place to make a difference to medicine, patients and society. An inclusive culture that champions diversity and collaboration, and always committed to lifelong learning, growth and development. We’re on an exciting journey to pioneer the future of healthcare.
So, what’s next?
Are you already imagining yourself joining our team? Good, because we can’t wait to hear from you.
Are you ready to bring new ideas and fresh thinking to the table? Brilliant! We have one seat available and we hope it’s yours.
If you’re curious to know more then please reach out to aziza.fitriani@astrazeneca.com. We welcome your application.
Where can I find out more?
Our Social Media, Follow AstraZeneca on LinkedIn
Follow AstraZeneca on Facebook
Follow AstraZeneca on Instagram
Date Posted
15-Agu-2025
Closing Date
29-Nov-2025
AstraZeneca embraces diversity and equality of opportunity.  We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse team representing all backgrounds, with as wide a range of perspectives as possible, and harnessing industry-leading skills.  We believe that the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.  We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics.  We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.

Market Research and Analysis:
Conduct comprehensive market research to identify potential business opportunities and partnerships.
Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to provide actionable insights and recommendations.
Evaluate the potential of new markets, products, or services and develop strategies for market entry.
Partnership Development:
Identify and approach potential partners, including companies, organizations, and other entities that align with the company’s strategic goals.
Develop and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and decision-makers at partner organizations.

Support the development and execution of the company’s business development strategy.

description:
Get to Know the Team
The Finance Solutions Excellence team is dedicated to improving finance processes through automation and data-driven solutions. We partner with Global Process Owners, Data Engineers, Data Analysts, and Finance teams to deliver impactful improvements. Our team values curiosity, and a commitment to creating growth. Together, we are shaping the future of finance by creating smarter, faster, and scalable solutions.
Get to Know the Role
The Finance Solutions Excellence Analyst will drive process improvements within the finance team, focusing on AI-driven solutions using Python, SQL, and LLMs. You will collaborate with Global Process Owners, Data Engineers, Data Analysts, and Finance teams to design and deliver impactful solutions. You will report directly to the Senior Manager, Finance Solutions Excellence & Operations.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Execute process improvement projects to automate and improve finance operations, utilizing technology for scalable solutions.
Analyze and redesign manual finance processes in collaboration with Finance teams, ensuring efficiency and accuracy.
Develop Python scripts and SQL queries for data extraction, validation, reconciliation, and reporting.
Build and prototype AI-driven tools and analytics solutions to support data-informed decision-making.
Work closely with Data Engineering and Analytics teams to integrate solutions with enterprise systems and architecture.

description:
Responsibilities
The SEA Integrated Marketing team (IMC) crafts and executes integrated marketing and communications & campaign strategies that resonate with our diverse audience across SEA. The team builds brand awareness, drive user engagement, and enhance the overall shopping experience. Whether it's launching innovative marketing campaigns, optimizing user interfaces, or crafting compelling narratives, the team's contributions are essential to TikTokShop's success in SEA. Responsibilities
Conduct in-depth analyses (through internal data, external primary and secondary sources) to help the business (IMC) better understand key value drivers and identify growth opportunities, propose valuable solutions and strategies, and drive their implementation within the business.
Gain profound insights into business.
Actively diagnose and pinpoint issues hindering target achievement.
Market research and analysis: Conduct thorough market research to identify target audiences, competitive landscape, and market trends.
Analyze data to inform GTM strategy and optimize campaign strategy.
As a PMO, spearheads the execution of relatively complex projects.

Excellent structured expression and logical thinking skills, strong in identifying business priorities and making sound judgments, high data sensitivity.
Demonstrate solid project management skillset: handling and juggling multiple processes at once across different topics, functions and stakeholders
Proficiency in English.
Exhibit excellent communication (written and verbal) and organizational skills, with the ability to handle ambiguity and structure complex issues to derive insights. Preferred Qualifications:
Self-starter attitude: ability to initiate and drive complex analysis to completion with minimal guidance, while synthesizing and communicating insights effectively.
Knowledge of SQL.

description:
1. Analisis Kebutuhan
Mengidentifikasi kebutuhan bisnis dari pengguna atau klien.
Melakukan wawancara, observasi, dan studi dokumen untuk memahami proses kerja.
Menerjemahkan kebutuhan bisnis menjadi kebutuhan sistem (system requirements).
2. Desain Sistem
Membuat rancangan sistem, termasuk alur proses, data flow diagram (DFD), ERD, dan spesifikasi teknis.
Menentukan arsitektur sistem dan integrasi dengan sistem lain.
Menyusun dokumen System Design Specification (SDS).
3. Dokumentasi
Menyusun dokumen kebutuhan (Business Requirement Document / BRD, Software Requirement Specification / SRS).
Membuat user manual atau panduan penggunaan sistem.
4. Koordinasi dengan Tim
Menjadi penghubung antara user (bisnis) dan tim teknis (developer, tester, engineer).
Memberikan arahan ke tim programmer berdasarkan kebutuhan yang sudah dianalisis.
Melakukan komunikasi lintas departemen untuk memastikan sistem sesuai kebutuhan.
5. Pengujian Sistem
Membuat skenario uji (test case) dan ikut serta dalam User Acceptance Test (UAT).
Memastikan sistem yang dibangun sesuai kebutuhan dan bebas dari error kritis.
Memberikan feedback untuk perbaikan ke tim developer.
6. Implementasi & Support
Membantu proses implementasi sistem ke user.
Memberikan pelatihan kepada end-user.
Memberikan support ketika ada masalah teknis atau bug.
7. Monitoring & Evaluasi
Mengevaluasi kinerja sistem setelah digunakan.
Mengusulkan perbaikan atau pengembangan lebih lanjut.

description:
Analytics & Data Engineer Manager will bridge the gap between data engineering and business intelligence, providing actionable insights to our business and product teams. You will be responsible for designing and maintaining data pipelines, advising development teams on data tracking, overseeing Google Analytics implementation, and creating business intelligence reports using tools.
Please note that this is an onsite position, placement: Gading Serpong, South Tangerang
Key Responsibilities
Cross-Team Collaboration
Work closely with frontend web, iOS, Android, and backend teams to advise on data tracking methodologies.
Understand and translate business requirements into technical specifications for data collection.
Data Pipeline Development
Build and maintain data engineering pipelines to process platform production data.
Utilize
ETL processes
for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Ensure data integrity and reliability throughout the data lifecycle.
Google Analytics Management
Configure reports and data within Google Analytics to meet business needs.
Gather reports and data from GA dashboards and programmatically via the GA API.
Oversee the implementation and configuration of Google Analytics to meet data requirements.
Provide guidance on best practices for tracking and analyzing user interactions.
Business Intelligence Creation
Develop and maintain BI dashboards and reports using tools like Metabase.
Provide insights and analytics to support decision-making for business and product teams.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Experience
5–7 years of professional experience in data engineering and pipeline development.
Familiarity with Google Analytics configuration and data extraction.
Experience with BI tools such as Metabase, Tableau, or Power BI.
Technical Skills
Proficiency in SQL and at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java).
Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and
ETL processes
.
Ability to design and manage ETL workflows.
Ability to extract and manipulate data from Google Analytics dashboards and programmatically via APIs.
Understanding of web and mobile app development practices for data tracking.\
Soft Skills
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Excellent communication skills to convey complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment.

description:
About us
At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern living and a net-zero future. As one of the world's largest publicly traded energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.
The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people. They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.
We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society's evolving needs. Learn more about
our What and our Why
and how we can work
together
.
ExxonMobil in Singapore
ExxonMobil is one of Singapore's largest foreign manufacturing investors with over S$25 billion in fixed asset investments.
We have manufacturing facilities that include an integrated world-scale refining and petrochemical complex in Jurong and Jurong Island, a network of service stations under the Esso brand, operate a lubricant plant and are a supplier of cylinder cooking gas. ExxonMobil provides customers and commercial markets in the region with ground transportation, industrial, aviation and marine fuels, lubricants, petrochemicals and liquefied natural gas (LNG).
As Singapore serves as the AP hub for some of our businesses, we employ about 3,500 people across positions in operations, projects, commercial, corporate support functions and others.
ExxonMobil also contributes to community programs in Singapore that support the arts, education, health and the environment.
For more information, visit
www.exxonmobil.com.sg
or follow ExxonMobil Singapore on LinkedIn and Instagram.
What role you will play in our team
The Market Risk Analyst position is responsible for monitoring trading activities for compliance with Market Risk Management policies and developing and maintaining tools for Global Trading activities. You will be responsible for independently identifying, measuring, and reporting trading gross margin, exposures, and the market risk of the portfolio of transactions that are executed and owned by the Commercial organization. You will work with a dynamic, global team in a high-visibility role that provides advice to the Commercial organization on risk appetite, risk limit utilization and market risk mitigation strategies, and risk assessments and insights to senior management.
What you will do
Position responsibilities can include:
Act as Market Risk focal point for front-office and senior stakeholders. Develop strong relationships with Commercial stakeholders and possess deep end-to-end understanding of trading strategies, associated exposures and future growth aspirations for the trade desk supported.
Understand supply and demand fundamentals, including regional/locational price differences, fundamental drivers of changes in these spreads, historical market direction and trends/underlying fundamental causes.
Show a strong commitment to market risk management principles, including being proactive, transparent, and open to debate with Global Trading as necessary.
Independently assess and advise on risk profiles from the trade to portfolio level (e.g., risk reward trade-off, optimization of constrained risk, liquidity, market fundamentals, and market sentiment sensitivities).
Ensure adherence to mandated exposure and risk limits and provide guidance on actions to be taken to reduce risk if necessary.
Execute daily market risk processes and generate risk reports, collaborating closely with trading teams to manage market risk.
Provide daily, insightful commentary of key portfolio activity including their implications for market intelligence, exposure changes, and new deal activity.
Collaborate with trading support functions (e.g. Finance, Accounting) for deal support and general portfolio queries.
Ensure trading data integrity by validating positions and reconciling any inconsistencies with responsible traders.
Review plan for hedging and provide support to develop trading limits. Ensure that the proposed transaction and associated hedges can be properly valued and reported by the risk management system of record.
Further develop and build out Risk reporting and ad-hoc analysis tools using advanced computer skills (e.g. Excel, VBA, SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Power BI).
Participate in month, quarter, and year-end closing processes.
Work closely (daily) with refinery coordinators and optimizers, schedulers and traders to validate production data and trades impacting inventory positions and generate hedging signals.
About you
Skills and Qualifications
Academic:
Bachelor's degree or above (Master's, MBA, CFA, or Ph.D.) in Economics, Finance, Mathematics or Statistics
Required Qualifications:
2-10 years of experience in financial, energy or chemical risk management
Strong knowledge of energy and traded markets, preferably crude, crude freight, and LNG
Strong understanding of physical trading, derivatives, and financial products
Excellent quantitative and analytical skills
Excellent proficiency in Excel, SQL, and quantitative programming languages such as Python
Experience with Energy Trading Risk Management Systems
Collegiality and truly good interpersonal skills balanced with a disciplined risk management approach
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with Python/SQL
High level of Excel proficiency
Familiarity with trade capture and nomination / scheduling systems
Your benefits
An ExxonMobil career is one designed to last and we provide job rotations throughout your career with us. Our commitment to you runs deep: our employees grow personally and professionally, with benefits built on our core categories of health, security, finance, and life.
Currently our employees benefits include: Long Term Savings Allowance, dental reimbursement, annual health checkups and Home Ownership Assistance Plan amongst others and these are updated from time to time.
Stay connected with us:
Learn more at our website
Follow us on LinkedIn and Instagram
Like us on Facebook
Subscribe our channel at YouTube
Equal Opportunity Employer
It is the policy of the Company to provide equal employment opportunity in conformance with all applicable laws and regulations to individuals who are qualified to perform job requirements. The Company administers its personnel policies, programs, and practices in a non-discriminatory manner in all aspects of the employment relationship, including recruitment, hiring, work assignment, promotion, transfer, termination, wage and salary administration, and selection for training.
Please be informed that only shortlisted candidates will be notified, and you can find out more about our hiring process here .
We thank you for your interest in ExxonMobil.
Nothing herein is intended to override the corporate separateness of local entities. Working relationships discussed herein do not necessarily represent a reporting connection, but may reflect a functional guidance, stewardship, or service relationship.
Exxon Mobil Corporation has numerous affiliates, many with names that include ExxonMobil, Exxon, Esso and Mobil. For convenience and simplicity, those terms and terms like corporation, company, our, we and its are sometimes used as abbreviated references to specific affiliates or affiliate groups. Abbreviated references describing global or regional operational organizations and global or regional business lines are also sometimes used for convenience and simplicity. Similarly, ExxonMobil has business relationships with thousands of customers, suppliers, governments, and others. For convenience and simplicity, words like venture, joint venture, partnership, co-venturer, and partner are used to indicate business relationships involving common activities and interests, and those words may not indicate precise legal relationships.
Job Segment:
Sustainability, SQL, Database, Risk Management, Refinery, Energy, Technology, Finance

description:
Job Description
Responsible for creating and executing marketing strategies that attract and engage potential clients from healthcare organizations. Your focus will be on generating high-quality leads for our sales team through targeted digital campaigns, content creation, and strategic collaborations within the healthcare industry
Responsibilities
• Create Marketing Strategies: Work with the marketing team to develop plans that target healthcare businesses and align with our company goals. Your goal is to get qualified leads for our sales team.
• Lead Generation: Use email marketing, social media, and other channels to attract and engage potential customers, turning them into leads for our sales funnel.
• Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Improve our website's visibility on search engines by optimizing content with relevant keywords.
• Marketing Collateral: Create materials to support our sales team in their interactions with potential clients.
• Performance Tracking: Use analytics to measure campaign performance and make data-driven improvements.
Job Requirements
• Bachelor degree in marketing, business administration, or a related field
• Experience in B2B marketing, preferably in healthcare or technology.
• Familiarity with digital marketing and lead generation techniques.
• Knowledge of health management systems or Healthcare IT is a plus.
• Strong analytical and communication skills.
• Creative thinking to develop innovative marketing campaigns. Results-driven with a track record of achieving marketing goals.
• Excellent communication skill
• Adaptable and open to learning new tools and techniques
• Fluent in english, verbally and written

description:
Jabatan : Analis
Penempatan : HO, Jakarta Timur
Kualifikasi
Minimal S1 dari jurusan Marketing, Statistika, Komunikasi, Psikologi, Ekonomi, atau jurusan lain yang relevan.
Pengalaman 1–3 tahun di bidang riset pasar, analis data, atau konsultan riset di industri Retail, FMCG, Agensi riset/konsultan, Tech/Startup digital, atau relevan.
Keterampilan Teknis: Menguasai teknik riset pasar, baik primer maupun sekunder, Mampu mengoperasikan tools seperti: Google Forms, Excel, SPSS, SurveyMonkey, Tableau, atau Power BI, & Memahami analisis statistik dasar dan interpretasi data.
Keterampilan Non-Teknis: Kritis dan analitis dalam berpikir, Komunikatif dan mampu menyampaikan insight dengan jelas, Detail-oriented dan mampu mengelola waktu riset sesuai tenggat, & Peka terhadap tren pasar dan dinamika konsumen.
Nilai Tambah (Preferred): Pengalaman dalam UX research, customer satisfaction survey, atau brand tracking, Kemampuan storytelling data dan visualisasi hasil riset, & Mampu melakukan presentasi kepada stakeholder non-teknis.
Tugas & Tanggung Jawab
Perencanaan Riset Pasar: Menyusun metodologi riset (kuantitatif dan/atau kualitatif) sesuai dengan tujuan bisnis, & Menentukan target responden, metode sampling, dan teknik pengumpulan data.
Analisis Data Pasar: Menganalisis tren pasar, perilaku konsumen, segmentasi pasar, dan posisi kompetitor, & Menggunakan alat analisis statistik atau software seperti SPSS, Excel, atau Google Sheets.
Penyusunan Laporan dan Insight Bisnis: Menyusun laporan hasil riset dalam bentuk presentasi atau laporan tertulis yang mudah dipahami, & Memberikan rekomendasi strategis untuk tim marketing, produk, atau manajemen berdasarkan data riset.
Pemantauan Tren Pasar dan Industri: Memantau berita pasar, tren konsumen, teknologi, atau perubahan regulasi yang dapat memengaruhi strategi bisnis perusahaan, & Melakukan competitive intelligence dan benchmarking.
Kolaborasi Lintas Tim: Bekerja sama dengan tim produk, penjualan, digital marketing, atau tim strategis untuk menyelaraskan kebutuhan riset dengan tujuan perusahaan.
Tugas & Tanggung Jawab lain dalam ranah Marketing Research/Business Development

description:
Job description
Job Title:
Business Analyst - Accounting
Geography / Location: Remote
Company Information:
Daniel P. O’Reilly and Company (DPO&Co.) is a boutique strategy consulting firm that specializes in rapidly delivering value to our clients. We engage with Private Equity firms and traditional corporate clients on projects similar to those done at A.T Kearney, McKinsey, Bain, BCG, Strategy&, etc. Additionally, our BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) services are specifically targeted to mid-market clients to improve any inefficiency in the back-office functions by leveraging labor cost arbitrage and time zone difference. BPO performs several services, including Finance & Accounting, CRM, Supply Chain, Data Analytics, HR, Admin functions, and many more based on our clients’ specific needs. After several successful years and completing over 50 engagements, we have also entered the Principal Investing arena, closing our first deal on a Printed Circuit Board Manufacturing company in September 2020. The team spans globally with team members in Chicago, Puerto Rico, New Delhi, Colombia, Indonesia, and Philippines. Our BPO team has tripled since 2020 and we are looking for new team members who could elevate our team’s experience and skills to the next level!
Responsibility:
Record and maintain accurate financial transactions by preparing and posting accounts payable, accounts receivable, and adjustment journals
Monitor working capital, cash flow, and banking activities, to make sure they’re aligned with corporate policies
Provide support in completing data processing and modification tasks, such as creating and designing financial reports, including budgeting and forecasting process and analysis
Regularly balance books and prepare accurate income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow statements, and review them for accuracy and adherence to accounting standards
Assist in the month-end closing process, ensuring timely and accurate completion of tasks such as balance sheet reconciliations and adjustments
Provide insights and recommendations based on financial data to mitigate business risks and enhance decision-making, if needed
Qualification:
Candidate must possess at least bachelor's degree in Finance/ Accounting / Banking or equivalent
At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position
Good analytical skills/standard excel
Experience in local consulting field is a plus
Able to operate accounting system (QuickBooks, NetSuite, Sage, or SAP will be an advantage)
Strong communication and English proficiency – able to communicate in a fully English environment
Must be able to produce results in a fast-paced, intellectually intense, client-oriented environment
Have good interpersonal skills
Experience in ERP systems, programming or coding language, and big data is a plus
Available to connect with the US client in a flexible working hour
Available to join
ASAP
Basic Job Requirements:
Conform to our values: honest with integrity, humble, respectful, and fair, committed, and has exceptional analytical skills
Structured thinker: Capable of providing structure and order to what is often a vast amount of information; successful candidates do not lose sight of the high-level strategy and organize thoughts and activities in a logical manner

Team player: Thrives on engaging in discussion with colleagues to develop impactful solutions; reaches out proactively to others for input; works as a thought partner
Detail-oriented: An individual who takes personal pride in being certain that all aspects of an assignment are completed correctly
Excellent organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills; able to communicate confidently and professionally with C-Suite leaders, board members, and PE Owners

will be judged on outputs, not inputs
Strong communication to convey complex concepts in PowerPoint, emails, and verbally
Strong Microsoft Excel skills to help other team members solve the problem

Compensation above market share and incentives based on performance

description:
We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented KYC Analyst on a contract basis to join our team. This role is ideal for recent graduates with an interest in the investment and capital markets. As a KYC Analyst, you will conduct thorough due diligence on both local and foreign customers, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.
Conduct comprehensive KYC due diligence by collecting and verifying customer identification documents to validate identities and backgrounds in compliance with internal policies and regulatory standards.
Analyze customer profiles and transactional data to assess risk and identify suspicious activities that may indicate potential money laundering, fraud, or other financial crimes.
Investigate and resolve verification issues with customers or coordinate with relevant stakeholders as needed.
Maintain well-organized, accurate documentation of all KYC activities, including customer documents, assessments, and communications, in line with regulatory and internal requirements.
Requirements
Fresh graduates with a degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field are welcome to apply.
Strong interest in investment and capital markets.
Detail-oriented mindset with strong analytical abilities; excellent time management skills.
Effective written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently and collaborate within a team.
Ethical and principled approach to handling sensitive customer information.
Willingness to work in a shifting arrangement.
WPPE or WPPE-PT certification is a plus.
Benefits
Supportive teammates
Self development activities that support careers
