description:
Who We AreBoston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963.
Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact. To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change.
BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive. What
You'll DoYou’ll work alongside some of the world’s top minds on cases that reshape business, government, and society. Consulting work is varied and rigorous, much of it performed at our client sites. Projects can vary in length, size, and location, depending on the client’s challenge.
You’ll collaborate on challenging projects with team members from many backgrounds and disciplines, increasing your understanding of complex business problems from diverse perspectives and developing new skills and experience to help you in the future, be that at BCG or beyond.  BCG offers a comprehensive benefits program, including medical, dental and vision coverage, telemedicine services, life, accident and disability insurance, parental leave and family planning benefits, caregiving resources, mental health offerings, a generous retirement program, financial guidance, paid time off, and more. What
You'll BringFinal year students and graduates with less than 1 year of working experience in top tier firms. Typically Indonesian students from the country’s leading universities with outstanding academic performance and a strong record of extracurricular activities. Strong research and analytical abilities, including excellent proficiency in Excel.
Ability to work creatively and analytically on problem-solving tasks. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Who
You'll Work WithYou’ll work alongside some of the world’s top minds on cases that reshape business, government, and society. Consulting work is varied and rigorous, much of it performed at our client sites.
Projects can vary in length, size, and location, depending on the client’s challenge. You’ll collaborate on challenging projects with team members from many backgrounds and disciplines, increasing your understanding of complex business problems from diverse perspectives and developing new skills and experience to help you in the future, be that at BCG or beyond.  BCG offers a comprehensive benefits program, including medical, dental and vision coverage, telemedicine services, life, accident and disability insurance, parental leave and family planning benefits, caregiving resources, mental health offerings, a generous retirement program, financial guidance, paid time off, and more.
Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws. BCG is an E - Verify Employer.
Click here  for more information on E-Verify.

description:
Funding Societies | Modalku is the largest SME digital finance platform in Southeast Asia. We are licensed and operating  in Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, Malaysia and Vietnam, and backed by Sequoia India (Peak XV), Softbank Vision Fund, Khazanah and SMBC bank amongst many others. Funding Societies | Modalku provides business financing to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), which is funded by individual and institutional investors, as well as payments solutions to SMEs and consumers.
Here at Funding Societies | Modalku we live by our core values GETFS:
Grow Relentlessly: Strive to become our best, most authentic selves.
Enable Teamwork, Disable Politics: Only by forging togetherness, we help each other succeed.
Test Measure Act: Stay curious and reinvent ourselves, through innovation and experimentation.
Focus on Impact: Create impact through bias for action and tangible results.
Serve with Obsession: Build win-win relationships for the long-term by having a customer obsession.
As a Senior Data Analyst (Risk) at Funding Societies, you'll sit at the intersection of Business and Data, working closely with our Risk and Credit teams to unlock insights, improve decision-making, and shape the future of credit risk management.
We’re looking for someone who is passionate about data, automation, and AI, with a curious and analytical mindset. You should have a strong sense of ownership, a hands-on approach to data, and a passion for data exploration, insight generation, and automation.
This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, values autonomy, and is excited by the opportunity to make a real impact. If you're humble, resourceful, and motivated by solving meaningful business problems through data, you’ll feel right at home with us.
At Funding Societies, we believe that if you’re consistently adding value to the business—you own your journey.
What you will do:
Monitor and analyse credit risk performance across Group and country-level portfolios, identifying trends, anomalies, and emerging risks.
Collaborate closely with credit teams to understand and analyse customer repayment behavior, delinquency patterns, and loss drivers.
Generate ad-hoc reports and deep-dive analyses to support business and risk decisions, and confidently findings to cross-functional stakeholders and senior management.
Design, develop, and maintain self-service credit risk dashboards, reports, and other analytical infrastructure to support scalable and timely risk monitoring.
Work with data engineers to define requirements for data pipelines and ensure accuracy, consistency, and availability of key data assets for analysis.
Support the automation of recurring reports and workflows to increase operational efficiency and reduce manual effort.
Participate in the creation and enhancement of new risk metrics and analytical methodologies, including segmentation strategies and performance tracking.
Contribute to portfolio-level analysis related to ECL, vintage curves, and risk segmentation, supporting regulatory and internal forecasting requirements.
Ensure alignment of analytics with data governance, compliance, and model risk management standards.
Requirements
Minimum 5 years of experience in credit risk management, or data analytics.
Strong proficiency in SQL and Python, with hands-on experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau, Qlik, Power BI).
Proven experience in financial statement analysis, credit risk scoring, cohort performance analysis, and other risk assessment techniques.
Knowledge of regulatory frameworks (e.g. IFRS 9, Basel II/III) and best practices in risk governance and reporting.
Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with a track record of managing cross-functional projects and engaging with senior leadership to translate data insights into actionable business decisions.
Basic understanding of data warehousing, ETL processes, and working with large datasets.
Experience in dashboard development, report automation, and driving data quality improvements is a plus.
CFA, FRM, or Chartered Banker certifications are an added advantage.
Benefits
Time off - We would love you to take time off to rest and rejuvenate. We offer flexible paid vacations as well as many other observed holidays by country. We also like to have our people take a day off for special days like birthdays and work anniversaries.
Flexible working - We believe in giving back the control of work & life to our people. We trust our people and love to provide the space to accommodate each and everyone's working style and personal life.
Medical benefits - We offer health insurance coverage for our employees and dependents. Our people focus on our mission knowing we have their backs for their loved ones too.
Mental health and wellness - We understand that our team productivity is directly linked to our mental and physical health. Hence we organize org-wide fitness initiatives and engage partners to provide well-being coaching.
Tech support - We provide a company laptop for our employees and the best possible support for the right equipment/tools to enable high productivity
Interested to know more about us? Learn about our Stories here.

description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Mengumpulkan, menganalisis, dan menafsirkan data penjualan untuk mengidentifikasi peluang dan tren pasar.
Mengembangkan dan mempresentasikan laporan penjualan dan tren reguler untuk membantu tim penjualan mengambil keputusan yang tepat.
Memantau dan menganalisis kinerja produk, harga, dan kampanye pemasaran untuk memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan.
Berkolaborasi dengan tim operasional dan pemasaran untuk mengembangkan strategi penjualan yang efektif.
Memantau dan menganalisis aktivitas pesaing untuk memahami dinamika pasar.
Mengidentifikasi dan mengusulkan inisiatif baru untuk meningkatkan pangsa pasar dan penjualan.
Keterampilan, Kualifikasi, dan Pengalaman yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana dalam Manajemen, Ekonomi, Statistik, atau bidang terkait.
Memiliki pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai Analis Penjualan atau peran analitik serupa di industri ritel atau konsumen.

description:
Description
PT Ikonsultan Inovatama is looking for an experienced Senior Business Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will play a critical part in supporting our clients in the financial services industry to ensure their business processes and technology landscape are efficient, compliant, and aligned with digital transformation strategies.
You will be directly involved in various initiatives, including the development of IT/business policies and standards, portfolio management, and cost optimization in digital and cloud platforms. Acting as a key liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams, you will translate complex requirements into actionable solutions and ensure successful implementation.
Job Requirement
What You'll Do
Compliance & Policy Development• Develop, update, and socialize IT/business policies, standards, and guidelines in line with financial services regulations and best practices.
Cost & Process Optimization• Support IT/Cloud cost efficiency initiatives by analyzing usage, identifying optimization opportunities, and collaborating with technical teams to implement cost-effective solutions without sacrificing performance.
IT & Business Portfolio Management• Maintain and monitor IT/business portfolio documentation, ensuring alignment with client strategy and supporting governance processes for new technology adoptions.
Stakeholder Engagement• Collaborate with business users, IT, finance, risk, and regulatory teams to gather requirements, build consensus, and ensure the effective adoption of standards and solutions.
Program & Project Support• Provide business analysis support for digital transformation programs, including requirement gathering, preparing BRD/FSD, defining KPIs/success metrics, and monitoring project progress.
Qualification :
• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.
• Minimum 5 years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in banking/multifinance or consulting projects.
• Strong understanding of banking/multifinance business processes, SDLC, and governance frameworks.
• Skilled in preparing documentation such as BRD, FSD, SOP, policies, and guidelines.
• Strong analytical thinking, problem solving, and stakeholder management skills.
• Excellent communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English, both written and verbal.
• Experience with regulatory compliance (OJK/BI) is a strong advantage.
• Familiar with project management and collaboration tools such as JIRA, Confluence, MS Project, or similar.
"HiredToday.com and the Company will not ask for any form of payment during the recruitment process. Please report to us immediately, if you are invited for an interview and asked to make a payment with a sum of money."

description:
Description
Our insurance client is seeking a Business Analyst to join their team. This role is essential for mapping and automating business processes, gathering and translating business requirements, and developing test scenarios and cases. The ideal candidate will have a strong proficiency in data analysis and a keen attention to detail.
Responsibilities
- Conduct thorough analysis of business processes to identify areas for improvement and automation.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, document, and translate business requirements into functional specifications.
- Design and develop comprehensive test scenarios and test cases to ensure the accuracy and effectiveness of business solutions.
- Perform detailed data analysis to support decision-making and identify trends or anomalies.
- Ensure high attention to detail and accuracy in all aspects of work, including documentation and data analysis.
- Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for implemented business solutions.
- Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to ensure alignment and understanding of project goals and deliverables.
Work Arrangement
- Employment type: Outsourced-Contract.
- Contract duration: 6 months (with extension possibility).
- Location: South Jakarta.
- Work type: Hybrid.
Job Requirement
Required Skills and Experience
- Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in a similar role.
- Bachelor's degree (S1) in a related field such as Business, Finance, or Information Technology.
- Proven experience in business process mapping and automation, with a strong understanding of methodologies and tools.
- Demonstrated ability to gather, document, and translate business requirements into actionable plans.
- Expertise in designing and developing test scenarios and test cases, with a focus on thoroughness and accuracy.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to interpret complex data sets and provide actionable insights.
- High attention to detail and accuracy, ensuring all work is meticulously checked and validated.
Preferred Qualifications
- General Insurance knowledge as an advantage.
- Available to join immediately.

description:
Job Description
Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?
Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It Uniquely Yours.
You will work under the guidance of the Finance Manager or Senior Analyst to maintain finance transactions, data, systems and reporting. You will also collect data and perform detailed checks/controls.
How you will contribute
You will:
Execute aspects of finance planning and performance management process and related financial decisions potentially including Annual Contract planning/forecasting, target development, financial performance reporting/analysis, financial modeling and decision support for a focused scope within a region, business unit, country, Supply Chain, Mondelēz International Business Services or Corporate Finance team. You will also execute data collection
Contribute to a strong controls and compliance environment in your area of scope and ensure full compliance with our policies
Execute ad hoc analyses and projects as requested by the Finance Manager or Senior Analyst
Support projects to improve efficiencies and improvements to ways of working and embrace a mindset of continuous improvement
Contribute to a high-performing Finance team. You will also invest in personal development and the development of your Finance peers
What you will bring
A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career. You will bring experience and knowledge in:
TECHNICAL EXPERTISE in financial analysis and data collection
BUSINESS ACUMEN with a basic understanding of the role of finance in business
LEADERSHIP SKILLS including collaboration and communication skills within a Finance team. Team player with can do mentality to deliver results
GROWTH/DIGITAL MINDSET and the ability to execute opportunities and learn new technology
INTEGRITY in all interactions aligned with our values and policies and external regulations
More about this role
What you need to know about this position:
What extra ingredients you will bring:
Education / Certifications:
Accounting / Finance background
Job specific requirements:
Having prior experience in finance (KAP, FBP, FP&A) would be good
Fresh graduate is welcome
Travel requirements:
Work schedule:
No Relocation support available
Business Unit Summary
Mondelēz International in Southeast Asia is in five countries serving 19 markets with more than 18 nationalities and 7,500 employees. This group is emerging as one of the fastest growing regions in Asia, the Middle East and Africa, and we are proud of consistently producing high quality products in nine manufacturing sites. We are market leaders in key snacking categories, making and selling brands like Oreo and Tiger biscuits, Kinh Do mooncakes, Jacob’s crackers, Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate, Tang powdered beverage, Halls candy and Eden cheese. We set the benchmark in being a responsible business and contributing to the communities in which we operate.
Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Job Type
RegularFinance Planning & Performance ManagementFinance

tools: GCP, SQL, AWS, Tableau, Looker, Python, R, Power BI, Azure
description:
About Us
INDICO is a digital technology subsidiary company of Telkomsel, Indonesia's leading digital telecom company. INDICO plays a strategic role as a holding company that houses current and prospective vertical digital business portfolios, including Kuncie (edu-tech), Fita (health-tech), and Majamojo (game). Moving forward, INDICO aims to explore opportunities in multiple verticals adjacent to Telkomsel’s digital businesses. As a digital platform company, INDICO aims to leverage Telkomsel’s digital assets and capabilities to create a flywheel effect of innovations to develop cross-sectoral digital solutions that will empower Indonesia’s digital economy.
INDICO believe we can reach beyond to empower Indonesians and enable businesses through our strong core values of EPIC WAY (Excellence, Positivity, Impactful Collaboration, Customer First, Walk the Talk, Accountability, Yes-if Mindset).
As a Product Analyst at INDICO, you will play a critical role in overseeing data-driven decision-making for INDICO product and business lines, which include digital goods commerce, engagement platform, Edutech, HealthTech, and game publishing businesses. This position offers a unique opportunity to work with cross-entity data across a variety of industries, driving impactful business outcomes and product development. You will collaborate with multiple business units to plan, strategize, and accelerate growth, leveraging complex data to provide actionable insights that support informed decisions, as well as build and expand the data analyst organization.
What you will do but not limited to:
Collaborate with Indico and its subsidiaries to plan, strategize, and drive growth through data-driven insights.
Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets to support business and product decisions.
Develop and deploy dashboards to track key metrics for different business units, including Edutech, Healthtech, and Game Publishing.
Conduct both regular and ad-hoc analysis to support strategic decision-making and special projects.
Partner with Product and Data Engineering teams to enhance data pipelines and ensure data accuracy across multiple entities.
Design and analyze experiments to assess initiatives and optimize business outcomes.
Track and measure the impact of data-driven strategies, providing regular updates on their effectiveness.
Work with cross-functional teams to define success metrics, evaluate data, and deliver actionable insights across Indico and its subsidiaries.
Requirements
Bachelor's or master's degree in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, etc.).
Proficiency in SQL for querying and data manipulation.
Experience with BI tools (e.g., Tableau, PowerBI, Looker) for dashboard creation.
Familiarity with Python or R for advanced data analysis is a plus.
3+ years of experience in data analysis, data science, or a related role.
Effective communication and storytelling skills to present data-driven insights to various stakeholders.
Experience working with diverse stakeholders across multiple business units.
Ability to analyze large datasets, tackle complex challenges, and deliver actionable insights.
Passion for data, curiosity about analysis, and a proactive attitude in exploring solutions.
Experience in A/B testing, statistical experimentation, or building predictive models is a plus.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., GCP, AWS, Azure) is an advantage.
Fluent in English and Bahasa Indonesia for effective communication across teams.

description:
Work Responsibilities:
Campaign Analysis: Monitor the performance of digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram, LinkedIn, and email marketing.
Data Analysis: Collect, analyze, and interpret marketing data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Provide actionable insights to the marketing team.
ROI Optimization: Work closely with the marketing team to optimize campaign budgets, bidding strategies, and targeting to maximize return on investment (ROI).
A/B Testing: Plan and execute A/B tests to improve ad creatives, landing pages, and other campaign elements. Utilize test results to inform campaign optimization.
Reporting: Prepare regular reports and dashboards to communicate campaign performance and key metrics to stakeholders. Identify and communicate key insights from the data.
Competitor Analysis: Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitive landscape. Conduct competitor analysis to identify opportunities and areas for differentiation.
Keyword and Audience Research: Perform keyword research and audience analysis to inform ad targeting and content strategies.
Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including content, design, and development to ensure alignment of marketing efforts and achieve campaign objectives.
Able to keep Advisory Analytics Consultant Coordinator updated with current project progress.
Able to draft email correspondence to clients as per internal technical / advisory requirements, and in turn provide updates to our internal team on the requirements.
Able to organize and service meetings (understand the context during the meeting and summarize the meeting results and/or necessary next steps well).
Able to coordinate schedules between internal team and client.
Able to collaborate with other team members or other division well.
Able to manage client requests and/or issues (replicate, validate and confirm the issues) Product Knowledge (Google products: Google Analytics, Google Optimize, Digital Marketing etc).
Preferred to have background knowledge on Google products and/or able to grasp and learn new concepts quickly and in depth.
Preferred to have experience with digital marketing fields.
Communication Skills - Ability to communicate in clear and concise terms Leadership Responsibilities.
Commits to spending daily time in personal development and growth.
Ability to work with minimal supervision and keep supervisors informed.
Able to motivate themselves to learn new concepts quickly and in depth.
Able to be proactive with given tasks.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, Economics, or a related field. Master’s degree is a plus.
Minimum 2–3 years of experience as a Product Analyst, Data Analyst, Business Analyst, or a related role.
Experience in the tech, consulting, e-commerce, or financial services industry is highly valued.
Experience collaborating with performance marketing or growth marketing teams is a strong advantage.
Proficient in SQL for data extraction and transformation.
Skilled in analytical tools such as Python, R, or advanced Excel (including pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and data modeling).
Familiar with Business Intelligence (BI) tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Looker, or Google Data Studio.
Hands-on experience with A/B testing, cohort analysis, funnel analysis, and experimentation frameworks.
Strong understanding of product metrics like conversion rate, retention, churn, LTV, CAC, and ROI.
Solid understanding of performance marketing channels such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads, and programmatic platforms.
Experience analyzing and optimizing marketing campaign performance using data.
Knowledge of channel attribution models, marketing effectiveness measurement, and budget optimization based on data insights.
Comfortable working closely with marketing teams to align performance initiatives with product goals.
Strong business acumen with the ability to turn complex data into actionable insights and strategic recommendations.
Excellent communication skills with the ability to present findings to non-technical stakeholders.
Product-oriented mindset with strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.

description:
We are looking for a Technical Business Analyst to join our team. We will work together to design, implement and deliver mission-critical web and mobile applications for our clients. It is imperative that our software applications are designed to be robust, secure and future proof, especially given our portfolio of customers. We would like to tap on your experience, technical knowledge and resourcefulness to deliver world-class solutions for our clients.
Responsibilities
Work as a key member of the project management team to drive the project forward and ensure smooth and successful project delivery
Collaborate with client stakeholders (IT team and System owners) and internal stakeholders (Project Management, Development and DevOps team)
Work closely with the project’s Solution Architects (both external and internal) to understand technical requirements in the realm of Cloud Architecture, DevSecOps, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
Analyze and synthesize business requirements; and build suitable business cases and generate client/business needs through human-centric, visual methods
Develop user stories, functional/technical specifications and acceptance criteria
Analyze the impacts of requested changes, and conceptualise and recommend appropriate solutions that continuously address changing business needs
Conceptualize business processes and present it visually using workflow diagrams and slide decks to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts
Analyze technical requirements; factor in dependencies and critical path, and deliver technical deliverables on a timely basis
Deliverables may include the following:
Architecture Diagrams
Cloud Hosting and Set-up (AWS or Azure cloud)
Technical integrations with 3rd party systems
Performance and Load Testing
Solution Design / Technical Specifications
Data Extraction, Transformation and Migration
User stories/ functional specifications
Workflow diagrams to demonstrate business processes
Manage the project’s technical track, in relation to overall project timeline; plan and prioritize tasks in a constantly changing environment
Create informative, actionable and repeatable reporting that effectively presents progress and status of different aspects of the project to different stakeholders.
Support the full software development cycle to ensure project readiness for smooth deployment, adoption and operations
Be open to learning and exploring new technologies, and more importantly, love getting your hands dirty
Responsibilities
Degree in Computer Science, Infocomm Technology, Computer Engineering with excellent academic records or outstanding professional or personal achievement.
Minimum 3 years of relevant experience e.g. Software Development, Cloud Architecture, Technical Analyst / System Analyst etc
Participated in a full software or product development cycle, preferably using Agile Methodology
Have prior hands-on coding experience
Excellent analytical, conceptualization and problem-solving skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to pitch ideas
Strong influencing and people management skills
Ability to understand and translate technical requirements into digital mediums e.g. Word, PowerPoint, and Excel
Meticulous and detailed oriented with excellent documentation skills
A driven and motivated personality with aptitude for analysis
Being a pro-active, self-motivated and resourceful team member who can guide and mentor other.
Willing to work from our Bandung office.
The following would be a “plus”
Relevant certifications e.g. Cloud Certificates, Project Management Certificates
Prior experience in a product development firm or consulting experience (IT consultancy, IT service delivery etc)
Knowledge or experience in one or more of the following areas:
Database designs
Cloud architecture
CI/CD pipelines
We seek your understanding that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

description:
We at Indepay | Setara Networks are here to revolutionize the Indonesian payment ecosystem by introducing one click checkout services in order to make transactions zero-fee, instant, and rewarding for the consumer.
On one side we’re working with financial institutes to enable real-time account to account transfers through our platform, and on the other-side we’re giving consumers a reliable and secure payment experience which is better than anything else they’ve experienced in the Indonesian ecosystem.
🚀 Where We Are Now: Series A Startup with Boundless Opportunities! 🚀
🎯 Our Vision for Payment Transformation:
We’re on a mission to disrupt the traditional online payment landscape. By pioneering a faster, safer, and incredibly simple payment solution, we're challenging the status quo of virtual account payments and setting a new standard for seamless transactions, enabling payment in just 20 seconds powered by open banking regulatory framework.
📲 Strategic Partnership with Top Brands:
As we build a new category in one-click fast payments, you'll have the opportunity to work alongside industry leaders, partnering with top-tier D2C brands ranging from telco providers, banks, FnB, and OTT to create a network that redefines the future of online payments.
🚀 Your Opportunity to Innovate:
If you're passionate about innovation and eager to make a significant impact, this is your chance to be part of something truly transformative and create value.
The Dispute and Settlement Analyst will be responsible for managing large customer bases, preferably in payments/B2C ecommerce domains, and have experience in driving strategies for onboarding, retention, growth, and loyalty.
Join a multicultural team at the epicenter of transforming Indonesia's future payment industry. Seize this rare opportunity to be a game changer in an environment that thrives on innovation and collaboration. Don't miss out on the chance to be part of a live, dynamic company ready to soar to new heights in the coming year.
Ready to simplify and revolutionize transactions? Apply now and let's embark on this exciting journey to reshape the world of payments together! 🚀💳#IndepaySetaraJourney #PaymentsInnovation
What your current role should be like?
Proven experience (3+ years) in customer support, handling inquiries, complaints, and disputes in high-volume B2C or payment environments.
Solid track record in managing end-to-end merchant satisfaction metrics, ensuring quality SLAs, and implementing data-driven improvements.
Hands-on involvement in utilizing analytics tools to identify patterns in disputes and integrating insights into product enhancement roadmaps.
Demonstrated expertise in leading and mentoring teams, ensuring adherence to OKRs, and crafting impactful SOPs and training modules.
Proficiency in creating dashboards and periodic reports to highlight complaint trends and deliver actionable insights for management.
What will you do?
Handle inquiries and complaints from merchants.
Maintain chat, SLA, and merchant satisfaction rate quality.
Manage inquiries, complaints, and disputes coming through various channels (phone, email, chat, automated, letters, etc) and close the issues accurately in a timely manner.
Proactively spot and correct any issues that could affect merchant satisfaction or retention.
Involve appropriate internal teams to efficiently and effectively handle the complaints/disputes.
Analyze the incoming queries/complaints/disputes to identify patterns to define action-ables, then work directly with our product team to provide input on the product roadmap.
Provide insight to management on the offerings through publishing dashboard of the queries and complaints periodically.
Coordinate responsibilities and capacity planning for their team.
Mentor & maintain merchant support team performance.
Training new joiners as a part of their Onboarding process.
Contribute in developing team OKR, Modules, and SOP.
Create weekly and monthly reports.
Ensure highest standards of customer communication & services.
Continuously update yourself with new products and services that are rolled out.
Requirements
What do you have?
Min. 3 years of related working experience in managing customer success for large scale customer facing apps/portals. Additional experience/understanding of call center ops, analytics and technology in the space are appreciated.
Strong understanding of both consumer and business targeting and full funnel penetration (B2C and B2B).
Must be comfortable working in an early stage to growth stage company and should be able to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
Have a proven track record of success in previous roles and have worked in a similar setting, such as a Pre series A-B company will be a plus.
A leader who takes fun in taking risks and understands that taking calculated risks is necessary for growth. They should have the ability to balance risk-taking with sound decision-making to build something innovative and groundbreaking.
People-oriented, cool-tempered, proactive, and communicative.
Good analytical and problem-solving skills.
Ability to work independently and meticulously (detail oriented).
A good team player with excellent interpersonal skills to work with different teams within the organization.
Strong focus on results, using NPS/CSAT/other metrics to drive improvements in CX
Computer literate (G-Suite & MsOffice) especially Docs/Word, Sheets/Excel, Slides/PowerPoint.
How do you do it?
You thrive in a dynamic and fast paced environment.
You deliver on your commitments without fail.
You have an analytical and data-driven approach in day-to-day work.
You are always energetic and work well under pressure.
You are affable and know your way around the organization.
You have excellent communication skills and have the ability to impact and influence.
You have an unparalleled attitude and determination to succeed against all odds.
You can multi-task and have excellent time management and prioritisation skills.
You are a strategic thinker who understands business opportunities to create a competitive advantage.
You have excellent problem solving and analytical skills, and can think outside the box to proactively provide the right solution.
You have a keen eye for detail.
You stay positive and bring out the best in a team.
You are independent, self-motivated and a fast learner.
Patience and perseverance are your key attributes.
Benefits
What do we offer?
You will be working alongside other passionate and talented people in a beautiful, spacious and well lighted office with all the perks and flexibility of a coveted technology product company. Besides, you will have a sense of purpose and excitement as we offer:
An opportunity to make a positive impact on the world by providing basic financial services to unbanked and underbanked people worldwide.
An opportunity to define and develop a product for the global market.
An opportunity to be part of the core team who will build a global company and define its culture and processes.
An opportunity to move horizontally or vertically across geographies through multiple career paths.
An opportunity to work at the frontier of modern banking solutions technology.
Of course, we do have competitive salaries, long term incentives and many other generous benefits. We promote entrepreneurship culture and look forward to a budding ground for future entrepreneurs.

Lead financial planning, forecasting, budgeting, and reporting activities

Job Requirements:

description:
Job Overview:
Analyzing and managing institutional risk potential in an integrated manner.
Job Description:
Preparing the data and information required for monitoring risk positions both on a composite basis, by risk type, and by type of business activity of the institution, as well as ensuring the implementation of stress testing and Early Warning Detection.
Preparing the data and information needed for periodic reviews of the processes for identifying, measuring, monitoring, and controlling risks on an enterprise-wide basis.
Preparing the data and information required for risk modeling analysis and the validity of the data used for the institution's risk measurement.
Preparing the data and information needed for coordination in monitoring assets (composition and concentration of financing portfolios) and liabilities (funding sources).
Preparing the data and information required for managing a risk management information system that is informative, accurate, and timely.
Ensuring the achievement of individual performance targets.
Carrying out all operational activities in accordance with applicable good corporate governance principles.
Implementing the fulfillment of audit follow-up actions.
Job Requirements:
Minimum graduate from any reputable university. Post-graduation will be and added advantage.
Preferably 2 years of work experience in portfolio & analytics and/or a fresh graduate.
Have good knowledge and understanding of: LPEI's Product & Operational and Risk Management
.
Holding a Certification of Management Risk will be a plus point.

position: Project Finance Analyst - Electrification Distribution Solutions
description:
Project Finance Analyst - Electrification Distribution Solutions
At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions. Write the next chapter of your ABB story.
This position reports to
Finance Controller
Your role and responsibilities
In this role, you will be a vital member of the finance team in Indonesia. In this role you will provide key support to the turnaround of the business, ensuring accurate tracking and processing of all transactions. You will translate business strategy into plans and establish measurable targets, evaluate the financial implications of various strategic decisions, identify risks and recommend actions.
The work model for the role is: #hybrid This role is contributing to the Electrification Services Division in Jakarta or Tangerang. You will be mainly accountable for:
Oversee the Annual Performance Plan (Budgeting) and forecasting process for the area of responsibility and serve as the interface to Global Division, Regional & Local management.
Performing financial analysis, reporting to business managers, and making suggestions to improve performance, where appropriate and responsible for the accuracy of project balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow and monthly/quarterly forecasts.
Monitors progress and provides insight and analysis to support operational decision-making.
Identifies issues and advises management on action plans and operational strategies to resolve.
Involve in business reviews, project reviews, monitor progress achieved, provide insights to support operational decisions.
Qualifications for the role
A bachelor's degree in accounting or finance (professional certification like CA/CMA/CPA is preferred).
Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar finance controller role in a global matrix multinational environment.
Working knowledge of US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (USGAAP) is preferable
Hands on experience of working in SAP (FI,CO) and well versed with MS Office.
Outstanding attention to detail, accuracy, and the ability to multitask.
A collaborative, solution-focused approach, and strong written and verbal communication skills.
Excellent command of English and Bahasa Indonesia required.
More about us
ABB's Distribution Solutions Division facilitates the efficient and reliable distribution, protection and control of power by improving electric power quality while strengthening the resilience of the grid. The Division offers segment-specific products and solutions that largely serve utilities, industry and infrastructure segments, often providing the requisite medium-voltage link between high-voltage transmission systems and low-voltage users. With ABB Ability™ enabled connected solutions at its core, the offering includes medium-voltage air- and gas-insulated switchgear (1 to 66 kilovolts), indoor and outdoor circuit breakers, reclosers, fuses, contactors, relays, instrument transformers, sensors, motor control centers, as well as low-voltage switchgear for the ANSI standard markets.
We value people from different backgrounds. Apply today for your next career step within ABB and visit www.abb.com to learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #MyABBStory

performance plan (budgeting) and forecasting process for the area of responsibility and serve as the interface to global division, regional & local management. performing financial analysis, reporting to business managers, and making suggestions to improve performance, where appropriate and responsible for the accuracy of project balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow and monthly/quarterly forecasts. monitors progress and provides insight and analysis to support operational decision-making. identifies issues and advises management on action plans and operational strategies to resolve. involve in business reviews, project reviews, monitor progress achieved, provide insights to support operational decisions. qualifications for the role a bachelor's degree in accounting or finance (professional certification like ca/cma/cpa is preferred). minimum 5 years of experience in a similar finance controller role in a global matrix multinational environment. working knowledge of us generally accepted accounting principles (usgaap) is preferable hands on experience of working in sap (fi,co) and well versed with ms office. outstanding attention to detail, accuracy, and the ability to multitask. a collaborative, solution-focused approach, and strong written and verbal communication skills. excellent command of english and bahasa indonesia required. more about us abb's distribution solutions division facilitates the efficient and reliable distribution, protection and control of power by improving electric power quality while strengthening the resilience of the grid. the division offers segment-specific products and solutions that largely serve utilities, industry and infrastructure segments, often providing the requisite medium-voltage link between high-voltage transmission systems and low-voltage users. with abb ability™ enabled connected solutions at its core, the offering includes medium-voltage air- and gas-insulated switchgear (1 to 66 kilovolts), indoor and outdoor circuit breakers, reclosers, fuses, contactors, relays, instrument transformers, sensors, motor control centers, as well as low-voltage switchgear for the ansi standard markets. we value people from different backgrounds. apply today for your next career step within abb and visit www.abb.com to learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #myabbstory

description:
Ruangguru is a tech-enabled education company that provides a one-stop learning experience for students to have better access to quality content and service. Ruangguru has allowed students to access better quality educational content in the form of learning videos, question banks, test-prep materials, and study notes. Ruangguru platform has been proven to not only help families reduce the cost for education, but also elevate student outcomes.
As a C-Level Analyst, you will support the C-level by analyzing data, providing strategic insights, and ensuring smooth execution of key initiatives. This role combines business analysis with executive support, helping the C-level make data-driven decisions efficiently.
Job Descriptions:
Analyze business data and generate insights to support decision-making.
Prepare reports, presentations, and summaries for the C-level.
Track key initiatives, follow up on action items, and ensure execution.
Act as a liaison between the C-level and internal/external stakeholders.
Organize meetings, document key points, and assist with scheduling.
Monitor industry trends and competitors to provide strategic recommendations.
Job Requirements:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, Finance, Economics, Data Science, or related fields.
Experience: 2-3 years in business analysis, data analysis, or strategic planning.
Skills & Competencies:
Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage multiple priorities.
Comfortable working with C-level executives and handling confidential information.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in consulting, corporate strategy, or financial analysis.

Collect, clean, and organize e-commerce data including sales, customer behavior, marketing campaigns, and product performance.
Conduct data analysis and build models to identify trends, patterns, and business opportunities.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports with clear visualizations for stakeholders.

Excellent analytical thinking, detail-oriented, and able to derive actionable insights from data.
Ability to work efficiently and adapt quickly in a fast-paced environment.
Strong communication skills in
Mandarin and English
(both written and spoken).
Team player with high initiative and eagerness to learn.

description:
Details of the Division and Team:
The Branch Operations Analyst is responsible for ensuring timely, complete and accurate processing of relevant information, including performing all relevant controls within own area of responsibility. They undertake time critical, complex or regulated tasks and must ensure the timely escalation of operational, regulatory and other risks to the line manager and functional leads as appropriate.
What we will offer you:
A healthy, engaged and well-supported workforce is better equipped to do their best work and, more importantly, enjoy their lives inside and outside the workplace. That's why we are committed to providing an environment with your development and wellbeing at its center.
You can expect:
Comprehensive Medical Insurance Coverage for Employee and Family
Life Insurance Coverage
Additional Pension Scheme (DPLK) on top of Statutory Contribution
EAP - free and confidential counseling, online work-life resources
Staff Loan including Housing Loan, Car Loan and Personal Loan
Hybrid work arrangement
Comprehensive leave benefits
Annual health checkup - cost borne by company (once a year; conditions apply)
Your key responsibilities:
In charge to prepare daily valuation report for multiple funds
Responsible in handling annual financial report and tax return
Perform daily activities in fully adherence of internal operating procedure and in fully awareness of process and control.
Dealing with internal and external stakeholders, including auditor & client
Manage to achieve zero audit findings in Fund Services
Your skills and experience:
Candidate must possess minimum Bachelor's Degree major in Accounting
Experience in fund administration/ fund accounting.
Strong in accounting knowledge with high level of accuracy and have good knowledge in Capital Market and Indonesia tax regulation.
Good analytical, computer literacy and be able to willing to work under pressure with minimum supervision
Good English skill both verbal and written
How we'll support you:
Flexible working to assist you balance your personal priorities
Coaching and support from experts in your team
A culture of continuous learning to aid progression
A range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs
Training and development to help you excel in your career
About us and our teams:
Deutsche Bank is the leading German bank with strong European roots and a global network. click here to see what we do.
Deutsche Bank & Diversity
We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.
Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.
We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

description:
About us
At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern living and a net-zero future. As one of the world's largest publicly traded energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.
The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people. They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals, lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.
We invite you to bring your ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable solutions that improve quality of life and meet society's evolving needs. Learn more about
our What and our Why
and how we can work
together
.
ExxonMobil's affiliates in India
ExxonMobil's affiliates have offices in India in Bengaluru, Mumbai and the National Capital Region.
ExxonMobil's affiliates in India supporting the Product Solutions business engage in the marketing, sales and distribution of performance as well as specialty products across chemicals and lubricants businesses. The India planning teams are also embedded with global business units for business planning and analytics.
ExxonMobil's LNG affiliate in India supporting the upstream business provides consultant services for other ExxonMobil upstream affiliates and conducts LNG market-development activities.
The Global Business Center - Technology Center provides a range of technical and business support services for ExxonMobil's operations around the globe.
ExxonMobil strives to make a positive contribution to the communities where we operate and its affiliates support a range of education, health and community-building programs in India. Read more about our Corporate Responsibility Framework.
To know more about ExxonMobil in India, visit ExxonMobil India and the Energy Factor India .
What role you will play in our team
Planning analyst: will evaluate and improve the organization's planning processes by gathering and analyzing data, preparing reports, and providing insights to support decision-making.
What you will do
Data Analysis
: Gather and analyze data to support planning activities.
Reporting
: Prepare detailed reports and presentations.
Process Evaluation
: Evaluate current planning processes and recommend improvements.
Collaboration
: Work with finance, operations, and other departments to align planning activities.
KPI Monitoring
: Monitor and report on key performance indicators (KPIs).
Strategic Planning
: Assist in developing annual/long-term strategic plans.
Scenario Analysis
: Conduct scenario analysis and forecasting.
Model Maintenance
: Maintain and update planning models and tools.
About You
Skills and Qualifications
Degree in Engineering/Technology with GPA 6.5+.
3-5 years in data analysis and planning.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, proficiency in Microsoft Excel/Power BI, excellent communication, and presentation skills.
Ability to work collaboratively, attention to detail, strong organizational skills.
Your benefits
An ExxonMobil career is one designed to last. Our commitment to you runs deep: our employees grow personally and professionally, with benefits built on our core categories of health, security, finance and life.We offer you:
Competitive compensation
Medical plans, maternity leave and benefits, life, accidental death and dismemberment benefits
Retirement benefits
Global networking & cross-functional opportunities
Annual vacations & holidays
Day care assistance program
Training and development program
Tuition assistance program
Workplace flexibility policy
Relocation program
Transportation facility
Please note benefits may change from time to time without notice, subject to applicable laws. The benefits programs are based on the Company's eligibility guidelines.
Stay connected with us
Learn more about ExxonMobil in India, visit ExxonMobil India and Energy Factor India .
Follow us on LinkedIn
Like us on Facebook
Subscribe our channel at YouTube
EEO Statement
ExxonMobil is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin or disability status.
Business solicitation and recruiting scams
ExxonMobil does not use recruiting or placement agencies that charge candidates an advance fee of any kind (e.g., placement fees, immigration processing fees, etc.). Follow the LINK to understand more about recruitment scams in the name of ExxonMobil.
Nothing herein is intended to override the corporate separateness of local entities. Working relationships discussed herein do not necessarily represent a reporting connection, but may reflect a functional guidance, stewardship, or service relationship.
Exxon Mobil Corporation has numerous affiliates, many with names that include ExxonMobil, Exxon, Esso and Mobil. For convenience and simplicity, those terms and terms like corporation, company, our, we and its are sometimes used as abbreviated references to specific affiliates or affiliate groups. Abbreviated references describing global or regional operational organizations and global or regional business lines are also sometimes used for convenience and simplicity. Similarly, ExxonMobil has business relationships with thousands of customers, suppliers, governments, and others. For convenience and simplicity, words like venture, joint venture, partnership, co-venturer, and partner are used to indicate business relationships involving common activities and interests, and those words may not indicate precise legal relationships.
Job Segment:
Sustainability, CSR, Engineer, Energy, Management, Engineering

description:
IT System Analyst
Responsibilities
Work closely with Business Analysts to translate business needs into detailed system requirements.
Develop documentation such as System Requirement Specification (SRS), use case diagrams, ERD, and data flow.
Design workflows, database structures, and system integrations (including APIs).
Provide recommendations for scalable, efficient, and user-friendly system design.
Collaborate with developers, QA, and project managers throughout the SDLC (Agile/Waterfall).
Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure system delivery meets requirements.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
2–3 years of experience in IT system analysis and development.
Basic SQL and database knowledge (MSSQL, PostgreSQL).
Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, .NET, and JavaScript frameworks (NestJS, ReactJS).
Familiar with Notion (for documentation) and Figma (for wireframes/prototyping).
Strong understanding of SDLC methodologies (Agile, Waterfall).
Knowledge of UML for business process and system modeling.
Strong analytical, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Detail-oriented, adaptable, and able to work effectively in a team.
Advantage:
API integration experience, familiarity with JIRA/Confluence/Azure DevOps, or relevant certifications (CBAP, Agile BA, etc.).

description:
We are seeking a talented Analytics & Data Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between data engineering and business intelligence, providing actionable insights to our business and product teams. You will be responsible for designing and maintaining data pipelines, advising development teams on data tracking, overseeing Google Analytics implementation, and creating business intelligence reports using tools.
Please note that this is an onsite placement located in Gading Serpong, South Tangerang.
Responsibilities
Cross-Team Collaboration
Work closely with frontend web, iOS, Android, and backend teams to advise on data tracking methodologies. Understand and translate business requirements into technical specifications for data collection.
Data Pipeline Development
Build and maintain data engineering pipelines to process platform production data.
Utilize ETL processes for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Ensure data integrity and reliability throughout the data lifecycle.
Google Analytics Management
Configure reports and data within Google Analytics to meet business needs.
Gather reports and data from GA dashboards and programmatically via the GA API.
Oversee the implementation and configuration of Google Analytics to meet data requirements.
Provide guidance on best practices for tracking and analyzing user interactions.
Business Intelligence Creation
Develop and maintain BI dashboards and reports using tools like Metabase.
Provide insights and analytics to support decision-making for business and product teams.
Qualifications
Minimum Education Level : Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Years of experience: Min 7 years
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Excellent communication skills to convey complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment.
Skills
Proficiency in SQL and at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java).
Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
Ability to design and manage ETL workflows.
Ability to extract and manipulate data from Google Analytics dashboards and programmatically via APIs.
Understanding of web and mobile app development practices for data tracking.

description:
Getting to Know Ajaib
We've been experiencing hyper-growth the past year, becoming Indonesia's 7th Unicorn Startup and the first Investment Fintech Unicorn in South East Asia 2.5 years after Ajaib first launched. Our mission is to make stock trading accessible for millennials through a mobile-first approach. In 2022, we opened our new head office in the Indonesia Stock Exchange Building, and we're just getting started!
At Ajaib, our three principles or 3DNAs set the foundation for our Magician belief system: Everyone is an owner, Growth Mindset, and A Will to Win.
Responsibilities
Conduct comprehensive research on various companies and sectors to identify investment opportunities.
Write detailed equity research reports, including financial modeling, valuation, and investment recommendations.
Monitor market trends and economic factors affecting the equity markets.
Collaborate with the trading team to provide timely insights and support trading strategies.
Present research findings to internal stakeholders and contribute to investment decisions.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, or a related field.
2+ years of experience in equity research, investment analysis, or related roles.
Strong knowledge of financial modeling, valuation methods, and equity analysis.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze financial statements and market data critically.
A keen interest in financial markets and investment strategies.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other financial analysis tools.
Strong work ethic and ability to meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Lowongan Kerja Sales Trading Analyst Intern Jakarta September 2025 PT Victory International Branch Jakarta Sudirman
Berikut ini adalah kriteria yang harus Anda penuhi untuk mengajukan lamaran Lowongan Kerja Sales Trading Analyst Intern Jakarta September 2025 PT Victory International Branch Jakarta Sudirman yang dibuka pada 12 September 2025 ini:
INTERNSHIP – MARKET ANALYSIS & SALES SUPPORT
Full-time | On-site – Jakarta
Program internship ini ditujukan bagi mahasiswa maupun fresh graduate yang ingin memperdalam pemahaman pasar keuangan sekaligus mengembangkan keterampilan analisis data dan relasi klien. Peserta akan bekerja langsung bersama analis dan trader profesional, serta terlibat dalam aktivitas sales yang strategis.
Tanggung Jawab
Melakukan riset pasar dan analisis pergerakan harga saham, komoditas, serta instrumen keuangan lainnya
Mengolah data pasar dan menyajikan laporan maupun visualisasi untuk mendukung strategi trading dan sales
Memantau aktivitas trading secara real-time dan memberikan insight kepada tim
Mendukung proses prospecting calon klien serta memperkenalkan layanan analisis maupun trading
Membantu menjaga komunikasi awal dengan klien dan calon investor
Kualifikasi
Mahasiswa aktif atau lulusan baru dari jurusan Ekonomi, Keuangan, Matematika, Statistika, Teknik Industri, atau bidang terkait
Memiliki minat pada pasar modal, trading, dan pengembangan relasi klien
Kemampuan analitis yang baik, detail-oriented, dan proaktif
Menguasai Excel atau Google Sheets (SQL, Python, atau R menjadi nilai tambah)
Komunikatif, mampu bekerja mandiri maupun dalam tim
Penguasaan Bahasa Inggris aktif menjadi nilai tambah
Benefit
Pengalaman praktis dalam analisis pasar dan aktivitas sales
Bimbingan langsung dari profesional di bidang keuangan
Sertifikat magang dan surat rekomendasi
Akses ke data pasar dan sistem trading real-time
Kesempatan membangun jejaring dengan klien, investor, dan praktisi industri
Magang ini memberikan kombinasi pengalaman analitis dan sales yang jarang ditemui. Bagi Anda yang ingin meniti karier di dunia keuangan, ini adalah langkah awal yang tepat.
Jenis Pekerjaan: Penuh Waktu

Domisili kamu sekarang di mana?
Usia kamu sekarang berapa?

description:
Get to Know the Team
The Regional Centre of Excellence (COE) drives operational excellence through process optimization and tech-driven improvements. Within it, the Planning & Strategic Projects (PSP) team oversees COE governance, future planning, and key initiatives, while also serving as the main regional operations contact for product teams to enhance merchant and driver partner experiences.
Get to Know the Role
You will work with cross-functional and country-specific teams to implement projects that enhance business efficiency and improve customer and partner experiences. Your duties will involve collecting data, identifying areas for improvement, and suggesting effective operational solutions. You will also support the team in making strategic, data-driven decisions. Additionally, you will assist in developing dashboards and data visualizations to ensure high operational efficiency and an excellent user experience. This role will be based onsite in Jakarta and you will be reporting to Regional Platform Safety Manager.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Analyze rich user behavioral data to identify patterns, trends, and insights that would help derive Grab's quality frameworks and operational efficiency, and contribute to continuous improvement decisions.
Develop and communicate insights and recommended actions to stakeholders to manage risk through effective data visualization.
Develop and improve frameworks and their associated data pipelines, policies, and processes on user experiences.
Drive standardization and documentation of processes, ensuring changes are communicated effectively to all stakeholders.
Work cross-functionally with country and regional stakeholders to gather input and execute new policies and processes.
Support any ad hoc tasks assigned by the team.

description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Melakukan pekerjaan sebagai seorang Credit Analyst dengan teliti, penuh tanggung jawab, independensi, obyektif, disiplin dan menjunjung tinggi nilai integritas.
Memeriksa kelengkapan dokumen persyaratan kredit (hard copy maupun online) berdasarkan check list dokumen yang ada agar sesuai dengan kebijakan yang berlaku.
Melakukan pemeriksaan terhadap status calon customer yang akan diberikan fasilitas pembiayaan pada black list internal Clipan Finance, APPI/BI Checking, Al Qaidah Terorisme), perusahaan pembiayaan lainya dsb, guna meminimalisir resiko pembiayaan yang akan diberikan.
Melakukan verifikasi terhadap data calon customer yang telah diinput di sistem dengan data yang terlampir (data asli + hard copy) guna meminimalisir resiko kesalahan penginputan data.
Melakukan analisa dengan metode 1P5C terhadap data aplikasi calon customer guna mengidentifikasi resiko calon customer (termasuk mitigasi/proteksi).
Memberikan rekomendasi analisa kredit yang akan dijadikan bahan pertimbangan oleh Komite Kredit untuk memberikan keputusan kredit yang diajukan calon customer.
Memonitor data non stater cabang baik harian maupun bulanan dengan berkoordinasi dengan Marketing, Collection.
CA cabang diwajibkan membuat laporan bulanan (Report Non Stater) utk cabang masing-masing guna memperoleh informasi mengenai kondisi cabang, misalnya mengenai CMO, supplier/showroom, profesi pemohon dan resale value unit yang diajukan termasuk informasi penanganan Collection (Coll Activity).
Kualifikasi :
Pendidikan minimal. D3
Mempunyai pengalaman minimal. 1 tahun sebagai Credit Analyst di perusahaan pembiayaan

description:
We are looking for a highly motivated
Investment Analyst
to join a leading  venture capital platform in Southeast Asia. This role offers an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on exposure to the venture ecosystem, working with experienced investors and innovative founders across the region.
As an Analyst, you will be responsible for conducting research, building financial models, supporting deal execution, and monitoring portfolio performance. This is a strong entry point for those passionate about startups, technology, and investing.
Key Responsibilities
Conduct market research and sector analysis to identify emerging opportunities.
Support due diligence processes, including financial modeling, competitive benchmarking, and industry mapping.
Assist in preparing investment memos, presentations, and recommendations.
Monitor portfolio company performance and support value creation initiatives.
Build and maintain databases of market and investment intelligence.
Collaborate with senior team members on deal execution and investment strategy.
Qualifications
Bachelors degree in Finance, Business, Economics, or related field; a Masters degree or CFA is a plus.
1-3 years of experience
in investment banking, consulting, private equity, or venture capital (internship/analyst experience in startups is also valuable).
Strong financial modeling and analytical skills.
Excellent research, presentation, and communication skills.
Passionate about technology, startups, and the venture capital ecosystem.
Proficiency in
English
; Bahasa Indonesia is an advantage.

description:
We’re looking for a
Technical Analyst (Oracle EBS)
to ensure our database systems run smoothly, efficiently, and securely. You will optimize, troubleshoot, and maintain databases while collaborating closely with developers to deliver high-performance solutions.
What You’ll Do:
Configure and maintain servers for stable and reliable databases
Assist developers with query tuning and optimization
Perform indexing and reindexing of database tables
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in real-time
Manage database replication and recovery processes
Conduct routine maintenance and daily backups
What We’re Looking For:
Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or Engineering (preferred)
3–5 years of experience in database administration, especially Oracle EBS
Strong knowledge of database performance tuning and optimization
Proven experience in troubleshooting and problem-solving
Detail-oriented with excellent analytical skills

description:
ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
Support the implementation of standard costing methodologies in the plant.
Collect, consolidate, and validate cost data from production, materials, labor, and overhead.
Assist in the preparation of plant-level cost budgets and forecasts.
Perform cost variance analysis between actual and standard costs, and highlight key findings.
Ensure accuracy and compliance with corporate cost accounting policies and procedures.
Prepare cost reports and provide insights to support decision-making at the plant level.
Coordinate with the Plant Control Unit and Corporate Cost Accounting team to align reporting standards.
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
Minimum 2–3 years of experience in cost accounting, preferably in a manufacturing environment.
Strong knowledge of standard costing, variance analysis, and cost reporting.
Proficiency in ERP systems and Microsoft Excel (experience with SAP/Oracle is a plus).
Good understanding of manufacturing processes and cost drivers.
Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Willing to be placed in
Jembrana
.

description:
Position:
Analyst/Senior Analyst
Location:
Jakarta
Department:
Asset Management
Key Responsibilities
:
Analyze financial data and create financial models for decision support.
Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
Monitor and report on financial performance, identifying trends and variances.
Assist in budgeting and forecasting processes.
Provide financial insights and recommendations to management.
Collaborate with other departments to gather and analyze financial information.
Ensure compliance with financial regulations and standards.
Manage corporate rates and agreements with external partners.
Negotiate special pricing and exclusive deals for the company.
Coordinate with various stakeholders to ensure the best financial outcomes for the company.
Support project-level budgeting and forecasting processes, analyzing revenue drivers, development costs, and capital expenditure across the investment lifecycle.
Oversee project-level cash flow management to ensure liquidity, financing coverage, and efficient capital deployment.
Support the structuring and securing of construction loans, refinancing, or other financing solutions by preparing financial models, assisting with documentation, and coordinating with banks and capital partners.
Track project milestones, financial covenants, and risk metrics, ensuring timely communication to senior stakeholders and investors.
Requirements
A bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or a related field.
At least 3-5 years of proven working experience as a Finance Analyst or Investment Analyst.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in financial modeling and analysis.
Excellent knowledge of MS Excel and financial software.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Self-starter, highly driven, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines
Strong understanding of Indonesian regulatory frameworks, real estate transaction processes, and local market dynamics.
Preferred experience with one of the Big 4 accounting firms (Deloitte, PwC, EY, KPMG).
Professional certification (e.g., CFA, CPA) is a plus.
Experience with ERP systems.

t, lebih disukai yang pernah menangani
project sistem integrasi.

Memiliki pengalaman dalam middleware, integrasi API, proses ETL, dan tools data transformation.

Menguasai pengembangan web dan pemrograman database menggunakan .NET dan MS SQL.
Familiar dengan standar keamanan dan regulasi pengembangan sistem di industri keuangan.
Memiliki kemampuan strong system impact analysis dan troubleshooting.

Kemampuan komunikasi dan koordinasi yang baik.
Mampu membuat dokumentasi teknis sistem dalam bahasa Inggris.

Job Description:
Melakukan analisis kebutuhan sistem, perencanaan, dan integrasi berbagai sistem enterprise dalam project penting perusahaan.
Menjadi penghubung antara kebutuhan bisnis dan solusi teknis, memastikan integrasi antar sistem berjalan mulus dengan menjaga performa, integritas data, dan skalabilitas.
Bekerja sama dengan berbagai tim lintas fungsi termasuk tim regional/global untuk memastikan solusi yang diusulkan sesuai dengan kebutuhan dan standar perusahaan.
Membuat dan mengelola dokumentasi teknis sistem, alur integrasi, serta spesifikasi fungsional dan non-fungsional.
Menganalisis dampak sistem (system impact analysis) serta melakukan troubleshooting terhadap isu teknis yang kompleks.
Berkontribusi dalam proses peningkatan sistem, standardisasi, dan best practice dalam pengembangan dan integrasi sistem.

description:
We are seeking a seasoned ERPNext Functional Analyst to join our team and contribute to delivering exceptional ERP solutions. If you are passionate about analyzing business needs, designing ERPNext systems, and driving successful implementations, we invite you to apply.
Responsibilities
Requirement Analysis
: Lead or actively participate in workshops to gather and analyze client business requirements, focusing on sales, purchasing, and inventory/warehouse management.
Solution Design
: Design ERPNext configurations and process flows to effectively address the identified business needs.
Documentation
: Develop comprehensive documentation, including requirements, process maps, and flowcharts, to support the solution.
User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
: Prepare and facilitate UAT to ensure solutions meet client expectations prior to deployment.
Training and Go-Live Support
: Conduct training sessions to ensure smooth transitions and successful Go-Live for client businesses.
Qualifications
Experience
: A minimum of 5 years of ERP implementation experience, including at least 2 years specializing in ERPNext, with involvement in 3+ full-cycle ERPNext projects.
Domain Knowledge
: Strong understanding of purchasing, sales, and inventory/warehouse management within ERPNext.
Analytical Skills
: Proven ability to analyze complex business processes and recommend optimal ERPNext configurations and designs.
Implementation Expertise
: Solid understanding of ERP implementation best practices and the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
Communication Skills
: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Bahasa, including the ability to deliver effective presentations.

·  Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 1-2 tahun sebagai Analis Keuangan, Akuntan, atau bidang terkait
·  Memiliki pemahaman yang kuat tentang prinsip-prinsip akuntansi dan analisis keuangan
.  Memiliki kemampuan yang sangat baik dalam penggunaan Microsoft Excel (Rumus kompleks, Pivot Table, Charting)
.  Memiliki keterampilan analitis, pemecahan masalah, dan perhatian terhadap detail yang kuat
.  Mampu bekerja secara individu maupun dalam tim
.  Memiliki keterampilan komunikasi verbal dan tertulis yang efektif
.  Kemampuan untuk bekerja dibawah tekanan dan memenuhi deadline
Job Deskripsi:
·  Melakukan analisis mendalam terhadap data keuangan, mengidentifikasi area untuk peningkatan efisiensi dan profitabilitas
.  Menyiapkan laporan keuangan rutin (bulanan, kuartalan, tahunan) dan ad-hoc, termasuk laporan laba rugi, neraca, dan laporan arus kas. Memastikan akurasi dan ketepatan waktu laporan
.  Membantu dalam proses perencanaan anggaran dan peramalan keuangan, termasuk proyeksi pendapatan dan pengeluaran
.  Memberikan wawasan dan rekomendasi berdasarkan analisis keuangan kepada manajemen untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan strategis dan operasional
.  Melakukan analisis variansi antara anggaran dan kinerja aktual, serta mengidentifikasi penyebab perbedaan
.  Membangun dan memelihara model keuangan untuk analisis sensitivitas, valuasi, dan proyeksi keuangan
.  Memastikan kepatuhan terhadap kebijakan dan prosedur keuangan internal serta standar akuntansi yang berlaku
. Berpartisipasi dalam proyek-proyek keuangan khusus sesuai kebutuhan, seperti analisis investasi, due diligence, atau evaluasi proyek baru
